You consider reprimanding her for this lack of manners, but considering the way that she's been treating you, you doubt that she cares about such things.

You're now in the backyard. The lemur slows down, looking around as she slows to a walk. She stops eventually, and you take in your surroundings. You're in a little plaza type area, with a few chairs and tables spread around. Trees surround the plaza, and there are four branching paths leading into the forest-like surroundings of your very overgrown backyard. You're still quite stunned by everything that's been happening to you, so you don't really remember exactly where each path leads.

Youre wondering what Plio is thinking about, but don't bother asking her. Instead, you wait patiently in her grasp, not even bothering to squirm anymore. Since she hasn't hurt you yet, you assume she doesn't plan to. So, you decide to keep calm and wait to see what she does. It's as good a plan as any.
111122212221211211222122211212.title: Into your backyard

choices: Star, running out of the house to continue fighting for you!
A mysterious animal in the trees...
1111222122212112112221222112122.content:
Suddenly, Plio seems to notice something. She sniffs at the air and makes quiet chattering noises to herself. Though she might be trying to tell you something too. You can't really tell, since you don't speak lemur.

You start to feel like something's wrong too, though, as if you're being watched. Sure enough, you hear a sudden noise, and in unison, you and your giant lemur captress look in its direction to see...
1111222122212112112221222112122.title: Something distracts her

11112221222121121122212221121222.content:
Something shadowy sits in a tree.

It's watching you.

...The shadowy thing, not the tree.

The thing gets up from its perch on a high branch and turns to the trunk, grasping it with its claws and clambering down it easily. It lands on the ground with a quiet thud, and it steps forward into a ray of light.

It's one of your cats. This one is a female calico named Polly. She starts walking towards you and Plio, her tail slowly waving in the air behind her, but seems to get distracted by something and stops. She looks down at her forepaws and sees something. Quickly, she reaches down with her right forepaw, picks up the object, which you can recognize as a toy ball, and inspects it before tossing it to the side.

This little display helps to remind you what makes Polly special. As per her name. She is polydactly. She has an extra pair of digits on her forepaws, making her have a total of six digits on each forepaw instead of the usual five. Polydactyly isn't too uncommon in cats, but they usually don't have any prehensility in the affected paws. Just your luck that Polly should be one of those lucky few who does have prehensility.

Polly continues moving towards you and Plio, her bright blue eyes focusing on you. You feel nervous, but don't know if you'd prefer being in her grasp over Plio's. You probably don't have a choice in the matter though.

Polly reaches Plio, standing inches away. The two gant animals stare at each other, Polly having taken her eyes off you to look at Plio. You think they're having a staring contest to decide who gets to keep you. Either that, or they're preparing to jump at each other and fight over you. You hope things won't get violent.

Thankfully, your wish is granted. Polly takes a step back. It seems like their little staring contest is over. But who won it? Will Plio keep you, or will Polly claim you instead?
11112221222121121122212221121222.title: The prehensile cat

111122212221211211222122211212222.content:
Without warning, Plio uncurls her fingers from around you. Freed from her fist, you fall to the ground and land heavily, but not painfully. You get up and turn to see Plio staring at you, but she stops after a few moments and quietly turns before walking back into the house. She closes the door this time.

You're glad to be out of Plio's grasp, but you immediately realize its not over yet. You turn and see Polly standing over you. Your black, brown, and white spotted cat is gazing down at you with her glowing blue eyes. You stare into them, mesmerized, but snap yourself out of it quickly and decide to finally speak up.

"Okay... Polly? Listen up. I'm your master, remember? Don't hurt me. I might be small, but I'm not a toy, got it? I need your help. Can you open the door so I can get back inside? Understand, Polly? Open the door! Door!"

The polydactyl stares at you, not seeming to understand your words. You didn't expect her to, though, but you're still disappointed. Polly begins to walk, circling you closely. You turn in place to keep an eye on her, worried about what she's planning.

"Okay, Polly, I said don't hurt me. If you're thinking about eating me, don't try it. Trust me, I probably taste awful. Please, if you can't help me just leave."

You know she can't understand you, but you decide to keep talking, hoping some words will click for her. She just keeps circling, though, and eventually, she stops. You stare into her mesmerizing blue eyes again, and barely notice as she swats you with a paw.

You fall over, landing hard again, and are stopped from rising up as a giant paw descends onto your tiny body. Polly just pinned you. You start to squirm, but the calico polydactyl doesn't pay it any mind. You look down at the paw pinning you to the ground, and see its digits start to curl. In moments, they've surrounded your body from the shoulders down to part of your legs. Then, you're picked up off the ground and brought up to Polly's feline face.

Helpless in her polydactyl grasp, you go limp and stare at her. You didn't expect anything else to happen here, to be honest. You'd be surprised if you got out of this situation without being snatched up by one of your now giant animals.

For now, you just look into the eyes of Polly, and wait for her next move.
111122212221211211222122211212222.title: Now you're the cat's

choices: She does understand, and she opens the door
She does not understand, and stays outdoors
1111222122212112112221222112122221.content:
You expected to be picked up by the giant cat. But what you didn't expect is what happens next.

Polly, having stared at you for a bit, brings you close to her face. You wonder if she's about to eat you, but you realize her mouth is staying shut. Instead, you're brought to one of her cheeks and slowly rubbed against it. She begins to purr, and you're shocked that she seems to be friendly.

Indeed, Polly means you no harm. You're impressed at the gentleness of this creature: many times your size, equipped with claws and fangs, she could kill you easily. She even has you clutched in her prehensile paw, and she still chose to be gentle. That's pretty nice of her, you think. You decide to give her some extra treats when you get out of this.

For now, though, you must focus on getting out of this. When Polly finishes her display of affection, she moves you further away from her so that she can see you again. You start talking again, telling her to open the backyard door. You're unsure if she understands, though, since she didn't seem to get anything else you said. In the end...
1111222122212112112221222112122221.title: Gentle polydactyl

1111222122212112112222.content: Unfortunately, the dog doesn't seem to recognize her master, despite noticing a similar smell. To her, the tiny creature might as well be a larger-than-average bug. With that thought in mind, the husky reaches her head over and licks up the tiny human, sucking on her catch a bit before swallowing.
1111222122212112112222.title: Bad end

choices: She falls over and dumps the mixture on you accidentally
She falls and dumps the mixture on herself accidentally
111122212221211212.content:
You recognize the bottle of the mixture you'd made yesterday. You walk over to it and see that it's still full as much as you remember. You sigh. That's not good--you'd thought the mixture was what somehow shrunk you, but now you see it hasn't been used, so you couldn't have shrunk from any animal stealing it and using it on you, as you had suspected before. Nonetheless, you think it might be good to test the mixture anyway--who knows, maybe it might even happen to be the antidote to your shrinking.

You are way too small to move the bottle, though, and you don't trust your raccoon enough to manipulate it carefully. Nonetheless, you have no choice. You tell the raccoon to pick up the bottle, and after a bit of repetition and demonstrations, you get her to understand what you want. She walks over and picks up the bottle with both hands. It's bigger than you, and more awkward for her to hold, and you start doubting this plan when she starts wobbling unsteadily. In fact, you tell the raccoon to stop and put the bottle down, but when you do...
111122212221211212.title: The mixture

choices: ...You seem to be changing size due to the mixture's effects
1111222122212112121.content: The raccoon lets out a short yelping noise and falls over forwards. The bottle she'd been holding in front of herself tips and slips form her hands, dumping the liquid contents out in front of her. You jump back as the mixture pours out, but you get covered in it nonetheless. You're knocked over by the force of the mixture flooding out of the bottle, and hit your head hard on the table. The impact makes you dizzy, but you don't black out. Your vision is hazy, but you think you can see the raccoon approaching you... And it might be the haziness, but you think something seems different...
1111222122212112121.title: She dumps the mixture on you

11112221222121121211.content:
To your surprise, you seem to be undergoing a reaction. You start to shake all over, and feel dizzy, but it's not completely unpleasant. You're not sure what's going on exactly, but through your hazy vision, you see the raccoon stumble back, and give a little yelp of surprise. Something startled her... And you start feeling as though you're changing size!

However, are you shrinking even more, or growing like you've been wanting to?
11112221222121121211.title: Bigger or smaller?

111122212221211212112.content:
The sensation you have is unlike any you've felt before. Your head starts swimming, and you soon black out.

When you wake up again, you feel something wet against your arm. You look over to see the raccoon nuzzling your arm with her nose and sniffing at you. It takes a few moments, though, to realize one very important fact: she's much smaller than before. Or rather, you're much bigger.

You're lying on your back, and you sit up straight, making the raccoon stumble backwards. You rub your head, because it hurts slightly, and look around. Sure enough, it would appear that you've returned to your original size! Apparently, that mixture you'd made was the key. You look down at the raccoon, who seems slightly scared by your sudden change in size, but she seems to relax quickly. You get to your feet, realizing you'd been lying on the floor--presumably having fallen off the table at some point--and look over at the tipped-over bottle. You're lucky that was the solution here. If not, this ordeal could have dragged on a whole lot longer. Even though you're not sure what started it all, the fact that this mixture you made here was able to turn you back to normal makes you wonder if a similar mixture caused you to shrink in the first place. The questions still remain: where is that mixture, who made it, and how did it affect you?

For now, though, you're just glad that you're back to normal, and this whole problem is finally over. Now you just have to clean off the raccoon drool all over you.
111122212221211212112.title: Good end

choices: She seems to be the same
1111222122212112122.content: The raccoon lets out a short yelping noise and falls over backwards. The bottle she'd been holding in front of herself tips, dumping the liquid contents all over her. You jump back as the mixture pours out and spreads out over the table, trying to avoid touching it. The raccoon flails her limbs a bit, surprised and trying to get off her back, and the bottle falls off the table and shatters on the floor below. The raccoon finally rolls over and stands up again on all fours, wiping her face with her hands to try to get off some of the liquid. You look up at her, worried about what the mixture might do. It was supposed to be completely harmless, but as you watch the raccoon...
1111222122212112122.title: She dumps the mixture on herself

choices: She does shrink--getting down to your size, or even smaller
She actually grows even bigger--how big, though?
11112221222121121221.content:
You're shocked as you watch the raccoon... She seems to be having some reaction to it! She begins to moan, and shudders all over. You thought the mixture had no effects... But it seems like maybe it does. And that means that, if the mixture now makes your raccoon shrink, you've found out what probably made you shrink too: somehow, you got some of the mixture on yourself and shrunk from it.

But that would only be confirmed if the raccoon starts shrinking now... So, does she? Or does she grow even bigger?
11112221222121121221.title: She starts to change size!

111122212221211212212.content:
Your heart sinks as the raccoon shudders and begins to grow. That was the antidote! You can only watched, stunned as she expands upward and outward. Leaning forward with a loud moan the raccoon surged another few inches in height, forcing you to back up away from your growing pet. When your back presses up against an empty glass jar, you can only watch as your shuddering companion grows over you.

For a moment her growth slows down. Judging by how much space on the table she was taking up you guessed that she was about the size of a large dog, even a little bigger.

You can only hope that she's done growing...
111122212221211212212.title: She actually grows even bigger--how big, though?

choices: Attempt to make a new antidote
1111222122212112122121.content:
Just when you think she's done growing, her body tenses up as her growth accelerates. Trapped underneath the raccoon you could see her body rise, her paws to the either side of you stretching larger, absorbing more of the spilled antidote. All of the sudden the desk begins to let out a painful creak, overburdened by the increasing weight. With a loud snap a section of desk by her hind paws gives way, making her tumble to the lab floor, making her let out an involuntary bark. You start to run towards the edge the to make sure that she was alright, but you stop yourself as you see as a fluffy set of triangular ears rise above the desk's horizon.

You watch as those ears continue to rise, followed by face of your raccoon giantess. Her eyes were closed and her mouth parted as she rose higher and higher, letting out various moans and murmurs as growth wracked her body. Sitting on her hind legs she must be about the same height you were before the whole shrinking ordeal. It wasn't long until she surpassed that as a large spurt suddenly gave her an extra foot in height, eliciting a gasp from the giant raccoon. She wavers for a second but places two massive paws on the desk to steady herself, and with her arms so close you could almost hear as her muscles broaden and her bones lengthen.

You look up to the massive raccoon, her growing form taking up almost all your field of vision from the desk. The raccoon's head eventually collides with the roof of the lab, breaking her from her growth-induced trance. You give a sigh of relief as her growth slows and stops completely. For a moment she seems lost, her head darting from side to side, unaccustomed to the new view of the smaller lab before settling her gaze onto you. You gulp. With her standing on her hinds legs and her head brushing against the lab ceiling, she must be about the size of a grizzly bear! To you, however, she is impossibly huge. At your 1 inch stature her claws were almost bigger than you.

You get a sinking feeling in your chest when she bends over to get a better look at you. You can't help but tremble a little bit and avert your gaze, ready for the worse. A loud bark brings you back to reality. Looking up, you see your giantess raccoon watching you observantly. You convince yourself that she isn't hostile and pull yourself together. Despite everything, you really need to focus on getting back to normal size.

Looking up at the giant raccoon, you ponder your options. You could risk trying to get her to make an antidote from scratch under your command. That is if she can hear your tiny voice and can understand the instructions to make it. Alternatively you could try and search for the shrinking serum to make your bear-sized companion more manageable.

You curse your small size. The situation is just getting more out of hand and almost anything could happen.
1111222122212112122121.title: She's still growing!

11112221222121121221211.content:
The fact that the serum your raccoon had spilled on herself was actually the antidote lead to you believe that the original shrinking serum was gone, perhaps hidden somewhere by the animal that shrunk you. At that moment you deemed the best option would be to try and make another antidote from scratch, you should be able to shrink your raccoon down after your bigger, anyway. You think you know the ingredients that would be used to recreate it but the only issue is the method of getting all the materials into the one beaker. With your diminished size most of the equipment on the lab bench towered over you. You nervously look up at your giant raccoon. Even though she's essentially a fuzzy skyscraper compared to you, you think she's your best bet. As she eyed you expectantly you felt like she genuinely wanted to help you, her new size just a result of a freak accident.

You slow your breathing to calm yourself down. Okay. You were going to have to give information and instructions to a bear-sized raccoon to create a growth serum for you. The thought filled you with anxiety about everything that could go wrong, but at the moment you see this as the only way forward. You yell up to the raccoon and try and get her attention. She just tilts her head in confusion before lowering her head down very close to you. Legs shaking you look up, her head alone took up most of your vision. You yell again, telling her how you are going to try and create another antidote and you need her help. You think she understands as she gives you a quick nod.

You gasp suddenly as you are swept off your feet, finding yourself surrounded by warm leathery skin. You could feel air rush past you as you were elevated upwards towards the raccoons face. To your surprise she was holding you quite delicately, despite the fact each of her fingers are all about four times your size. You tried to push the thought that she could simply crush you in her hands by squeezing slightly to the back of your mind. She stares at you, as if waiting for your instructions. You clear your throat and yell, slowly telling her the steps of the antidote creation process, twisting your body in her paw so you can point to the various ingredients you can see on the table from your new vantage point.

You would go through the process of it again while she was making it, but you were a bit worried if it was too complicated and if she could even understand complex instructions like that. You lock eyes with her as she stares at you, looking and praying for any sign of understanding from the giantess.
11112221222121121221211.title: Attempt to make a new antidote

choices: Dunks you in to the antidote.
111122212221211212212111.content:
The raccoon chatters happily before turning toward the lab table, looking over the various ingredients scattered about. Caught off-guard by her display of understanding you begin to repeat the instructions to her. With her increased height it made it easier for her to grasp the various beakers and containers compared to her original size. As she held you close to her head you continue to feed her instructions, your raccoon giantess slowly performing one task after another. Grab this, put it in that, mix those together, et cetera, et cetera. Her eyes gleamed with intelligence you haven't seen before, picking out the right materials by description alone and not requiring you to point point them out constantly. Perhaps the antidote had a side effect on the raccoon you didn't know about?

With a final stir of a beaker full of liquid, it faded to the color of the original antidote. The serum was completed surprisingly fast. You had expected it to take a few hours of slowly repeating steps to the giant raccoon, but here the serum sat, completed. Some of the measurements were a bit off so it may be more or less effective than the original antidote, but it should work nonetheless.

The raccoon picks up the beaker in one of her paws and brings it up to the face. She looks at the antidote and back to you briefly, before she...
111122212221211212212111.title: She understands perfectly

choices: A strange side effect of the bootleg antidote occurs.
1111222122212112122121111.content:
Your heart skips a beat as the huge raccoon brings the beaker closer to her mouth and swiftly drinks the liquid with a single gulp. As she finishes she lets out a contented sigh and looks down at you with what could be best described as a mischievous grin. Had this been her plan from the start? She suddenly clutches her stomach and trembles, letting out a series of moans. You know what is about to happen but you are powerless to do anything. At your 1 inch stature you only had the option of waiting out your power hungry raccoon's impending growth.

Sitting on her hind legs her ears were already brushing against the ceiling and the fact she was about to get so much bigger made you anxious. You gulp as her growth begins, the wall of fur in front of you starting to rise and spread out. With a loud thud her head impacts the ceiling, leaving behind a large dent and forcing her to bend down. Her expanding rump was beginning to push into other tables and equipment while her fluffy tail slowly snaked snaked throughout the lab. As she gained foot after foot of height she had to bend over more and more. With the raccoon still sitting on her hind legs, you nearly had to turn around to her face towering over you. Although you wish you didn't. The face looking down at you smugly practically screamed "Thanks for making me so big!"

A loud series of cracks caught your attention as the pressure on the ceiling increased. You thought you were about to die when you saw a mountain of fur rush towards you as brought herself lower readjusted her position by placing a paw on the lab floor. Apparently she didn't want to outgrow the house just yet. The new fluffy ceiling just above you stretched wider and wider, bobbing up and down with each breath she took. You could hear things in the lab being broken and knocked over by her expanding frame, her panting and moaning growing louder.

As you heard a thud which you assumed was her back hitting the ceiling again, she brought down her other paw onto the table coming just short of flattening you, knocking both you and equipment on the table over. The paw was massive, and took up most of the width of the lab table. Even with her paw splayed out each finger towered over you imposingly, still slowly getting higher. You heard another crack, but this time it was coming from below you. You realize too late that it was the table she was putting her weight on as a massive segment you were sitting on began to snap off. It quickly tilted towards the raccoon's paw, sliding you face first between two of her fingers. Shocked, you scramble and manage to get a grab hold of a slight crease in her leathery skin of her paw only to have it suddenly slam on the ground as the table gave way. The sudden movement flung you upwards for what felt to you like 50 feet. It felt like slow-motion when a brief weightlessness came over you as you realized you were beginning your descent.

You covered your face and braced for the end as air rushed past you. The impact winds you and while gasping for air you realize you landed on the soft fur on the top of your raccoons paw. As the view past the grey fur-like meadow got higher you realized the raccoon was still growing. In fact, you could easily grab a single strain of hair in your hands and feel it thicken, slowly parting your fingers. All of a sudden your world flips as the raccoon adjusts herself to the shrinking room once again. A mixture of breaking glass and splintering wood greets your ears as she turns onto her side and splays her legs out. As she puts her fore-paw over the other you were glad you were holding onto her giant hairs, otherwise you would have been flung off like a stray grain of dirt.

Thankfully you felt her growth starting to subside, the raccoon letting out a whine at the fact. With her paw at this angle you could see the shear extent which she had grown. Her frame reached from one end of the room to the other, her fluffy tail curling around the far side of the lab. In her lying position her side was brushing against the ceiling and she still had to bend her head. The confines of the room were practically groaning with each small movement of the giantess raccoon. You guessed that she would be about 20 feet tall from foot to shoulder, but from your perspective she looked like she was around 1000 feet tall!

You flinch as you see her head turn towards the paw you were smack-dab in the middle of. She couldn't see you, could she? Especially with this extreme of a size difference? You tighten your grip on her fur as she raises her paw towards her face. You really underestimated how big she was compared to you. As she brought you closer her head just took up more and more of your vision. She looked for a second before pulling the paw even closer towards one of her eyes. Even her eye alone dwarfed you in size. You freeze as the massive orb seemingly makes eye contact with you. She chatters happily upon finding you, shattering your hope that it was just a fluke. The giantess pulls her paw away from her face and looks down at you.

You were completely at the raccoon's mercy.
1111222122212112122121111.title: Raccoon Rising

choices: She gains traits from another animal
11112221222121121221211112.content:
As she happily gazes down at your miniature form she all of a sudden looks very uncomfortable. She whines as a loud gurgling can be heard from her belly. You knew right away it was the antidote that was making her sick. Unknown to you, a side effect was occurring within the raccoon, modifying her body for the changes to come.

What side effect does the raccoon receive?
11112221222121121221211112.title: Side Effect

choices: She's about to have another growth spurt.
111122212221211212212111121.content:
You were relieved that the raccoon's tummy ache was distracting her from you but that relief was slowly dashed away as you realized that her growth was starting up again. A lightheartedness overcomes you as you try and make sense of the situation. The slap-dash method of making the new antidote threw too many new variables into the mix or something? You are nearly thrown into the air again as her hand suddenly jerks back up to her gigantic growing face as she continues looking at you. She looks pretty pleased with herself as her round ears curl against the corner of the room. Looking behind you, her body was taking up more and more room in the lab as her torso brushes against the roof and her paws dig into the far walls.

When you hear a loud crash you realize her rump had broken through a wall and into another room. As you watch the wall crumble as more of her body invades the house you get winded as something massive impacts your body. Clutching onto the massive black object that hit you, you realize it's the claw of your raccoon. You also realize that the fur beneath you feet was no longer there and that you were dangling in the air. Thankfully at your size the smooth keratin structure was actually a lot more rougher with various grooves you could grab so you don't fall.

Once again you're greeted by the smug face of the giant raccoon. She chirps excitedly as her forehead begins to crack through to the attic, sending debris rainning down her face. You feel your stomach turn as the raccoon readjusts herself again in the shrinking house, using a fore paw to completely knock over a wall and give her more room to grow. Air rushes past you as she lifts you closer and closer to her face. You wince and close your eyes as you dangle off the claw waiting to be crushed or eaten but you actually find that your feet were making contact with something. Opening your eyes you just saw grey fur below you and jumped down. As the raccoon drew her hand away you could see that she planted you right in the middle of her muzzle. Apparently she wanted to give you a first class seat to watch her ascension.

And ascend she did. Sitting on the length of her muzzle you had a clear view of her body growing larger and taking up more space in the house, her torso starting to break through the ceiling to the attic. A cacophony of noise barraged you as the raccoon's head also began pushing into the attic again causing a rain of material to fall all around you. While traumatic for you, the raccoon was loving it. She chirped happily as he head entered the attic and bumped against another barrier as she tilted her body up. With a clear view of the attic you could see the floors erupt as black and grey fur burst through from below. Across the other side of the attic you could see her thigh angle upwards and contact the roof.

The giantess completely filled the house, you could hear the destruction as her fluffy body continued flattening furniture down below. You grasp onto the grey fur of her muzzle as she begins to change positions to an upright, crouched position. Even though you couldn't see it, you realized what she was doing as you heard the roof above you gift way to her increasing mass. As gentle as a giant raccoon can, she slowly pressed her back against the roof and with a series of loud snaps it began to rise off the house. Standing high on all four legs, the roof eventually crumbled to the ground sending plumes of dust flying everywhere.

The sight was intense. Your house was now just a pile of rubble after being outgrown by your very own pet. Thankfully, you saw that your other animals managed to escape as they ran away into the distance. Just then you notice that the ground wasn't getting further away and the raccoon's muzzle wasn't lengthening. You would be happy about the fact she stopped growing if she wasn't twice as big as all the houses in the neighborhood. By your estimates she must be standing at least 50 feet tall from paw to shoulder.

Your view changed as the raccoon swiveled her giant head and observed everything around her. Loud thuds came from below as she started moving across the street to another house. Bending over she wrapped her fingers around an SUV and picked it up, tilting the vehicle side to side as her grip slowly warped it's frame. Bringing it up to her face you could see her nose bobbing up and down as she sniffed it before putting the back end of it inside her mouth. Metallic screeching met your ears as chewed down on the car but obviously displeased with the taste she drops it down to the ground with a crash. With the car destroyed she gazes down to the house in front of her.

Outstretching her hands she places them on the roof of the house before slowly applying more pressure. You could hear the house creak as her paws eventually broke through. Dust flowed from the hole in the roof as she felt around the house with her massive paws. Eventually she retracts a hand and you're shocked to see she picked up another human, a man to be precise. You watched on with dread as he wriggled to no effect in her strong paws. Your raccoon was never so mischievous as to actually hurt a person but at this size you had no idea what she would do. You got your answer quickly as her head tilted upward and the paw clutching the man hovered over her mouth. You didn't actually register what she was doing until he dropped down into the raccoons mouth and disappeared with a loud gulp.

You were in complete shock. As much as you wanted to yell at your raccoon she seems to have forgotten about your shrunken form sitting on the length of her muzzle and the fear of her new predatory behavior kept you silent. Instead you just stayed there and watched as she moved back onto the street, knocking over a small roadside tree and crushing a parked car with her paw. This was really a horrible day. You think it couldn't get any worse but the raccoon giantess suddenly stops in her tracks, groaning as a familiar rumble echoes from her stomach. Yep. It was about to get worse.
111122212221211212212111121.title: Neighborhood Menace

choices: A human. She gains intelligence and speech.
111122212221211212212111122.content:
Her body changes to take on the traits from a different animal. The changes could be drastic or minor, effecting either her appearance or mannerisms.

What animal does she gain traits from?
111122212221211212212111122.title: She gains traits from another animal

1111222122212112122121112.content:
Once again you're swept off your feet as the bear-sized raccoon grabs you, holding your small body between two fingers. You feel yourself rise up as she moves you to the entrance of the beaker that contains the antidote. She then lowers you slowly to the huge pool of liquid below you. As your feet make contact with the water she lets go and you find yourself completely submerged in the liquid. You thrash about and actually find that your feet touch the bottom of the beaker. It was working! As your raccoon sets you and the beaker down on the table you find that you can step out of it. Having absorbed most of the liquid, it only takes a few minutes before your sitting on the edge of the lab table at roughly your original size.

Overjoyed at being back to your old self you throw yourself at your raccoon and embrace her in a big hug. You look up at her as she wraps her strong arms around you, chattering happily. Sitting on her hind legs she was still a few heads taller than you, something that you could easily fix now that you were back to normal. However as you bury your face into her warm fluffy chest, you think that it might be nice having a giant and loyal pet raccoon.
1111222122212112122121112.title: Good End

11112221222121122.content: Sadly, the raccoon seems to really enjoy the taste of the tiny human, having never tasted anything like it before. After sucking on her catch for a little longer, she finally starts chewing...
11112221222121122.title: Bad end

111122212221212.content:
With a shock, you realize your raccoon seriously misunderstood the order you gave her. Instead of bringing you to your lab, she brought you to your Lab-- as in, your Yellow Lab, Star.

The dog is lying in her bed in the room you'd set aside for her and her fellow dogs and cats. The others are gone (except the cat, who is still sleeping and oblivious to everything), and you're alone in there with the raccoon and the dog. The raccoon, not knowing she's messed up, brings you closer to Star's bed, and the dog raises her head to see what's going on. You're about to shout at the raccoon to run and get you away from the dog, but you know it's no use. Star is faster and could catch you and the raccoon, and she probably would start chasing if the raccoon ran away. So, you just hope Star recognizes you, as the raccoon carries you over to her.

The raccoon carefully places you on the ground close to Star's bed, and stands up onto her hind legs, looking down at you. You're focused on Star, though. The dog is bigger than the raccoon, and you realize with fear that she seems able to fit your whole body in her mouth. You gulp, and turn towards the raccoon, wanting to tell her how she's messed up, but you know it wouldn't do any good. You just hope her mistake doesn't get you killed.

You turn back to face Star, who's been staring at you the whole time, wondering why the racoon brought her this tiny creature. You walk forward, somehow overcoming you fear by telling yourself that she's your dog and should recognize you, and begin talking, calling Star by her name and telling her who you are. Star seems to recognize your voice, and leans her head towards you, sniffing you. Her inhalations almost knock you off balance, but you remain standing, and Star moves her head back slightly, seeming to be considering your scent.

You fall silent and stare up at the gigantic dog, hoping she remembers your voice and smell... otherwise, you're in the perfect position to be made into a snack...
111122212221212.title: It's the lab!?

1111222122212121.content:
Finally, Star lets out a whimper, and lowers her head down, hanging it off the edge of her bed and getting her snout close to you. You take this as a nonhostile action, and pat her nose, calling her a good girl. She parts her jaws, making you worried, but only begins panting lightly. The humid air reminds you how close you are to becoming her chew toy, and makes you step back a few paces--as if that will help if she turns hostile and decides to snap you up in her jaws.

Well, you've somehow managed to befriend two giants now. You look back at the raccoon, who is still watching you, as if waiting for your next move. You're surprised at her intelligence and restraint--not only did she (kind of) understand your orders, she also gave you up to the dog instead of keeping you for herself, thinking that's what you wanted. You're glad that she's like that, and think about how to pay her back later. For now, though, you still need to get to your actual laboratory, and you've got two options for how to do it now: the raccoon standing right behind you, or the Yellow Lab lying down right in front of you. The raccoon might be better to be carried by, since she actually has hands, but the Lab is bigger and potentially safer to be with. Which do you choose?
1111222122212121.title: She seems to act friendly

1111222122212122.content: Unfortunately, the Yellow Lab doesn't seem to recognize the scent or sound of her master. Instead, she sees a tiny speck that could potentially taste good. She leans her head forward, licking up the tiny human and tasting for a bit, before deciding the taste isn't the best. Nonetheless, it's food, and she swallows anyway.
1111222122212122.title: Bad end

choices: Luna doesn't notice that the raccoon has you, and keeps walking
111122212222.content:
You hear clacking and clicking, likeappears paws walking on the hard surface of the floor of the room you're in. Something's approaching, and your raccoon knows it too. She looks around and sniffs the air, bringing you close to her chest and holding you close to keep you safe. Clearly, she's worried. And you start to be worried too when around the corner, from the next room, comes your female husky, Luna.

The white-furred and blue-eyed giantess, much bigger than the raccoon, enters the room and stops, looking down at the raccoon with interest. You have many pets in your house, and they all get along most of the time, but you know that they sometimes compete for your affection. At normal human size, that's no problem. But when you're small enough to get squished by either one of them, you're in a lot of danger should they start fighting over who gets your attention.

Luna might just pass you two by, not even spotting you at all. But... If Luna sees you, you will be in a lot of trouble. If Luna thinks you're a bug or other bit of vermin, she'll attack you, but even if she recognizes you as her master, she might attack anyway in order to take you away from the raccoon, and that might lead to you getting hurt.

Either way, this might not turn out well...
111122212222.title: Luna appears

choices: Another animal appears! They just keep coming...
You can't think of anything, and decide to search the house for any clues
1111222122221.content:
Luna stares down at the raccoon, who keeps her back turned to her (wisely, as it keeps you hidden). You can't see clearly, but you presume Luna continues to stare at the raccoon for a bit, before deciding she has better things to do. You hear her turn and leave the room. You sigh in relief, and thank your raccoon for not turning around and showing you to Luna, which she replies to by growling happily. Luna is a bit mischievous and playful, and you are not sure she would treat you gently if she caught you at this size.

Now that Luna has gone, you can continue what you were going to do originally: figuring out how you shrunk. You start thinking, but as you do...
1111222122221.title: Luna doesn't notice that the raccoon has you

choices: Your Yellow Lab, Star, comes around the corner and sees you
The otter starts chasing you, having scared off the raccoon
11112221222211.content:
You think and think but make no headway. Suddenly, though, you're distracted from your thoughts by approaching steps. You're not sure what's making them, but you quickly get your answer. From around the corner, into the room walks your pet otter, yet another of your exotic pets. Like the raccoon, she has no name, but unlike the raccoon, has always been troublesome. She would likely see you as a toy if she saw you.

And unfortunately, she already has. She came into the room the opposite side Luna did, meaning she saw you immediately, as the raccoon was facing that way. And her reaction is enough to startle you and the raccoon too.

She freezes for a moment, then barks and charges. The raccoon takes a step back, stumbles, and drops you. You hit the floor hard, and see the raccoon fleeing as the otter chases after her, barking. You get to your feet, and thinking fast, run the opposite direction. Unfortunately, this doesn't end well for you, because after running for a little bit...
11112221222211.title: Another animal appears! They just keep coming...

111122212222111.content: The dog comes around the corner to see a small speck on the ground. Being hungry, she jumps at the opportunity to get a snack, scooping the morsel up into her maw. The dog moves her catch around with her tongue, tasting it closely. It seems to be moving around, almost as if it is struggling, but she barely feels it. She doesn't recognize its taste, but decides it seems like it might make a good enough snack. She swallows without a second thought...
111122212222111.title: Bad end

choices: Luckily, she doesn't, and starts acting gentle to you
111122212222112.content:
You run as fast as you can, but you hear steps behind you, and know you're being chased. Worse, you're being caught up to. And even worse, you suddenly trip and fall flat on your face with a grunt. The steps slow down and stop, and you roll over to see the otter towering over you.

You got her as a baby from a scientist wanting to study how an otter could be raised in captivity, but your attempts to raise her well must have failed. She often disobeys you and is very troublesome. This des not bode well now especially, considering you're now tiny compared to her. In fact, you think you're about the same scale compared to her as you are compared to the raccoon--the perfect size to be held in her paw, at least. The reason that comes to mind is because that's what she immediately does.

Her left paw twitches a bit, and you glance at it before looking back up at her dark eyes. You seem to notice a glint of playfulness in them, then see her paw reach out to you. Seeing as the raccoon already picked you up, this is not a new experience to you. But it scares you regardless, and you still haven't gotten over the novelty of it. Her paw hovers over your body as you lie on your back, staring at the paw. It is less humanlike than a raccoon hand, but still has a similar shape, and even has a thumb. Your otter has used it before to pickup small things, and now,she's going to treat you to a first person view of what that is like.

Her paw quickly slams down, the pawpad squishing into you. You wince, but feel no pain. Then, the clawed digits begin to curl, wrapping around your body and moving between you and the floor. She squeezes you, getting a sense for your fragility, then lifts you up towards her face. You're held before her (admittedly very cute) face, but you can't feel that it's cute when it's bigger than you, and belongs to an animal that might hurt you. After all, she has you in her fist, which is probably the worst place for you to be. She has total control over you, and unlike the raccoon, never really did seem to like you that much.

She stares at you intently, squeezing you over and over, either out of playfulness or to test how squishy you are. You don't bother to squirm--it would be useless to resist the otter, especially when she already has you in her grasp. You just hope she doesn't dislike you enough to hurt you...
111122212222112.title: The otter's catch

1111222122221121.content: The otter continues squeezing the tiny creature. Despite the struggles of her catch, she keeps squeezing until it suddenly stops struggling and goes limp. A bit surprised, she nonetheless decides to not waste this morsel, and stuffs the tiny thing into her maw as a snack.
1111222122221121.title: Bad end

choices: Tell her to leave you alone
1111222122221122.content:
After a few more squeezes, the otter finally stops and just stares at you. You stare back, gazing into her huge black eyes and wondering what this giant animal is planning to do to you. Suddenly, she brings you closer to her face, and her tongue slips from between her lips, extending out and pushing into your face. You start to squirm as the muscle slides up your face, and begin to cough once it's done.

The otter keeps staring at you as you splutter and try in vain to wipe the drool off your face. You eventually manage to start seeing clear again, and look right back into the eyes of the giant otter girl. The fact that she just tasted you makes you worried, but you try your best to remain confident, despite your bad situation.

Luckily, it seems like this situation is not as bad as you had thought, because the otter suddenly gives a happy bark and carefully sets you down on the ground. She takes a few steps back, and continues watching you. You realize that she's probably recognized your taste, and doesn't want to eat her master. Instead, she decided to let you go. That surprises you, but you're happy she didn't choose to just eat you instead.

Of course, the question now becomes what do you do next? You've got a giant female otter standing over you, and she seems to be awaiting your orders or something. Your could probably try to get her to help you find out how you shrunk, but if you don't want her help, you could always just tell her to leave and hope that she follows your order. It's up to you.
1111222122221122.title: Otter friend

1111222122222.content: Luna sees what she recognizes as her master in the hands of the raccoon, and with a bark, lunges, trying to get her master away from the raccoon. The raccoon dodges, but is hit with a glancing blow, and drops the tiny human from her clutches. Still dazed, the human feels no pain as Luna turns and runs towards the raccoon again, accidentally stepping on him, blinded by her desire to attack the raccoon...
1111222122222.title: Bad end

111122223.content: Hmmm..... How about a small dog?
111122223.title: Other animal?

1111222231.content: Okay, which kind of small dog do you want?
1111222231.title: Yeah

11112222312.content: Others to choose from are:
11112222312.title: Other

111122223123.content: We got some more choices for you.
111122223123.title: Other small dogs

choices: Yes, and he stops right in front of you.
1111222231231.content:
As you get out of bed to see the all new giant world around you, you hear footsteps coming from the other room.

"Oh right, Sunny must be up right now" you think, as you decide to say hello to your now giant boy. As you walk into the living room, you see Sunny rubbing his back on the rug.

Hey, Sunny. Over here" You yell, hoping to get his attention. Right when you said his name, Sunny stopped what he was doing, got up, and started running towards your general direction.

But as soon as he gets closer to you, it doesn't seem he sees you at all, instead, it looks like he's about to trample you.

Your heart starts pumping as you yell out "DOWN HERE SUNNY!"

Does the pug notice you?

Bart seems to notice him... or rather, motion out of his eye. He turned to look at the '?' moving across the floor. Bart was afraid of it because he did not know what it was, but he knew what would get rid of it! He lifted a paw and set it on the dot.

does it kill him, or not.
1122121.title: oh no ! he spots him !

11222.content:
Jim turned back, and found...not much of anything at all. Perhaps the house had creaked, or one of the other pets he owned was making some sort of ungodly noise. At any rate, he continues onward to search out the house from a smaller perspective. Any ameteur scientist would know how big the opportunities are when doing this sort of thing.

Jim's stride was quite the small one. It took him a few minutes to reach a fork in his own house. I don't mean an actual fork as in the utensil, I mean a split path as to where he could go next. The miniscule man thought it over, and made his decision quickly. "I'll go..."
11222.title: A Noise and a Fork

112221.content:
Thinking of his stomach first, Jim heads to the kitchen, and then realizes the momentous task ahead of him. Even he, who could think of many ways to do a very simple task, was hard pressed to think of a way to gather food at his size.

Sighing in desperation when he couldn't think of a solution, he had thoughts of just leaving the area and going back. This was soon put on hold as his faithful dog, Bartholomev, made his way to the kitchen and over to his bowl. It quickly made him realize that tinkering with his machine had left him with no time to feed the dog. His quick thinking also left him feeling very vulnerable to the hungry canine. At this point, it seemed like size definitely mattered, and he had to feed the dog somehow. He thought and looked around, and found a way to get up to the countertop where the dog food laid.
112221.title: Forget something, Jim?

1122211.content:
In a series of what would only be considered some of the best stunt actions by an ameteur scientist, Jim climbs up a chair leg, the rest of the table leg, and with a bit of intellectual fortitude, launches himself to the countertop via a really cool physics lesson. Well, the application of that lesson, anyway.

After a bit of a rough landing, the tiny scientist hobbles over to the big ol' dog food bag, and uses every ounce of his power to drag it. This takes 10 minutes to get it from the edge of the countertop to an area where he thinks the food bowl is below. He then pushes over the bag, and the food starts pouring out. The dog perks up, and trots over to his bowl...did he reach the bowl, though, or is this pouring all over the floor? He leans and checks the food pouring...
1122211.title: Feeding Bartholomev

11222111.content:
Pondering whether or not the food is reaching the bowl, Jim leans over and checks to see where the food is going. It seemed to be doing just fine, quite the good accuracy for being so small. While he mused to himself, a few rogue kibbles hit him. The sudden shock throws him off of the counter, and into the dog food bowl, which now procedes to pile on the food, covering him in it, and burying him in it. His thoughts turn to desperation again, but he can do nothing under the steadily increasing weight. It stops moments later, and Jim can hear the dog's jaws going to work on the food. He felt powerless under the sheer volume of dog food. After some time, the jaws sounded painfully close, but then, it stopped. A reprieve?

Yes, but only for a water break. He heard the dog slurping up water, and took the time to think what he knew to be his final thoughts. The dog was big, yes, but would he actually eat all of this food? The answer was only obvious to the dog as it came back over and began munching again on the dry food. There was a breakthrough, and the dog's slobbering maw kept on chowing down around him, and soon, Jim was drawn into the maw.

The result of this, I'm sad to say, wasn't good for our minisule hero. In what would considered to be a sickening display of canid carnivoracity, the dog just kept on eating, barely noticing the other crunchy little treat it had in with the food. Ouch. Eek. Oof. Definitely not good for Jim. I don't think I should have to say much more on this.
11222111.title: Feeding Bartholomev, quite literally.

choices: Try to find some food for Jim.
11222112.content: Demonstrating a use of common sense, Jim moves a short distance away from the rapidly pouring food, and checks to see whether he aimed properly. He has, and the dog begins happily muching his food. He pats himself on the back for a job well done, and lifts the food up when there is more than enough to feed his canine companion, simply letting it go to the other side. For a while, he simply sat and observed his dog feeding and periodically going for water. He could hear the big, slippery slurps and the strong gulps the dog took to get the water into his stomach. It always sort of fascinated him, but to his scale, it was an even better listen. After the dog took his final gulp of water, it promptly left the room, leaving Jim in the kitchen alone once again. His stomach grumbled, and directed him forward again...as tiny as he is, the man needs to eat!
11222112.title: Feeding the Dog

112221121.content:
Hunger getting the best of him, he continued down the counter, musing that he hadn't bothered to put out any food earlier. He soon reached the end of the counter, where his pantry was just a few feet away.

He pondered on what he could do to open the large wooden doors when he noticed a small crack in the door, just big enough to squeeze in. With that covered, all he had to do was find a way over to the door.

Looking around he found two possible ways to get there. A yardstick lay a few feet away, which he could position and use as a plank to cross. Another choice was to try to use some yarn to snag the pantry handle and swing over. What should he do?
112221121.title: Pantry Issues

choices: Bartholomew is bored and wants to play with his new 'toy.'
1122211211.content:
Upon thinking that using string to abseil wasn't the best idea, Jim ventured along the counter towards the yard stick. He stood there, estimating how far he'd have to push the stick to make a bridge stable enough to support his own weight. He didn't know whether this would work or whether it would fail, but he gulped and started pushing the yard stick towards the pantry. Half way through, Jim realised the incredible weight the stick now had compared to his tiny, weak body. He couldn't keep the stick in mid air and it fell from the counter and onto the floor. A banging noise rang through the room...

Jim was now injured, the fall had done a good amount of damage to his leg and he now couldn't get up. He tried crawling towards the pantry, but this was to no avail as two giant paws blocked his way. Jim yelped, fearing the worse.
1122211211.title: Use the yardstick.

112222.content:
He turns towards the hallway and begins walking through there. He marvels at the scope of such a narrow area at his size. Small creatures must feel so insignificant from here, he thinks as he strolls the long distance to his room. He stops for a moment and turns to another door, slightly cracked open. His vastly curious mind pulls at him...

"...the pet room."

From here, it seemed almost like suicide to any common man. Jim was what one would call the uncommon man. He always enjoyed the chore of caring for animals, and feeding time felt special to him, but not for any specific reason. Again, he had another decision to make, and with some hesitance, he heads for...
112222.title: "...the pet room."

choices: Investigate the husky from the inside?
1122221.content: The door to Jim's bedroom was slightly open making to easy for him to get inside. He looks up towards his bed and sees his beloved pet husky sleeping on it. Jim begins to wonder if he should let his sleeping dog lie or climb up onto the bed and investigate his pet. After all he's always wanted to see what's on the inside.
1122221.title: ...his own bedroom.

11222212.content: Deciding to investigate what his pet was on the inside, Jim approached the husky, seeing as it was fast asleep, he made his way up onto the bed.. but which end does jim decide to enter? and furthermore, what gender IS his husky?
11222212.title: Dog Lover

112222121.content: As you approach your husky Hunter, which end do you go to?
112222121.title: Male

1122221212.content: Which one? Ass or penis?
1122221212.title: Ass/Penis

11222212122.content:
Jim slowly walked over to his husky's sleeping form. He watched as the dog's chest rose and fell with his steady breathing. Jim's attention was soon drawn to the husky's sheath and balls. Jim had always been making excuses why he didn't get his dog neutered and he felt a little glad about that decision now.

Jim's small three inch form was just able to reach the sheath, starting to rub it and feel the warm coming from it. Jim heard the slightest of whimpers coming from his husky as he noticed some movement in the sheath. It wasn't long before the pink head started to slide out. Jim felt compelled to keep going as he started to gently stroke the emerging cock, even kissing it. In less than a minute the cock, along with the knot had fully emerged from the sheath. But what now?
11222212122.title: Penis

112222122.content: Your loyal Husky Star who was always there at your side is now sleeping on your bed. Which end do you investigate?
112222122.title: Female

1122221221.content: You move to up to Stars head which is wide open. Its begging to be explored. You inch closer and closer until you accidentally trip over Stars tongue which was hanging out of her mouth. You land face first on to it. Causing Star to bring her tongue into her mouth and close her jaws sending you into darkness. As you are laying on her tongue it begins to move around. Star is tasting you and she apparently likes you. She flicks her tongue back to her esophagus sending you down it. It squeezes you tightly as it slowly sends you into her awaiting stomach. As you are deposited into her stomach you notice that there is no digestive juices in it. You start to explore this amazing organ as Star continues to sleep not knowing what she has eaten. To be honest she doesn't know you're in there at all. Let's just hope she doesn't wake up. After a few minutes of exploring you come across a small hole which leads to her intestines. Do you go explore the intestines or do you just want to stay in the stomach for a while longer and risk being digested if Star wakes up.
1122221221.title: Head

1122222.content:
"Aw, what the heck?" Jim felt adventerous, even more so than usual. Heck, he already shrank himself down. Why not go visit the pets at a size where he doesn't intimidate them?

Jim slips through the door's crack and enters the beloved room, full of pets. Luckily for him, all in cages. He could visit them at his own leisure rather than provoking them all over to him at once just by this reduced presence. Each cage had a small latch where he could release the animal for testing if he needed to. Through these small latches he could enter the animal's enclosure and visit with them.

"This could really be a great experience!" he says to himself. He notices all of the animals seem to have their gazes piercing him now. Where to go first?
1122222.title: Welcome to the Pet Room

choices: Move on to the next cage.
11222221.content:
Who in their right mind would choose the left side? Well, Jim of course. Naturally being a lefty, he inclines to head on over to the left side.

Several cages await him, and each of the animals looks him over as he comes into view. It's not but a short climb up to the left table, bearing 3 cages. The first one he stands next to contains a hamster. It stops running on its wheel and pads over to the edge of its cage, examining Jim and looking him over. The entrance was just a few feet away, and the hamster seems friendly, curious, even playful. What will Jim do?
11222221.title: <-- Go Left

112222211.content: R U Sure ABout that?
112222211.title: Enter the hamster cage.

choices: Move on to the next cage.
112222212.content:
He sighs, not being all that fascinated with hamsters. They made good pets, but they didn't seem all that interesting to him. The hamster watches Jim as he moves on to the next cage.

Housed inside this enclosure is a large snake, a boa constrictor in fact. The snake appears to be fairly inactive, just lazing around in its cage. Each coil demonstrates its awesome power, and the snake stretches to around 17 feet...at least, that's what Jim had in his notes about the animal. The tiny hinge door where Jim slipped in rats happened to open inward, and should Jim choose to visit the snake, he could slip in very easily...and the only problem would be that he could not get out the same way if things got sticky. Jim thinks it over very carefully, and after much deliberation, he makes his decision.
112222212.title: What's in Cage #2?

1122222121.content:
Whether it was an intense fascination with snakes as a child, or his focus on certain snake aspects in his research, Jim was interested enough with snakes to want to be with one, slipping through the cage's enterance with little second thought.

The snake, suddenly interested at the activity in its cage, perks up, flicks its tongue a few times, and turns its head to the tiny scientist. The mammoth snake easily outweighed Jim, and it looked as if the snake was about to prove it. Taking several slow slithers towards the small human, Jim's heart races, and the big snake begins making its way around him. His worst fear was being realized, and the snake was becoming true to its name, constricting him further...and fuerther...every breath he took tightened the snake's grip. The pain overcame him, and he simply fell unconcious...

He awakened, and found his waist was deep into the maw of the snake, which appeared to be suckling on his body! The snake found its prey to be moving around, and quickly took the rest into its maw, beginning to gulp him down gradually. The muscles rippled all around him, and they were simply too powerful to even fathom heading back. Finally, he reached a room where the muscles stopped moving him. He was trapped in the belly of his own beloved snake. Had he still any time to jot notes, he would be noting the snake's sudden change in loyalty in relation to the owner's sudden change in size. This, however, would be the last time he could make a witty thought like that as the acids quickly went to work on him. He writhed in pain as he felt his skin dissolve, and now this pain too would finally overtake him. This knockout would be permanent...

The snake, having caught some intrusive little prey item, satisfied its hunger for at least the next 4 days. It went back to its usual camp spot and slept peacefully while its contents were being processed...poor Jim.
1122222121.title: Jim and the Boa's Belly

1122222122.content: Being with the snake could get Jim eaten easily, so he decided to go on to the next cage. This one got a rabbit in it. It's eating some grass that Jim put in yesterday. A rabbit won't probably eat him. In fact, it's very cute and huge! Jim think about it, and decided to...
1122222122.title: Bunny

11222221222.content: Right past the bunny Jim was currently keeping a baby alligator he found.

choices: Jim goes to the next cage
Jim hears a cage open in another room
112222212222.content: After the baby alligator, Jim looks into the cage of the chinchilla he rescued from a bad owner. It looked so soft and fluffy.

Jim knew that on the left side he left pets that were closer to his actual height now as in hamsters, and snakes while the right side had much larger animals like some stay dogs and cats he had found, or was given to him by friends while they were on vacation to take care of. Looking over at the rows and rows of cages he had on the right side of the room Jim had to choose of seeing the cats that he had or the dogs that he was taken care of.
Which line of cages should Jim go to?
11222222.title: The right side

112222221.content:
Jim decided that he would go and explore his cats, as he didn't know what the dogs would do to him.
He has 2 cats in the cages.

The first one is Shane, he is 9 years old. Shane is a blech white cat, well sometimes anyways. Jim adopted him from the humain society a few years ago. When he was there he was named Pork-Chop. He never found out why he was named that, but he thinks it has to do with something about the fact that he was the only cat that was good with dogs. Shane is a hunter and he may not be the smartest chooice.

Next there is Tink, or Tinkerbell. She is a nice hearted cat, kind of a "pussy" if you ask Jim. She is a Black cat with spots, or rather patches, of brown and is white underneith. She is about 2 now. Jim got her when she was born. She is easy to ammuse and gets scared easy.

Who do you choose?
112222221.title: Cats

1122222211.content:
You know its not the smartest choice, but your curiosity gets the best of you and you soon find yourself heading for Shanes cage. You stop at the front and peek in. At the far end of the cage, is a mountainous lump of fur. He was curled in a ball, his back facing the front of the cage. Clumps of fur are also scattered across the cage floor.

This would be a great opportunity to explore a cats cage, wouldn't it?
1122222211.title: Shane?

112222222.content:
Jim was more of a dog person so he started up the row that held all the dogs he was taken care of. As he move past the cages some dogs barked, some growled, some whined while others just sat the and looked at him. Thanking what ever chance that he still was wearing his lab coat while he pulled out a paper and pen that had shrunk with him to take notes on the dogs' various behaviors as he walked in front of their cages. There were two dogs that really caught his attention one was Skit a male Great Dane that was usually very affectionate yet when he passed his cage the Skit just sat the staring at him, and Bruno, a male Golden Lab, who was usually very mean to every one even him was now barking happily at him. Deciding that this could take some further study Jim decided to get closer maybe into one of their cages to see further reactions.
Who does he study more Skit or Bruno?
112222222.title: Dog  study.

choices: Backs up between the wiring and into Skit's cage
Jumps off the ledge onto the floor to investigate
1122222221.content:
Standing a foot from Skit's cage, a few dozen feet for the shrunken man, Jim notices the brindle colored Dane seems listless. Like a great barge, the canine is reclining in a lake of cage shavings. The dog's head leans against the side of the cage, eyes half closed. Puzzled, Jim pulls out his clipboard.

"Of course." muttering to himself, "Skit was given a mild sedative for today's experiment." Chuckling, Jim recalls that Skit had been picked to be the 'guinea pig' for the shrinking laser. The same malfunctioning device that had shrunk Jim instead.

Apparently, the sedative seemed to have reacted strongly for the great Dane. Jim walks towards the ledge in front of the cage. Putting his clipboard in a coat pocket, he boosts himself up the yard high ledge and finds himself against the fist sized bars, the spacing between the 'wires' is more than wide enough for him to walk through if he chooses.

Jim spends a few minutes staring upwards at the vast dog. Fascinated by how his shrunken senses are taking in the odors of caged animal, floor shavings and overwhelming scale of living canine. Great, brindle flanks slowly moving like a tide as the vast, half asleep animal breathes. Paws the size of pickup trucks wedged up against the cage wiring.

A loud metallic noise startles Jim. The tiny man turns around, looking for the source. It's appears to come the next cage. It's Bruno pawing at his door, barking loudly. Bruno's paw rattles against the cage door again. The noise is enough to wake Skit.

Startled, Jim does what?
1122222221.title: Let a sleeping dog lie

choices: Skit's drug induced sleepyness kicks in again.
11222222211.content:
Jim backs up, his feet trip up against suitcase sized cage shavings. Off balanced, the tiny man falls backwards and finds himself lying on his back inside Skit's cage. Looking up, Jim sees a visage of nose and snout hovering above. Awake now, Skit realizes something small is in his cage. The reclining dog lowers his head to investigate.

Jim scrambles onto his feet as a vast nose snuffles him.

"Easy Skit, easy boy. Be calm." He says out loud, voice trying not to sound nervous.Jim reaches up to pat Skit's split lips below the nose. Feeling the short bristles of fur as rough as a Brillo pad.

Jim's lab coat flaps around from a gust of snuffling kicking up shavings as he's sniffed. The movement ignites the dog's curiosity. At once, Skit's snout lunges forwards, vast lips part and huge incisors snag Jim's lab coat.

Like a crane, Skit lifts his head. Jim dangles high above the cage floor, gripping his lab coat, trying not to fall. His feet kicking against hanging jowls. Jim's flaying causes his clipboard to slip out and arc away as it falls off to the side. The lost clipboard is the least of his worries as a volcanic grumbling erupts from the Great Dane's neck. Swaying violently, Jim feels his coat starting to rip.

What happens?
11222222211.title: Curious Skit

112222222111.content:
Skit flips his snout, launching Jim up into the air. Jim feels his lab coat rip apart as his vision of ground, cage and ceiling sky dizzily twist round and around. He free falls towards a rushing white fanged cave, landing heavily atop a ribbon of pink. Jim feels the lower jaw hinge upward. Great teeth mesh with a snap as Skit shuts his jaws, trapping the finger sized man inside. Part of the tiny man's lab coat juts between the dog's lips.

Inside a maw reeking of dog breath and drool, Jim squirms against a current of tongue. An attempt as futile as swimming in white water rapids. The tongue flexes as he slickly slides in the dimness. Jim's arms slip out of the lab coat as his feet slide over the back of the tongue. The tiny man's back running over a smooth ceiling of dog palate guiding him down into a throat.

Outside, Skit snaps his jaws again and swallows. Sending a lump down his long, brindle throat.

Confined at all sides by a slickly sliding tube, Jim's horror is held in check by rapt fascination at the sensations of being squeezed rhythmetically. The odors of dog breath become overwhelming as his feet squeeze through a restriction and he slides wetly into a curved chamber. Skit's belly.

Coughing in the acrid, steam hot air, Jim hears the inner workings around him. Noises of vast dog lungs breathing, the bass thumping from the Great Dane's heart. Twitching belly folds heave and gurgle underneath his hands. Slick with juices and the now burning sensation as the dog's digestion begins to work on him. Jim slumps into a wet heap, realizing his days of experimenting are over as consciousness fades away.

Skit's jowls twitch. The Great Dane lowers his head, spitting out a fragment of white cloth and a square, flat object against the cage doorway. A tiny clipboard. The Great Dane curls up to snooze off his medication and snack.

The debris is hardly noticed the next day by Naomi, Jim's housekeeper, before being swept out.
112222222111.title: Toss and catch

choices: Jim decides to let sleeping dogs lie and leave Skit's cage
112222222112.content:
Skit's eyelids close as the dog gives into sleepiness. He slowly and majestically rolls onto his side. Legs jutting out as the drugged dog naps once again. Jim's coat rips and he falls amidst a canine avalanche. The shavings cushion his landing just as the dog's head flumps down next to him. A floppy ear buries Jim like a falling stage curtain.

Scrambling out from under the dog's ear, a disheveled Jim brushes himself off.

"Where's my clipboard!?" He does not treasure the idea of spending the rest of the day digging through Skit's cage looking for it.

Jim waddles through shavings over to Skit's forelegs. He scrambles over the tree trunk thick forelimbs. He sees no sign of the clipboard in the shavings between the dog's legs. Glancing over the huge brindle colored belly and flanks, Jim notices a square object lying atop a Skit's loins. Miraculously, his clipboard has somehow been kicked up to land there.

"It's my lucky day. I'll just fetch it!"

Picking his way through shavings, Jim approaches Skit's belly wall, slowly expanding and contracting from the dog's breathing. Jim halts, thinking of his next move to get atop the sleeping giant dog lying on it's side. Skit's belly is nearly vertical where he stands and the thinning pelt seems too thin easily grip. He walks further down towards a heavily furred cylinder jutting underneath the Great Dane's belly, a vast sheath. It's lower and more heavily furred. And just the right height to use as a foot hold to get on top.

No sense being squeamish. Jim mutters to himself, "Here goes. I hope Skit is not ticklish."

Jim grips the dog's sheath and boosts himself atop it. Nose wrinkling at the odors of male dog all around him. He gingerly grips a strip of fur over a fold of loin like a handhold on a minor cliff and scrambles up and over to lie atop a shallow plateau of dog flank. He crawls over to his clipboard and stuffs in his pocket.

At once, Skit sleepily twitches his hind leg. To Jim, the resulting dog-quake jolts him off his perch as he clumsily slides off a Great Dane's loin, tumbling down the lower belly slope and bouncing off the dog's sheath to land in a heap of shavings.

Coated in a fine slathering of shavings, Jim hauls himself to his feet and does what?
