113221221111211.content:
Nanook's lets off a even deeper, longer snarl and it works! The other dogs stop appraching and bound off another way. Nanook calms down and turns. He heads back the way you came. ''Good boy Nanook''! is all you can say. Nanook whoo's in return and walks on. He turns down a different path and before you know it, your at a hot dog trolley.

It lets off a nice smell. Nanook naturally goes for it, but a man stands before you. Nanook stops with his paws resting either side of the man. ''Leave my stall alone mutt!'' shouts the man. You go to say something when Nanook lowers his muzzle, dropping you by the man. Before you can say a thing Nanook laps up the man and lifts him up in the air. ''Nanook! No bad boy! Put him down!'' you shout. Nanook obeys, but not before covering the man in thick drool.. and removing most of his clothes.

While you help the now near-naked man, nanook calmly walks by and raids the hot dog stand. 'Hey! get away from that - damn dog!'' the man yells, he turns to you. ''Your be paying for that!'' You can't believe that the man is more interested in his hot dogs and profits rather than the fact he's been shrunk along with everybody else. Before you can reply a blinding flash fills your vision. When you can seee again - your back to normal! As is everyone else! Nanook finishes off the last hot dog then happily comes over to you. 'Good boy nanook!' you praise your dog.

You feel a tap on your shoulder. You turn to the hot dog man. He glares at you before holding out his hand. That'll be 200 Dollars please! You reach for you wallet, which is not there, nor are your trousers.

'Err....'
113221221111211.title: All Dogs Gone

11322122112.content: You glanced back. Due to all the shaking and movement it was hard to focus but that black furred blur, which was dramatically reducing the distance between Nanook and itself, seemed dedicated and did not bother with the terrier. "Run boy, run" you scream at the tip of your lung although you weren't sure your husky could hear your words over his patting and the noise of paws slamming into the tarmac as both dogs raced over a suburban road. When you turned your head again, you screamed in horror as the rottweiler caught up enough and…
11322122112.title: Keeps chasing you

113221221121.content:
The Rottweiler leapt up and onto Nanooks back with a snarl it sinks it's teeth into Nanooks thick scruff. Luckily Nanook is a strong dog and can take the Rottweiler's weight, but he whines as it pulls at his scruff. You are clinging on tight to Nanooks muzzle as he tries to shake off the Rottweiler. This angers the Rottweiler, who releases it's fangs and goes to grab Nanooks muzzle! You scream as the Rottweilers huge mouth comes right at you!

Luckily, this move has given Nanook the chance to throw off the Rottweiler. With one quick leap Nanook lifts up into the air and the Rottweiler is thrown into a nearby car. Nanook again runs, getting away from the now knocked out Rottweiler. Nanook takes you down many streets before finally stopping at...
113221221121.title: leapt on

choices: The rottweiler is staring at it's new prey.
The rottweiler is still focused on the malamute, not noticing you on it's muzzle
113221221122.content:
The rottweiler bites Nanook in the leg. Your trusty malamute throws his head up in pain, effectively tossing you skyward. You flail your arms wildly as you sail through the air. Eventually, you end up on the rottie's muzzle.

         Finally noticing your position you open your eyes, which were previously closed. Has the dog noticed you?
113221221122.title: Flung Off

1132212211221.content:
The rottweiler's wild brown eyes are locked right on you like a heat seeking missile. You stare a one another for what feels like an eternity. Suddenly, you sense a shift underneath you. You notice that what you feel is the rottweiler unlocking it's jaws from Nanook's leg. You look towards your dog with pleading eyes, but find no help coming from your malamute. He has been too injured from the rottie bite to do anything, assuming if he even noticed you missing. Suddenly, you feel the familiar feeling of being tossed into the air. It is difficult to make anything out as you are constantly doing somersaults, but unfortunately you can see the dogs wide open maw below you. Time tends to slow as you begin your dissent towards the cavernous tomb. Eventually, you land on something soft and slimy.

         The sudden end of movement dazes you for a second. As you start to recover from your whiplash, you notice that the rottweiler's jaws have snapped shut, trapping you inside. It pushes you against it's hard palate with it's tongue, tasting you. The sheer strength of the muscle makes you feel like all your bones are being crushed. You are moved back and forth against both the hard and soft palate as the rottweiler attempts to taste every little bit of your delicious, salty body. The teeth part, and you are then moved to the inside of the dog's cheek. The white molars are fairly dull, but the strength of the canine's jaw is enough to at least break your legs. By either a miracle or curse depending on one's opinion, though you are constantly moved from either side of the mouth and chewed on, the rottweiler's teeth do not break anything vital. You are still alive as the rottweiler's tongue ripples, and moves you to the back of it's throat. You vaguely see the uvula pass through the darkness of the maw and the haze of your fading conciseness. Outside, the rottweiler feels you slide down it's thick neck, and down towards it's waiting stomach.
1132212211221.title: You are next on the rottie's menu.

choices: Nanook leaves you behind and flees.
1132212211222.content:
You stare at the dark, furry surface underneath your body. Absolutely horrified, you attempt to stand up, just to fall down again with the Rottweiler's next movement. In the corner of your eye, you see Nanook whining and wincing in pain. The fight goes on, as the Rottweiler mercilessly pounces on your beloved malamute. You close your eyes and hold on as strong as possible. You're shaken up badly, your body dashed onto and off the muzzle - but miraculously, you manage to hold on. All you hear is angry snarling, growling and whimpering, while dreading that your loyal pet and only protector remains hopelessly inferior.

After some more tormenting moments, the movement ceases abruptly. Your torso is bruised from being knocked onto the snout multiple times, which probably broke a few of your ribs. Your hands hurt. And Nanook is probably dead. But as soon as you open your eyes again, you are surprised. It's a draw! The two dogs stand opposite of each other, slowly backing off. Blood drips from Nanooks leg and side. Without hesitation, you crawl towards the Rottweiler's nose, trying to draw your dogs attention. With a begging look, you flail an arm and cry for help.

Fortunately, you are noticed! Unfortunately, by both dogs. Behind your back, the Rottie's gigantic eyes fixate on you instantly.

There is no way you can defend yourself now that you're exposed. Without Nanook's help, you are doomed. However, with attacking again, Nanook would risk his dear life.
Assessing his options, your Malamute remains undecided, as you tremble with deadly terror - knowing that he was deciding over your life or death.

"Nanook, PLEASE, help me! Don't let him kill me!"

What does Nanook do?
1132212211222.title: The Dogfight

choices: He keeps you in his maw for protection.
11322122112221.content:
Courage and loyalty sparks in Nanook's eyes. There's no way he will let you die like this. Exposing his teeth, he leaps towards the Rottweiler, ready to fight for your life. With no further hesitation, he charges and dashes right into the surprised dog, pushing you from the huge muzzle. As you fly through the air, the malamute gets a hold of the Rottweiler's throat, drilling his teeth into it. A wail of pain is emitted, followed by a dull impact. In a matter of seconds, your dog has defeated the assailant. Quickly sprinting in your direction, Nanook jumps and catches you in his mouth, his soft tongue cushioning your fall. All that Frisbee training finally paid off! Keeping you inside his mouth, Nanook keeps on running. The Rottweiler should still be alive, but too injured to take up the chase.

Ironically, while lying inside a canines mouth, this is the first time since the incident you actually feel safe and protected. Your dog risked his life just to save his tiny, bug-sized master. The sheer panic of the last minutes slowly fades, and even Nanook's walking starts to become more calm and relaxed. Some steps later, the mouth is opened slightly, and the tongue moves towards the exit. You cower on the tongue's tip as it's drawn outside. Upon reaching fresh air, You see your dog's huge lips and nose, and the two eyes, vigilantly observing you. Overwhelmed by gratitude, you smile and huddle up against the pink muscle.

"Thank you! Thank you! Nanook, you're a good boy! You- you saved my life!"

Although he hardly understood any of your words, he is happy to hear your voice and wags his tail in excitement. The area around you seems safe and quiet. Exhausted by the intense fighting, the malamute lays down, still keeping you on the tongue, that was now hanging out of his mouth. You can't help but to notice something has changed in his behavior. He handles you with greater care than before, fearing you could be harmed again. But wouldn't he even release you from his mouth?
11322122112221.title: Guard Dog

choices: He keeps on playing with you in his mouth.
11322122112222.content:
Before you can even finish your plea, Nanook turns around and runs for his life, abandoning you. He vanishes through some bushes, causing you to tear up in agony. As soon as the dog is gone, your perception shifts rapidly. All feeling is sucked out of your body, and the only sounds reaching your ears are your heartbeat and slow, panicky breathing.

Suddenly, the Rottweiler's tongue is drawn from one side of the muzzle, reaching for you. You scarcely dodge it with a dive, just to be trapped as the tongue comes from the other side. Held between the hard snout, and the soft, wet blanked atop of your naked body, you barely manage to grasp what's about to happen.

"No, no, no! NO! PLEASE! This can't be happening!!"

Ignoring your pitiful screaming, The thin, slick muscle scoops you up and slowly draws you back inside the dog's mouth.

Crying in fear, you watch the massive dog's jaws shut slowly. You're welcomed by a series of licks. The tongue wraps around you, slightly lifting you up while licking you from all sides. After a few seconds you are coated with warm dog slobber. After that, you are pressed against the Rottweiler's palate, as the tongue moves along your back. You can do nothing but to whine and scream in horror.

Especially after the fight, the Rottweiler enjoys teasing and tormenting his former challenger's best friend. You are a trophy. And a snack at the same time.

When will the dog get tired of playing with his food?
11322122112222.title: Bye, Master! Hello, Tongue!

113221221122221.content:
The rottweiler decides to toy with his catch a bit more before moving on. You soon find yourself off the rottie's tongue, and lying on the ground. Opening your eyes, you seen your captor looming above you in a play bow stance. He stares at you expectantly, but you don't move, too scared and confused to even shift your uncomfortable position. Eventually, he grows bored of your idle stance, and decides to egg on a more interesting response. He moves his muzzle even closer to your puny body, and lets out an earsplitting bark. You fall back a few feet from the noise equal to a jet engine, and reopen your eyes to see the rottweiler baring his fangs, inches from your face and growling.

This terrifying action prompts you to flee from the dog, and you run in mindless terror from the giant fangs. While running, you start to notice that the rottweiler is not giving chase like you would have thought. Confused, you look behind you, and soon wish you hadn't. Seems like the canine was just giving you enough distance to make the chase more fun. He starts to pursue you with his tongue lazily pooling out from the other side of his mouth. For some reason, you carry your legs faster, despite knowing your captor has complete control over the situation. soon the inevitable happens, and the dog catches up to you. He lets out a bark of excitement, as he is soon going to catch up to his somehow even more enjoyable snack.

However, all the action and noise has attracted something nearby. Right as you feel the rottie on top of you, you hear an unfamiliar bark. Both you, and your pursuer turn to look at the cause of this settlement. There is a german shepherd that is huge, even to normal standards. She bares her fangs, and charges the rottie. The rottweiler is still seriously injured from his fight with Nanook, and knows he stands no chance with this next challenger. Begrudgingly, he flees from the shepherd, leaving you behind. You'd like to be relieved, but spotting the big dog does little to levitate your fears

The question is, does the german shepherd spot you?
113221221122221.title: Don't play with your food

choices: Uses you as a sex toy
1132212211222211.content:
As the German Shepard turns around she looks down and spots you. You stand there in fear as you watch the Shepard lick her lips and walk towards you. Well this is great, you say to yourself. First the Rottie and now the Shepard. You turn and try to bolt to get away from the Shepard but she was faster than you. With a sweep of her paw she knocks you to the ground and pins you underneath it.
         With her paw now pressed on top of your tiny body you were at her mercy. She was at least gentle with you and didn't crush you instantly. Instead she was playing with you. She laid down on the ground and brought her head down towards you, licking you across your face, slathering you in saliva. Once she get's your taste that was it. She continued to lick you more and more, coating you in a thick layer of saliva and soon you were pulled into her hot, carnivorous maw. Her warm sticky breath flowing all around you. She rolls you around inside her maw, tossing you back and forth, battering you, weakening you. You were her's now and there was nothing you could do. To her, you were now her toy and she continued to toss you back and forth in her maw, swishing you around, your flavor oozing onto her tongue, she pressed you up against her palette, squeezing more flavor out.
         As soon as it began the battering stops, leaving you panting and gasping for air on the Shepard's tongue. With your body now weakened the Shepard,
1132212211222211.title: Spotted

choices: The rottweiler saw you enter the mastiff's mouth.
The rottweiler didn't notice you; but someone else did.
1132212211222212.content:
Thankfully, the german shepherd seems too engaged with the rottweiler to notice you. The two dogs start fighting, and as interesting as it would be to see two of the nastiest dog breeds go at it, you decide to leave while you can. Thankfully, there are some bushes not too far from where you currently stand. Thinking it's the best route away from the dogs, you run straight through.

However, partway through your trek, you stumble across something you definitely did not want to. You now stand face to face with the fattest english mastiff you have ever seen. Her belly lays spread out among the small clearing like a neighborhood sized water bed. Her jowls are as thick, and laid out in front of you like giant doorways to her gaping muzzle. Fortunately for you, she appears to be sleeping. However, as you prepare to silently move past the dog, you hear a disturbance in the nearby bushes. You let out a gasp at realizing the cause of the disturbance.

Apparently, the rottweiler survived his encounter with the german shepherd, and is looking for his lost prize. You realize to your horror that you have absolutely nowhere to hide before he finds you. Then you turn to the mastiff, and remember the connection you made about her jowls being doorways. You also remember watching a scene in a cartoon a while back; where a cat is chasing a mouse, and the mouse jumps into a sleeping bulldog's jowls to evade his pursuer. These thoughts form into an idea so crazy, that it just might work. As insane as it sounds, you have a better chance of survival inside a sleeping, oblivious dog's mouth than an evil, conscious one's. So, you do the most unexpected action possible for one in your position, and attempt to climb in the mastiff's jowls.

You quickly scurry up to the mastiff's left jowl, and pry open each flap with your hands. Sliding in head first, you instantly notice her foul breath, but attempt to ignore it as you slip the rest of your body through her jowls. You start climbing further, to the back of her cheek. Now, you can do nothing but wait on the darkness of the mastiff's cheek.

Was your escape route noticed by the rottie.
1132212211222212.title: Into the bushes

113221221122222.content:
Soon enough the Rottweiler grows tired of playing with you, the beating you were receiving from his tongue stopped. You lay there bruised and battered from the torment. Just then you begin to feel the tongue shake and quiver. Then the Rottweiler lifts his head up and with a sick *gulp* that fills your ears, you feel yourself start to tumble down the tongue to the back of the throat. You try everything you could in a desperate attempt to save yourself from meeting your doom. Alas your body is too weak to fight and doesn't have much strength left. Your hands let go of the tongue and with a push of saliva you are sent into the Rottweilers throat.
         The throat welcomes you with delight, pushing against your already beaten and bruised body. The warm, thick muscle pressed against your body and pushed you slowly down the beasts throat with ease. Outside a small little lump could be seen going down the dogs throat before it disappeared behind the dogs chest. Back inside the journey down to the stomach only took about two minutes but your you it felt a lot longer than that. The muscle continued to squeeze you hard, pushing you through the sphincter and with a *pop* you are pushed into the stomach.
         You slowly slide down the walls of the stomach and come to a rest at the bottom of the hellish pit. A small pool of acids were at the bottom, thankfully the stomach didn't seem active, though you came to find that was short lived. With in minutes the stomach came to life. Acids started to pour in from all sides. The flood of acids started to rise up around you, burning and eating away at your skin, blood seeping from your wounds. Your body though, it was very weak at this point in time. It succumbed to the acids fairly quickly. You closed your eyes and took your final breaths just as the walls of the stomach started to kneed against you. Your body relaxed and then that was it.
         The stomach continued to work on your now lifeless body, the walls continuing to kneed it, softening it up. Bones could be heard snapping and breaking from the force of it all. The Rottweiler let out a hearty belch, getting your taste on it's lips last time before trotting off behind some bushes and sleep to properly digest it's catch. As the Rottweiler slept the stomach continued to do it's job. The acids slowly ate away at you, dissolving your skin and muscle leaving small little bone fragments, though those too didn't fair well in the acids considering your small size.
         About two hours later your body was now nothing but a pile of mush floating inside the stomach. A hole in the bottom of the stomach opened up, draining the contents of the stomach into the intestines, where your mush would be absorbed, the rest would be packed tightly into waste. Your mush slowly traveled through the intestines, drying and and getting pressed together tightly. Another three or fours hours later the Rottweiler had awoken and felt a familiar pressure coming from within. He got up and started to sniff around, looking for the perfect spot. Once he did he squatted down and started to relieve himself. Out came a few neatly packed logs that plopped to the ground and nice neat pile. When done the Rottweiler got up and wiped his paws a bit, not even caring to look at what he just turned his trophy into. Instead he went off in search of another meal. He'd of course find one, seeing as there were other small humans running around now. Though he wouldn't find one quite like you.
113221221122222.title: He swallows you.

113222.content:
Nanook's massive paw get ever closer, you are going to be right under the huge black pad... you get up to run. But its too late, the black pad hits you and pushes you back down in less than a millisecond. Your compressed into a red mushy puddle. You didn't even get to scream.

Nanook, does not notice the splat under his paw. He walks on, waiting for his master, you to return. Little does he realise that your on his paw and back on the carpet.
113222.title: Squish

11323.content:
Your ex police dog Doberman Thunder makes a terrifying sight. Standing 27inches tall, weighing 40kg and having dockerd tail/cropped ears. He was very loyal to you but he did not like strangers one bit. At your current size he looked ever more terrifying. He seems to be looking for you. He goes into your room and pokes around. You decide to get out of the hallway. You head towards a nearby cupboard. A small gap at the bottom is just big enough for you to get through..

Your close to the cupboard door when Thunder emerges from your room. You look back and are met by thunders gaze. He growls, bares his large fangs and then charges at you! You run even faster towards the cupboard.
11323.title: Doberman - Thunder

113231.content: Your just seconds from the gap when thunder's shadow washed over you. You leap for the gap and scramble underneath, just in time as Thunders jaws smash together behind you. You run into the cupboard and listen to Thunder's angry snarls and growls. He smashes at the door, he's desperate to get you...
113231.title: Make it.... just

1132311.content:
Suddenly the door opens and thunder squeezes in! You scream and leap for the gap and leave the cupboard again. You run for your life down the hallway, you look back and to your luck the cupboard door had swung closed behind Thunder. He was still snarling and growling from within. You kept running, you needed to get to safety before Thunder escaped from the cupboard. You make it to the stairs. You can't climb down the large steps, so you have to slide down the side by the banister. You make it to the bottom of the stairs when you hear the cupboard door open, a loud snarl and pounding feet!

You run to a table by the front door and hide behind a leg, hoping thunder will run into another room...
1132311.title: He gets in, you get out!

11323111.content:
Your angry dog comes flying down the stairs, growling and snarling. It's a terrifying sight. Thunder gets to the bottom of the stairs and to your relief runs off to another room. You decide to get out of your house. You climb up your coat that was hanging by the front door. It took a while for you to get up. You was about to move across to get onto the door handle when Thunder reappeared. He was still looking for you, he ran back up the stairs.

You really need to get out now... you climb onto your door handle and squeeze through a small gap, that was barely noticeable at your normal size. It was still a tight squeeze for your new size though. You are now outside, you have to climb down the door. Luckily its a old wooden one so you just use cracks in the wood as foot/hand holds. After about twenty minutes your down.

You look around, you have a solid wooden fence around your garden, your gate is shut. You'll have to get out to find help. You decide to go to one of your neighbours houses, but they both own dogs. It's a risk your willing to take. But which house (and dog) to go for?
11323111.title: Escape from the house

113231111.content:
You decide to go to the house on the left. They own a red & white akita inu called Akira, who was very laid back and friendly to strangers. He liked you a lot as well. You walk to the fence and go through a gap. Now in the neighbours garden you head for the house. You hope Akira is with his master. The grass is pretty high and is blocking your view. You make it to the patio, you emerge from the grass and step onto the patio. You look to your left and there, laying down looking at you is Akira! The dog gets up and walks over to you...

You shiver as Akira moves over to you, his large white paws clicking on the hard cold ground. He stands over you and studies you, he seems to recognise you. He barks, hurting your ears and lowers his nose to sniff you, he nudges you. Knocking you over ''Hey!'' you shout. He is panting happily, smelly hot breath washes over you.

Akira...
113231111.title: Meet Akira

1132311111.content:
Akira's large mouth is before you. His tongue comes out of his mouth and wraps around you. It's very powerful, hot and slimey. You get pulled into Akira's maw. ''No let me out!'' you scream. Akira ignores your command. He had no reason to let you go. He gets up and walks to the back door. You are still held by his massive tongue its shaking around with each step he takes. He finally goes through the back door dog flap and takes you through the kitchen. At this point he lets his huge tongue drop out the side of his mouth, you are dangling out in the air, held in his tongue.

Akira walks over to a large basket and lowers his head. He drops you in it. You land upon the soft cushion within it. You are very dizzy and completely covered in dog drool. You wipe some off while looking up. Akira looks down at you. He barks then turns and walks off. You go to the edge of the basket and try to climb out. But the basket edge is too steep, flat and high for you to get out of. You have no choice but to wait until Akira returns and hope he doesn't do anything bad.

Akira returns a while later and...
1132311111.title: Akira's Basket

choices: Wait for you to wake up
11323111111.content:
You hear Akira approaching. Soon his large red/white head appears above his pointed ears locked on you. He looks menacing. ''Good boy Akira.. don't do anything hasty'' you say. Akira barks and quickly lowers his head to you. His huge muzzle opens revealing his large white canines. You scream as the canines zoom towards you. Your top is snagged and your lifted up by your top. Akira growls, playfully and shakes his head. You are being shaken to hard to make a sound. Your top rips and you fall to the basket. You land upon the cushion and thats when Akira jumps in the basket with you.

You look up at the approaching mountain of fur. You quickly roll to the side, lucky you did for Akira's body slammed down where you just where. The impact throws you through the air and you land near the side of the basket. Akira's large head zooms towards you. His mouth is closed this time. You brace for impact. Akira's nose smacked into you, throwing you against the wall. The force of the impact knocked you out. You are laying face down. Akira sniffs you, curious at your lack of movement.

Akira decides to...
11323111111.title: Play Time

113231111111.content: You wake up and look right into Akira's large eyes. The monsterous dog is looking down at you. He barks and goes to poke you with his nose. ''Stop Akira!'' you shout. Amazingly, he does and cocks his head curiously. ''Good boy!'' you say hoping Akira will behave. You get up and go to walk away when he slams his paw in front of you. ''Akira let me...'' you stop when Akira slams his other paw down behind you. He places both paws on there sides and brings them together. You going to be sandwiched between Akira's massive pads! ''Akira stop!'' you beg to no effect. Akira paws come together around you, squezzing you tightly. The air is forced out your lungs, your bones groan under the pressure...
113231111111.title: Paw Press

1132311111111.content:
The pain is unbearable, you feel like you'll about to pop when the pressure is released. Akira takes his paws off you and places them either side of you. Your still in pain, nothing feels broken, but your badly brusied and out of breath. Akira, barks at you, he still wants to play with you! You don't think you can survive another 'game' so you shake your head ''no Akira! Bad dog!'' hoping Akira will leave you be. Akira cocks his head at your command and decides to ignore it. He growls and lunges for you. You scream as his tongue smacks into you, lifting you upon the great muscle. Akira seals you in his mouth and swishes you around. You are battered against his large teeth and hard ridges.

Akira
1132311111111.title: New game

11323111111111.content:
Akira continues to swish you around his mouth. You quickly become drenched in saliva and Akira's fowl smelling breath constantly bombards you. On top of that you're still very sore and hope that Akira will let you out soon. He has other ideas though. The more Akira swishes you around his mouth the more he starts to like how you taste. He continues to savor your delicious flavor, but when his stomach growls he decides it's time to end. Akira stops swishing you around his mouth and you think he is going to let you go, but then you're filled with terror when his tongue starts to push you towards the back of the throat.

"Akira no! Please don't do this! Don't eat me!" you beg as you're pushed to the back of the throat. Then Akira tilts his head back and swallows you whole with a loud gulp. You scream as you start to slowly travel down the esophagus. As you're massaged down you become drenched in even more saliva, and you feel like you're going down a slimey waterslide. Eventually, your journey comes to an end and you land in the stomach with a plop. You begin to to struggle as you beg Akira to let you out. However, the digestive jucies begin to flow. Fortunately you pass out from exhaustion and lack of air just as you start to digest. Meanwhile, Akira takes a nap while he digests you, and dreams about his delicious toy.
11323111111111.title: Swish and Swallow

113231111112.content: Akira nudges you and whines, he can't see that you are breathing. Thinking he accidentally killed his new toy, Akira laps up your body and swallows, not wanting to let it go to waste (ironically, that's what it would turn into instead) . On the bright side, you were unconscious during digestion so you didn't end up suffering.
113231111112.title: Deadly Misunderstanding

1132311112.content: Akira's huge mouth is open wide before you, great white teeth covered in drool line the edges. His huge slobbering tongue comes out and smacks into you. ''No akira!'' you scream as you fall onto the wet powerful muscle. Akira murrs and simply rolls you around on his tongue. he seems to be toying with you. You are bashed around until suddenly, Akira's master sticks his head out the door. ''Akira bad dog stop chewing on things!'' he shouts. Akira, to hide the evidence swallows, sending you down his gullet into his stomach where his digestive acids quickly converted you into valuable nutrients for him, Akira burped and simply laid back down on the patio again.
1132311112.title: Swallow the Toy

113231112.content:

You're falling. You don't know why you're falling, you don't remember how you got up here, and you don't know where you are. All that's clear is that the green earth is rushing to meet you and you'll be hitting it in less than 30 seconds. But wait, what's that moving down there? It's...some kind of animal?

It seems you aren't going to hit the hard ground after all...you're going to hit...a fox? If it's a fox it certainly is huge. Come to think of it, the trees, and the clouds, and the stones are huge too...or, of course...maybe I'm the one who's really tiny.

You close your eyes and brace for impact and, completely unexpectedly, your skin meets with the orange fur as gently as a feather dropped onto a pillow. You open one eye, then the other, and notice you're on the immense creature's back and that it didn't notice you at all.

"Hey! Hey!" you cry out, trying to get its attention. "Can you hear me? Hey!"

The creature either doesn't hear you at all or pretends not to hear you. You climb along its back, carefully grasping tufts of hair, and climb towards his head. You grapple your way up the side of its head, and climb behind one of its pointed ears. You ready yourself again to yell out to gets its attention when you notice that the fox has stopped. You look to where the fox was looking and see two other foxes walking towards it.

Perhaps you should...

"And how are we to do that, Leaf? If we just bring food here who's to say that the other," the red and grey male looked at the fox you were riding, "or some crow or raccoon, won't come and steal it while we're out getting more?"

She gave it a good bit of thought. Her mostly black fur had a healthy shine in the sun. Then her eyes brightened and she answered. "Ah, I've got it! Eat the food."

"And how will we know who ate more?" your fox spoke for the first time. He wasn't larger than the other male fox, but you could tell from his voice that he was the cleverer one.

"Well that should be obvious shouldn't it. We meet at this very place tomorrow. It's gonna be a pooping contest. Whoever managed to eat more will have the bigger poop. That way we'll know who the better hunter is and who'll be the better father to our kits!"

The two male foxes looked at each other in slight disgust.

Valuable information.

You look at your compass. According to the little piece of plastic, you were currently heading east. The mountain you have heard so much about was east of this forest, so at least you're heading in the general direction of it. This mountain was once home to a glorious gold mine. Gold, Silver, gemstones of all kinds...All of these things were just rumors, but most rumors have a shred of truth. Even if all of it was for nothing and the mine was empty, this'll make for a good story to tell.

Now if you could just make it out of the damn forest, you'd be golden.

You were aware of the dangers in this forest, or at least the dangers told of by the small village outside of it. "Giant animals" they said, "They hunger for humans." Well, you hunger for gold. A few animals weren't going to stop you from making a fortune. You were curious though. What kind of animals live here? Are they just...larger than normal animals, or something new entirely? The villagers never really explained. A few of them mentioned the riches in the mine, so that was more than enough confirmation for you, but still...what exactly is in this forest?

Kevin set down his bags and reached into his pocket, searching for something. He seemed to find it and pulling it out he pushed it into a lock and turned. Hearing a click he pushed and the door swung open.

Kevin looked inside, what he saw was a small room with only a few furnishings, all of which were old and covered in cobwebs.

Kevin sighed, it wasn't quite what he expected from a cabin. But then again it wasn't a highly priced vacation spot.

He moved his suit cases inside the door, he would deal with this place later. So he turned to face the woods that were behind him, this was why he spent 20 hours driving to get here. It wasn't for the cabin, it was for the woods. 250 square miles of natural, uncultivated, and mostly untouched forest. That is what Kevin was looking forward to.

Stepping down the steps to the cabin, Kevin basically ran into the woods. He ran and ran, enjoying the freedom of not a care in the world.

1232312.content:
Kevin was stunned by the fact he didn't notice the trapped animal before. A majestic silver wolf lay on the ground, helplessly struggling to free itself from a tight net, holding the creature in place. Someone must have set up a trap to catch wild animals, probably for their meat, or in this case, their fur. How long has the wolf been here? Inspecting further, Kevin saw the animal's slender figure, with its ribs clearly visible underneath his furry coat. Uttering a distraught whimper, the creature gave up struggling, lowered its head and slightly closed its sad eyes. A strong, healthy wolf must have been capable of destroying the net, but this one must have been weakened before falling victim to the trap.

All of a sudden, Kevin lost his balance, but barely managed to hold on to a nearby tree, preventing him to tumble down. Something was wrong. The strong dizzy feeling vanished within seconds, but left the human more than confused.

Nonetheless, he needed to refocus on his current situation. Two obvious options came to his mind: With his Swiss army knife, he could cut the net and save a life. However, he certainly didn't want to risk being attacked by a wild canine. Even though this one seemed utterly exhausted and famished, a sense of danger remained.

Suddenly, the wolf opened his eyes once again, staring right into Kevin's face. Shivering nervously, the human holds eye contact and takes a few steps towards the net, followed by an unpleasant but manageable giddiness. Something needed to be done.

Being a little doddery, Kevin continued to approach the beast, while slowly pulling his knife out of the jacket's inner pocket. Trying to soothe the distressed wolf, he spoke in a soft and calm voice: „Relax, I'm not going to hurt you. Just stay still, and I'm going to get out of there. Calm, stay calm...“

All of a sudden, a strong gust of wind caused Kevin to stumble and fall onto the leaf-covered soil. His whole head was spinning around. What the hell was happening to him? He never had any severe circulatory problems, hence having no idea how to deal with that nagging dizziness. Unfortunately, his knife had dropped out of his hand during the fall. His whole body felt incredibly hot, despite the mild forest climate. After fumbling around for some moments, he finally found his knife. One thing was for certain: he was forced act quickly. Free the wolf, run back to the cabin and call someone; a doctor, an ambulance... maybe even a friend that could calm him down in case he got a panic attack.

Crawling some feet forward, he reached the aimless creature, and with a swift snip, ripped the close-meshed net apart.

Without wasting any time, Kevin attempted to stand up and sprint to safety. But gravity was working against him, violently pulling him down. Hot sweat poured down the sides of his head, as he frantically tries to gain any sense of orientation. A painfully noisy tinkle deafens the poor human. The ringing in his ears was paired with caustic pain and a burning sting. Kevin pressed his eyes together and prayed for anything that could stop his torture, feeling like the ground was shifting underneath him. Then he passed out.

After some moments of pure blackness, Kevin is drawn back to life. Still feeling sick, he utters a dry cough and sits up, wiping the sweat off his forehead. Blinding sunbeams reach his retina as soon as he parts his eyelids. Slowly adopting to the intense light, he is absolutely poleaxed by his sight. The human seems to have shrunk to a size of a few inches! Terrified and in state of shock, he watches helplessly as the gigantic wolf shakes off the last remains of the net. It must have watched him intently, since it immediately heads towards your direction, focusing Kevin's tiny body with its intimidating, yellow eyes.

Kevin's breathing accelerates, staring back at the huge beast, that is coming closer and closer.

13321121.title: Outrun a Horse

13321122.content:
Fortunately your horse doesn't notice you and you narrowly manage to avoid being crushed beneath the horse's hooves. You are left utterly exhausted as you watch your horse wander off. You decide to take a breather for a few moments.

With your horse wandering about you decide not to take the road all the way to town just yet. Instead you decide on the much shorter trip to your home and risk the dogs.

Your trip to home is...
13321122.title: Narrow Escape

133211221.content:
You manage to make your way back to your home without incident. When you get to the front you lay down and slip under a crack in the door. You had been meaning to repair that. Inside you do not see any sign of your dogs at first and begin to make your way to the kitchen.

When you are about halfway there your German Shepherd, Max, emerges from the kitchen and instantly notices you in the middle of the floor. He runs up to you while you try to get away, but you are still tired from your journey and still way to small to make escape possible.

You...
133211221.title: Meet Max

1332112211.content:
At the least moment you manage jump and avoid being snapped up by Max. As you get up to try to make a run for it again Max swipes you with his paw and sends you flying under a couch.

You are dazed but you manage to climb far enough under the couch as to be safe from Max. Max struggles to fit his head under the couch and tries to move it but is not strong enough to move it. As you watch this you find that you are drifting off due to the exhaustion and the pain. When your movements cease, Max begins to lose interest and wanders off.

When you wake up...
1332112211.title: Can't Go On

13321122111.content:
You wake up to see that the environment around you is even larger than before. You estimate you are about one millimeter tall. Nothing but a speck. Being able to get to supplies in the kitchen seems even more ridiculous now. But it is still better then sitting under a couch and waiting to starve to death. Maybe your dogs were sloppy eaters and left something behind on the floor. Gross, but it will keep you alive.

You manage to make your way into the kitchen safely and sure enough Max had left some scraps on the floor, your Border Collie's, Star, bowl was still full. You walk cautiously over to some of Max's scraps, keeping an eye out for Star. You try some of the dog food, it tastes horrible. But you are starving and can't think of anything else you could get to.

As you are making your way back to cover, Star comes into the kitchen. You happen to be in Star's path to her dish. You try to get out of the way. There isn't enough time. Star does not notice you, but her paw is descending right on top of you. However, you are not crushed. You find yourself wedged in between Star's massive toes. With each step you feel like you will be crushed. By the smell down you here you realize that you had not been properly washing her paws. Eventually Star makes her way to her bowl, devours her meal, and makes her way back to the bed you had made for her to settle down for the night.

When you hear that she is asleep you try to escape from between her toes. You are relieved when you finally escape. When you look back at Star you see not a sleeping dog, but the piercing blue eyes of a fully awake Star.

Star briefly sniffs you and wonders why this bug smells like her master. She then easily laps you up with a powerful, smooth, wet tongue.
13321122111.title: Meet Star

133211221111.content:
You find yourself inside Star's cavernous maw. Any of her teeth are easily larger than you. She rolls you around on her tongue and licks you against the roof of her mouth, savoring your taste. She does not seem to be swallowing or chewing you to your relief.

You try to make an escape attempt. An ill timed escape attempt. As she tried to lick you against the roof of her mouth again you tried to make a run for it. What happened was you slipped on her tongue and fell right into her throat. Her throat muscles pulled you down into her stomach with the foul smelling meal she had just eaten. Your last thought was how it was actually a little funny to see the dog food you had just eaten and were digesting getting digested by Star as well.
133211221111.title: Dog Food

133211221112.content:
Star notices that you smell like her master and you taste like her master. This seems to be enough to convince her not to swallow you and let you out of her mouth. You are relieved to no longer be surrounded by teeth that were larger than yourself. You think it would be a good idea to not try your luck and begin to back away from your dog.

Star does not want you to leave just yet. She pins you down with a house sized toe. She is not exactly crushing you, but with the size difference she can't help hurting you a little bit. Star lays back down with you pinned beneath her toe a goes to sleep. She will investigate you further once she is rested.

You try to move the dogs toe enough to squeeze out from under Star's toe. It is like trying to lift a house. With a sigh, you accept being stuck under the leathery pad of her toe and get some much needed rest yourself.

It does not take long to realize the mistake you have made after you wake up and notice...
133211221112.title: Captive

1332112211121.content:
This is unbelievable. Everything has doubled in size to you. You must be shrinking every time you fall asleep. Then you hear Star yawn. You feel the pressure on you begin to increase to near crushing levels before Star remembers you are beneath your toe. The toe quickly lifts of you and Star stares at you. She cocks her head quizzically at you wondering if you had become even smaller since last night.

Star begins to sniff you and it is like being hit by alternating waves of a vacuum and and a gale. You are actually lifted off your feet with one particularly powerful sniff. You do the only thing you can think of and pet her massive snout. Star licks you in return. The problem is that at your size you stick to her tongue and wind up back in her cavernous maw. She is about to let you back out when you both hear a noise. She trots off to investigate the noise with you still in her mouth.
1332112211121.title: Friendly Star

13321122111211.content:
You wonder where Star is headed when you begin to hear the clatter of her claws against the the kitchen tiles. Light shines into Star's mouth as she releases you. You look around you and discover the source of the noise. When you filled the dog bowls last night you were in a rush and had left the dog food sitting precariously on the tabletop. As a result some of the contents had just spilled out. Star noticed her bowl had not been refilled and settled for what had spilled out of the bag.

There was not much that had spilled and Star was still hungry. She looked at you expectantly. You had trained your dogs not to jump on the table and now she expected you to get to the food for her. It would probably be a bad idea to disappoint her and you walk up to a chair and begin to climb it. Then you feel Star's cold moist nose against your back as she boosts you to the seat of the chair. At least that puts you halfway there. You then move toward the tablecloth and start the other half of your journey.

You notice Star looking up at you with a look of anticipation about her. Her tongue is lolling from the side of her mouth and she is beginning to drool. You do not feel very comfortable with Star looking up at you like that, plus you have a very good view of Star's gullet from here and her wreaking breath is rolling over you every time she pants.

Then your terminal lack of luck kicks in and Star sneezes on you. You are not using any climbing gear and you do not have the grip of an insect. Thus you are easily blown of the tablecloth and land...
13321122111211.title: The Climb

133211221112111.content:
You find yourself flying through the air. As you look down you see Star's open inviting maw below you, her tongue still lolling on the side of her mouth. She must not have noticed what she did to you. You try to alter to course, but it is of no use.

All you can do is scream in terror as you descend into Star's gullet. You hit the back of her throat and she cannot help but involuntarily swallow you. The muscles in her gullet begin pushing you into her belly. You struggle in vain, not willing to give up.

As you are forced into her belly you land on a piece of the dog food Star had just eaten. The smell hear is horrible and the massive chamber is already flooding with digestive juices. Fortunately you drift of to sleep from lack of oxygen before your dog food bed can dissolve and Star begins digesting you.

Star did not even notice what she swallowed. She did notice your absence after a while. Since you did not get her food for her, she decided to go ahead and disobey her master. Star jumped on the table and began to enjoy her breakfast.
133211221112111.title: Free Fall

133211221112112.content:
You look below you and see Star starring up at you. It is obvious you are on a collision course with her. You hope to land on something soft. That is when you descend right into one of her nostrils. This is possibly the most disgusting thing that has ever happened to you, but at least you are alive and unharmed.

Your attempts to move around prove to be very difficult as the mucus in her nose hampers your movement. Unintentionally you are also causing Star's nose to itch. The result is another sneeze from Star. This time you are sent flying across the room, covered in dog snot. Once again, its disgusting but helps to cushion your fall. The landing is bone jarring, but you are fine.

Star begins to look for you when you hear a knock on your door. She goes to the door to see who it is. You hear a voice call out. You recognize it as one of your friends who occasionally helps out on the farm. When you do not respond your friend uses a key you gave to him and comes in. He eventually comes into the kitchen searching for you. That is when he notices the empty dog bowls and wonders why you have not feed them. You try to get his attention but it is not doing you any good.

He grabs the dog food off the table and is about to begin filling the dog bowls when...
133211221112112.title: Help?

1332112211121121.content:
Your friend notices you. Well, he notices a little black dot coming toward him on the floor. It might have served you to remember that he is afraid of insects, ridiculously so. You had always laughed at him about it. At one millimeter he could not make out your human form. All he did was scream and take a handful of dog food from the bag and throw it at you.

The boulder sized pieces of dog food flew at you. You ducked under a piece that nearly took your head off, but that was the only one that came close to hitting you. When everything stopped moving you looked around and saw that you were a surrounded by dog food. Then you heard the sound of claws clacking on tiles and felt the thumping of paws. Star was headed toward the food.

Star reached the food long before you could get out of the area. You were able to glimpse her amazingly large fangs and pink tongue before she took the food along with you into her maw. Her mouth shook violently as she greedily devoured the food. She was barely bothering to chew. Due to this she missed crushing you between her teeth and swallowed you whole. You were battered by the chunks of dog food on your way down Star's throat and were pretty banged up by the time you reached her stomach.

You land on top of some of the food as the digestive acids begin pouring in. The chunks float for a little while before they dissolve and your safe haven disappears. Your tiny body dissolves even faster than the dog food. There are a few bones left that make their way through Star's intestines and are safely deposited outside after a few hours.

Your friend notices the bug had disappeared. He reasoned that Star had ate it and called her a good girl. After he could not find you he eventually called the police. When they came to investigate nobody bothered to look for your tiny bones in the dog waste sitting in the front lawn.
1332112211121121.title: Not Such A Good Idea

choices: wait for him to calm down.
1332112211121122.content:
Your friend finishes filling the dogs bowls. Star begins feeding, all thoughts of you are forgotten. He looks around and calls out your name a few times. He cannot hear your response. As he begins to leave he heads your way. Just as you think you are about to be crushed by him the white light flashes again.

You stay awake this time and are actually awake to see your size change. You triple in size, making you a whole three millimeters tall. When you look in front of you there is your friend, unconscious and the same size as you. Looks like your size changed while he was asleep this time. It is a little comforting to have someone in the same situation as you.

You go over to him and try to wake him up. After a few minutes his eyes flutter open and he mutters incoherently. You help him stand up and he looks around him. A look of fear appears on his face and he runs off. You...
1332112211121122.title: A Companion

13321122111211221.content:
You go after him before he gets himself killed. This decision saved his life because a few moments later you pull him out of the way of Star right before she can accidentally step on him. Just as you finish calming him down you hear your other dog, Max, comes into the kitchen and heads for his bowl.

On his way he spots two specks on the ground. The two of you start to run as Max heads toward you. It's to bad that your top running speed is not even a slow walk to Max. He catches up to both of you. His broad tongue comes out of his mouth and...
13321122111211221.title: Return Of Max

133211221112112211.content:
You manage to avoid the tongue but your friend is not so lucky. Your friend is wrapped up in Max's tongue and lifted into his mouth. Max notices your escape and pins you down under a toe. You have a good look at Max's head as he appears to be tasting your friend. He looks like he is wondering where he has tasted something like your friend before. You nearly throw up when you see a lump descend Max's throat.

He must have liked the taste. When he looks down at you he is licking his lips in anticipation of another treat. The toe lifts off you. Before you can get up, you are wrapped in a wet, pink blanket and pulled into the mouth of Max. He savors your flavor as he rolls you around on his tongue and licks you against the roof of his mouth. After what seems like an eternity you feel yourself being pushed in the direction of Max's throat.

The powerful muscles of Max's throat easily push you down into his belly. It is to dark to see your friend and Max's digestive juices are already going to work on you. If you are dissolving this fast your friend has probably been digested by now. You hear the splash of what must be the dog food entering the dog's stomach as he eats his actual meal. This does not last for long as you are quickly digested and hear no more. Soon all you are is another piece of animal waste on your farm.
133211221112112211.title: A Meal For Max

133211221112112212.content:
There is a loud barking noise. Star runs up to Max and chases him away from the two of you. She has remembered that you were left behind in the kitchen. When Max backs away she turns her attention back to you and your friend. She checks out the second new bug that has appeared and after a thorough round of sniffing and licking confirms his identity. You laugh at your friend as he wipes the dog drool of himself.

You walk over to him to help clean him off. As you do so, Star lowers her snout right next to the two of you. You thought she wanted you to crawl on. You were wrong, Star's tongue scoops both of you into her mouth and she carries you off somewhere. Her breath is rancid, but at least she is not swallowing you.

Her mouth soon opens and you are deposited in her bed and she walks off. You both decide to attempt an escape while she is gone. Just as you reach the ground, Star returns and picks you up and puts you back in her bed. All of you repeat this process one more time and you both decide to stop wasting energy and stay put.

As the day goes by Star makes sure you are where your supposed to be every so often. When your friend starts to take a nap, you stop him and tell him that sleeping is what changes your size. The day passes by and Star comes to bed a lays down next to you to rest.

While Star is sleeping the two of you decide to...
133211221112112212.title: Star's Captives

1332112211121122121.content:
You make a fateful decision. It may not have been a good idea to try to leave behind your furry protector. It would also have been a good idea to stay in a location where a creature many times your size knows where you are.

As you to make it out of the dog bed and onto the floor Star begins to stir. When she notices the two of you missing she decides to look for you. You happened to be to close to the bed and she did not notice you, much to your misfortune.

You and your friend had noticed the rustling in the bed behind you. You thought it was just her rolling around in the bed. Then you notice a shadow surround you. Star is stepping out of bed and onto you. You try to run but at your size it is like trying to dodge a house.

You cannot run fast enough as the paw comes down. Even though you know this is the end for you, you continue to flee. You look up at the paw that will soon bring an end to your life. It looks like you are going to be crushed by one of the middle toes of her thick, black, padded paws. As the paw makes contact with the two of you time appears to slow down. The pressure causes your bones to crack and shatter. The pain is unbearable for one brief moment and then you and your friend never feel anything again.

Star notices a small tickling sensation against her paw. When she lifts it up and sniffs your remains she knows what has happened. She is a little sad, but that does not stop her from licking up what is left of the two of you. Star is happy she can cancel her search and goes back to sleep.
1332112211121122121.title: Should Have Trust Star

choices: Stay with Star and hope for the best.
1332112211121122122.content:
It would be a good idea to just stay here for the night. The two of you rest against Star's soft belly fur. Your both tired and try not to fall asleep. After a full day of doing nothing you are both bored and tired. This combination works against you and your eyes close.

When you wake up, you curse. You and your friend cannot be more than half a millimeter tall. Star looks triple her previous size. The sound of her breathing provides an ominous background noise. Her hairs are to heavy for you to lift. At this size you are way to small for her to notice.

You decide to re-evalute your decision to remain here before Star wakes up.
1332112211121122122.title: Sleeping Sucks.

13321122111211221221.content:
You leave Star behind. With the help of your friend you make it safely down her bed. Shortly after you make it to the floor Star wakes up. She looks for the two of you in the bed. Star then uses her excellent nose and starts sniffing around for you. It is not long before her nose swings in your direction. She presses her big black nose against the ground and you. You feel like you are going to be crushed when she finally lifts her nose back up, with you and your friend stuck to it. Failing to locate you, Star eventually decides to go outside to look for you.

When Star is outside, you and your friend grab onto a blade of grass as she continues sniffing for you. You are able to pull off her nose and onto the grass. While the dog had been swinging her nose around you had lost your bearings and you are lost in the grass jungle.

You can see what looks like a lake from your size in one direction. Do you head for it or go somewhere else?
13321122111211221221.title: The Great Outdoors

133211221112112212211.content:
The water looks a little dangerous to you. Who knows what dangers could be hidden in it. You both head off in another random direction instead. Everything looks the same to you and you are unable to tell if you are making any progress.

As you begin to grow tired you hear a loud boom and then feel the ground quake beneath you. This grows in intensity for a while then suddenly stops. You look around to see what it was, but you cannot find the source. Suddenly, a cavernous mouth appears above you and your friend and you hear something crashing through the grass.

Just before the horses house sized teeth emerge from the grass to crush you, the horse's slimy tongue picks the two of you up and into his mouth. You try to avoid being crushed by his teeth and watch as tree sized grazed is reduced to mush as he chews. It does not take long for the horse to swallow and you get swept up with the plant matter.

It is a long fall down the horses throat and into its belly. The plant matter manages to provide enough air to keep you awake. The horses digestive acids are to weak to digest you, they just burn the hairs off your body as well as causing some minor burns.

That just lets you live through the entire digestive process. The smell is horrific as you are packed in with other bits of indigestible material in the horses intestines. You eventually see a light at the end of the tunnel. When you emerge from the horses rear you see your doom. The fall is the equivalent of thousands of feet for you. The impact with the ground kills you instantly. Thus you come to an end as natural horse fertilizer for your lawn.
133211221112112212211.title: Poor Choice Of Direction

133211221112112212212.content:
The smell of water makes you both realize how long it has been seen you drank anything. You may be able to survive without food for a while, but you have to get something to drink or risk dieing of dehydration. It is an uneventful trip to the water, which is a good thing since you would have trouble fending off an ant at your size.

When you start drinking there is a huge vibration behind you and the earth shakes so violently you are knocked of your feet. You remain still and slowly look at what caused this. There is a massive frog standing behind you. You can make out every moist bump on the frog's bloated body. You see your friend running away, screaming in terror.

His actions only serve to draw the frog's attention. It hops in the air and lands in the path of your friend. The frog lands so close to him causing him to get knocked off of his feet. When he tries to get up and run again the frog's tongue flicks out so fast it just looks like a blur to you and your friend is gone.

You remain still and hope the frog does not notice you.
133211221112112212212.title: Water Attracts Many Things

1332112211121122122121.content:
It walks slowly in your direction. You hope this is just a coincidence. Your friend just showed that getting up to run would be a mistake, not only could it catch up to you in a single jump, it could outdistance you as well. The frog's tongue flicks out so fast you are in its mouth before you realize it noticed you.

You have a moment to think about how soft and sticky the frog's tongue is before it swallows you. When you land with a plop in the frogs digestive juices, your friend calls out and asks if it's you. You respond that it is and make a comment on how the fat bastard could at least chew his few. Your friend chuckles at this, but you can tell it is forced. You talk with each other until you pass out from lack of oxygen.

The frog simply hopes off in search of other bugs to eat. It is just happy that it found such stupid and slow bugs so early in the day. It turns out that it did have an unusually good day of hunting and went to sleep that night with a full belly. You and your friend must have been good luck charms for the frog, not that you would care since you had long since been digested.
1332112211121122122121.title: Doing Nothing Does Not Help

1332112211121122122122.content:
You finally get lucky. The frog has not noticed you and just hops off. When you are sure the slimy monster is gone you get up and run into the grass. It would be best to avoid large sources of water from now on. Thus you continue on minus one friend.

After about half an hour you feel the ground begin to tremble. Whatever is causing it is getting closer because the trembling is growing more violent with each moment. As it gets so violent you are having trouble standing you discover where you are. Massive teeth take a bite out of the grass above you and you can see you are in the bull pen.

The bull looks like a black furred mountain to you. It is fortunate you are this small or you may have been eaten along with the grass above you. The bull's head passes over you and you think you are out of immediate danger. That is until you see the bull's hoof in the air above you. The bull...
1332112211121122122122.title: Bull Pen

13321122111211221221221.content:
The hoof looked larger than a barn to you. It also had far more weight behind it. You attempt to run out of pure instinct. If you didn't know better, it seems like the bull is intentionally trying to step on you. Of all the places to step it is stepping right on you.

You trip and land on what seems like a small hill to you. It would not be noticeable to the bull, but it makes a difference to you. You land face down with your legs slightly elevated. When the hoof lands on you there is just enough time to feel your legs being crushed before the immense weight of the hoof completely flattens you and reduces the hill into a valley. When the bull lifts up its hoof there is a little, almost unnoticeable, red stain on it. At least most of you body was driven into the ground, giving you an impromptu burial.
13321122111211221221221.title: Bull Crush

13321122111211221221222.content:
The bulls hoof came thrashing down, luckily, it missed you by just a tiny bit!
The force of the hoof made the ground tremble, and you fell over.


What next?
13321122111211221221222.title: steps over you.

133211221112112212212221.content: You hear a rush of wind, and turn to see a wall of pink race towards you. You adhere to the sticky surface, along with a few skyscrapers of grass. The bull then proceeds to chew its mouthful, with you included. You survive the mouth, but suffocate when you reach the stomach.
133211221112112212212221.title: The bull slurps you up

133211221112112212212222.content:
You watch as the massive beast passes over you, completely unaware of your presence. The rear of the bull begins to pass over you, you gazing at the massive package of the bull, along with its massive ass.
Then suddenly the bull's 4 massive hooves stop dead in their tracks, the massive rear above you grinding to a halt. You, completely awestruck, were not ably to move.

What does the bull do next?
133211221112112212212222.title: The bull walks past

choices: The bull isn't done yet it empties it bowels too.
Bull stomps in the puddle sending you flying towards....
1332112211121122122122221.content:
The bulls shadow is cast over you as it stands still. Looking up you can see that the bulls penis, which is directly over you, is larger then you and the sack is swaying from the momentum of its walking be for it stopped. Looking back at the penis you can see it pointing downward and it's out of the sheath so the bull must be a bit excited. The tip is twitching and pulsing, as the urethra opens and closes, something falls out of it.

When the thing hits the ground it busts, splashing you as a few more fall around you, and the smell gives away what it is. Before you can act a flood of urine gushes down on the ground, from the bulls penis, creating a huge puddle around you. Luckily you where able to find a cut down blade of grass to get on so you didn't drown the currents where ruff as the bull continued for a few minutes. Waves where created from the drops falling down, even after the bull was done.
1332112211121122122122221.title: Relieve itself

13321122111211221221222211.content:
You try to remain clung to the solitary blade of grass to avoid being swept away by the bull's urine, but your grip is beginning to weaken.
The intense heat is inescapable, and the sharp smell stings your nostrils and makes your eyes water.

The bull has begun to adjust his hind legs by shuffling forward a small amount. While barely noticeable to anyone, at your size and location the movement is severe. The first hoof came crashing down and sent a wave of urine towards you, making your grip loosen. The second hoof sends urine coming at you from the opposite direction, causing you to lose your grip and fall down to the urine puddle below you.

You have now become engulfed in the steaming hot piss, as it rushes you downstream. You rise to the surface and thrash about, trying to remain above the surface without swallowing any of the liquid. Your feet begin to touch the ground as the urine is absorbed into the dirt, and you are able to wipe your eyes and see where you have ended up. Your trip has landed you still behind the bull but directly under his tail. It's titanic ass looming above.

A sense of dread engulfs you as you watch the tail slowly lift away from the rear of the bull, exposing the massive anus, which was twitching and contracting.
You could not run, but only watch as the dirty anus of the bull stretches impossibly wide and juts out, exposing a massive slimy turd. The first poo breaks off, and is sent soaring to the ground, right at you!

The turd narrowly avoided you as it came to the ground, but you were blasted by the impact, which sent large chunks of shit outward, knocking you over. The next turd was a direct hit, burying you deep within the gooey smelly mess. The bull kept on pressing out more and more poo onto the pile, sealing you deep within the shit. You struggle to move, and you gasp for air, only to be greeted by the rancid smell. You try as hard as you can to swim/crawl through the pile, trying to escape. You feel a deep, low rumble, which was the bull finishing his potty break off with a fart, before he walks away.

Do you manage to escape the shit pile, or are you doomed to drown?
13321122111211221221222211.title: The bull isn't done yet! It empties it bowels

133211221112112212212222112.content:
Shock begins to set in due to your predicament.

The intense heat, pressure and horrid smell surrounding you from all sides force you into a panic. You start to hyperventilate, but immediately regret wasting precious oxygen, as it is only replaced by a mouthful of fresh dung, and methane, leaving you light headed. You attempt to regain your composure, and decide which direction is up, to safety. You wast little time beginning to dig your way to the top of the shit mountain you find yourself at the bottom of.

The dung gives you very little purchase, as it is too soft to fully support your weight. You keep scrambling, trying not to think about what you are crawling through. You manage to get a grip on pieces of half digested hay, grass, and cattle feed, which is suspended in the mass. If you stop for even a second, you begin to lose progress and sink back down into the dung.

After nearly a minute of climbing, you begin to notice a drop in temperature of the shit surrounding you. This must mean that you are close to the surface. However, the outer layer of the cow patty has begun to form a hard crust. You try as hard as you can to break through the ever thickening layer, to no avail. You are getting dizzy from the lack of oxygen...

A few more seconds pass by, and your efforts prove useless. You begin to feel weak, and can no longer keep yourself floating. You lose consciousness as you begin to slowly drift back down into the depths of the dung pile, never to be seen again.
133211221112112212212222112.title: Cow pie prison

choices: The bulls penis as it’s retreating back into its sheath.
13321122111211221221222212.content: The bull starts to walk again after it’s done relieving itself. As you try and swim to the edge of the puddle it’s back leg stomps into the puddle. This caused a splash and you are flung upwards. You hit a surface and due to being wet you stick to it. Looking around you see your stuck to...
13321122111211221221222212.title: Bull stomps in the puddle sending you flying to...

1332112211121122122122222.content:
The titanic torso of the bull suddenly seems to be getting bigger, you then notice the pillar-like legs buckling. The bull was laying down!! With you directly under him!!

All you could do is stare at the infinite wall of beef rushing downward!

What end of the bull hits where you are first?
1332112211121122122122222.title: Sit down
