You wake up a few minutes later, and sigh when you realize that you've shrunk yet again. Everything looks like it's about 5 times bigger than before. Well, what now? Where should you go from here? At 1/10 a millimeter tall, you're too small to be seen by anyone that could help you, and anything that could see you would eat you for lunch. That's when you notice the sound of something big coming towards you. You can obviously tell it's bigger than you, but how big?
1332112211121222.title: Alone on the beach

13321122111212221.content: Out from the grass appears...a small mouse. Well, it would be small to a normal person. To you, it's nearly 5 miles long! It cautiously crawls towards the water, and right near you. A paw the size of Central Park smashes down next to you, knocking you on your feet. As you watch the behemoth take a drink...
13321122111212221.title: Mousezilla

133211221112122212.content: You and the mouse are unaware of the danger, as a massive ___ snatches the mouse (and you) up!
133211221112122212.title: A predator appears!

1332112211121222122.content: A chill goes down your spine, as you get a really, really bad feeling. The mouse must have sensed something too, as its mile-long head shoots upward, two massive ears swiveling to try and hear any odd noises. You turn just in time to watch an enormous talon glides towards the rodent. A massive claw digs into the sand and unknowingly carries a tiny speck with its meal. You cling to the spire for dear life as the owl covers miles in a few seconds. It lands inside a tree, where you tumble to the rough floor. The monolithic mouse scrambles to escape, but the owl is faster. Its beak slams down next to you, and effortlessly swallows its meal whole. It shuffles its feet, causing an earthquake that sends you reeling as the talon lands dangerously close to you. Now you've got a dilemma. You could try to escape this nest, but you'd have to travel through a forest where even an ant could crush you. On the other hand, This place would be rather safe, and you could always grab any scraps the owl misses. What should you do?
1332112211121222122.title: Owl

13321122111212222.content: You can tell from the heavy earthquakes that whatever is coming is big. Really big. A mountain looms over the grass jungle behind you. You can see the massive head of a...
13321122111212222.title: REALLY big (horse, cow)

133211221112122221.content: A mountain-sized horse approaches the shore of the pond where you stand. Its head and body looming high above as it strides through the grass jungle. As it nears, you become worried it will step on you with one of its house sized hooves, and begin to move. you are too late however as a shadow descends over you and, thinking you are a goner, you close your eyes and wait for death. It never comes. Instead, two earthquakes shake the ground behind you knocking you on your butt before large gulping sounds emanate from above. opening your eyes you see behind you the horse's massive front hooves and his snout dipped in the pond drinking gallons of water. under the shadow of the mountainous equine you now look up towards what can only be its belly and gasp. Above you is the beasts massive....
133211221112122221.title: Horse

choices: Frozen in fear, trapped under sheath/balls
Run, are in safety/ near another animal
1332112211121222211.content: Above you is the horses massive sheath and balls, and they appear to be slowly ascending upon you. You _______ and are now________
1332112211121222211.title: Sheath and balls. (stallion)

13321122111212222112.content: You just barely jump out of the way and pant in fear, turning around to see the colossal horse finish his drink. He then raises his head and looks around, shifting around slightly. Above you is his tail and rear, slowly swishing around. Perhaps you could climb it and search for safety on top of him.
13321122111212222112.title: Run, are in safety/ near another animal

133211221112122221121.content: You grab onto the horse's incredibly thick (from perspective) tail hairs and begin to climb up. He stands still for you fortunately, continuing his drink. About twenty minutes pass when you finally reach his gigantic butt which is quick to blast you with a very windy fart. It pretty much feels like having your head out of the car window on a fast freeway. If the feeling alone is one thing, then the smell is another. The smell of horse manure and digested corn hit you like a brick, really REALLY engulfing you. Then, the horse casually trots away, totally unaware of the tiny stowaway on his rump. The fart is actually a warning that he has to poop which is why he rushes over to the stables, blasting you with more windy and bubbly farts on the way.
133211221112122221121.title: Climb that horse's tail

133211221112122222.content: How about a massive cow?
133211221112122222.title: Other animal

1332112211121222221.content: The massive head lets out a deafening moo, as the cow lumbers towards the pond. A hoof a mile tall swings through the grass, and lands with a BOOM. Another hoof shifts past it, and lands a few hundred feet from you. The monolithic tower forms a crater in the wet dirt as the cow's weight settles. At this point you don't even bother trying to run, you'd have to run a mile away to avoid any hoof that lands near you. The other hoof lift up, swings overhead, and lands in the water. A "small" drop lands on you, getting you soaked again before getting absorbed in the dirt. In the distance, a massive head descends to the water as the cow begins to drink. It's at this moment that...
1332112211121222221.title: Mount Bovine

1332112212.content:
Max caught up to you in less than three seconds. It only took that long because Max expected you to be faster and overshot you at first.

The dog thinks that you are laughably slow even for your size. You keep trying to avoid Max, but you are not even going as fast as his top walking speed.

Max pinned you down with his massive paw. You could tell your dog was not try to crush you. At your size the dog just was not delicate enough to avoid causing you a great deal of pain though. He sniffed at you quizzically and then took his paw off of you.

You knew what was coming and tried to get up to run away. You did not get one step when Max's massive pink tongue made contact with your back. Max wrapped you up in his tongue and took you into his maw. He played his tongue all over your body and licked you against the rough ridges on the top of his mouth. You began to feel nauseated as you were hit with the scent of the dogs horrible breath.

The only reason Max did not swallow you were because he had already eaten and he wondered why you smelled and tasted like his master. Max decided he could wait to choose what to do with you in the morning and found someplace to rest with you still stuck in his maw. You struggle to part Max's teeth at first. That does not work. You are beginning to feel sick due to the smell in Max's mouth. However, you are more tired than sick and soon you lay down to sleep on your fleshy pink bed.

In the morning Max decides to...
1332112212.title: Pink Prison

13321122121.content:
You begin to wake up and notice that Max's breath is even stronger than when you went to sleep. The tongue of the dog stretches out before you like a vast pink plain. You see Max's jagged teeth in the distance. They look like small mountains to you. You have shrunk yet again. There is hope though. Light is filtering into his mouth meaning there may be enough room for you to escape your prison. Max's slow breathing also indicates that he is still asleep.

Unfortunately as you are headed for freedom Max begins to stir. Max begins to yawn and if you had not been able to get a good grip on his tongue you would have been sucked right down his throat. Max notices he is barely able to taste his captive anymore. Whatever it is that is in his mouth cannot be any larger than a flea. It is probably smaller. This minuscule being cannot possibly be his beloved master. So he decides to swallow it.

You feel a terrible sense of dread as Max's tongue lurches and he tilts his head back. You are falling into Max's gullet. You try to struggle against Max's muscles, but you might as well try to keep the sun from rising. It is not long before you are deposited into the vast cavern that is your dogs belly. You attempt to find a way to escape from the smooth walls of your dogs stomach. Then the digestive acids begin to flood in through those very walls. The pain does not last long for you. It only takes Max's powerful digestive system a few minutes to process you and Max begins to look for a more substantial morning meal.
13321122121.title: Swallowed

13321122122.content: Max looks with a smile on your face, and decides to ...
13321122122.title: do something else.

133211222.content:
You are nearly home when you once again spot your horse on the path to your house. Worse yet he is in front of the only area of your house you believe you can get into. He has not noticed you in the grass yet and you are careful to remain very still. Horses are very good at detecting motion.

Suddenly the horse begins sniffing the air. He lowers his nose to the ground and begins making his way to you. You remain still and hope that it is a coincidence. That hope is crushed when the horse comes straight to you and you find yourself looking straight up the nostrils of your gigantic horse.

The horse must have been at your house looking for you. He caught your scent and started to head for you. The question now is now that he has found you, does he recognize you?
133211222.title: Keen Sense of Smell

1332112222.content:
You hope that he recognizes you. The two of you had always had a good relationship. Alas, you see the horses ears lay back and know you are in trouble. It is extremely bad news to be as close to the horses mouth as you are. Many people think that since horses are herbivores they do not bite. The fact is that in a fight a horse will bite very often.

Your horse made an attempt at bitting you in half. You managed to avoid those large teeth of his. Unfortunately, the horse still managed to catch you with his flexible, leathery lips. You are squeezed in between his teeth and lips. His tongue is trying to pull you from your present location and further into his maw.

Just because a creature is an herbivore does not mean they will not occasionally deviate. If he chews or swallows you it will kill you, thus accomplishing his objective. You try kicking at the tongue in order to avoid your fate. That thick tongue has dealt with things tougher than you and it soon wraps around you and pulls you out of hiding.

At first it tries to chew you. You manage a series of acrobatic maneuvers you never new you were capable of and avoid his chomping teeth. Just as you start to gain a small amount of confidence, the horse grows tired of you. The horse flexes his tongue and tilts his head back. You try to find something to hold on to but there is nothing but the horses slick tongue.

You are pushed down the horses powerful throat and into his belly. The horse is rather satisfied with himself for dealing with another disgusting bug and continues his search for his master. You ,however, are stuck in the spacious belly of your former friend. You are able to make a couple of observations before the horses digestive acids begin to take affect. Even at your size you know there should not be this much grain in his belly. He must have found a way to gain access to the grain. At least you will not have to worry about him suffering from malnutrition you think as you begin to enter a slumber from which you will never awake.
1332112222.title: If It's Not One Thing It's Another

133212.content:
There was an earsplitting screech that tore through the air. It was much louder than you remember, but you recognize the noise. It was one of the bats that lived in your barn. You never bothered to get rid of them because they did a good job taking care of harmful insects on the farm. But at your size you do not want to give it the chance to make the mistake.

You immediately break out into a run for the grass on the side of the road. You look up and see that the bat is headed straight for you. This inspires you to run even faster. You look behind you once more, but the bat is gone. Then you here the beat of wings in front of you and run straight into a large furry wall.

You are stunned. The bat was much faster than you had hoped it would be. From up close this bat is huge, large enough to swallow you whole. It leans down and sniffs at the strange new creature in its territory. You try to get up to run, but it is of no use.

The bat takes you into its large maw. It plays its tongue over you for quite some time, while you struggle to escape your moist prison.
133212.title: Barnyard Bat

1332121.content:
The bat discovers that whatever this creature is, it is the best thing that it has ever tasted. It savors your flavor for a few moments longer. Then with a couple big gulps you find yourself being pulled down the bats throat and into its belly.

You feel a sudden lurch as the bat takes off into the night sky once again. You are jostled about for a while before the bats digestive acids begin to go into action. You find the bats movements in combination with the lack of air soon lull you into a slumber from which you will never awake.
1332121.title: Bat Food

choices: what the youths did last night.
1332122.content:
That bat sucks in a breath of air and you are launched from the bats mouth. You must not be to its liking. The bat looks at you and directs a few angry noises at you, like it is your fault you taste so bad. It then spreads its wings and flies into the night, the force from the wings knocking you off your feet.

You are dazed and feel physically drained after your near death experience. There is a rock a short distance in the and you decide to rest against it. You are awakened a short time later when you hear a loud barking in the distance.

That must be your German Shepherd. You bought him because you needed a guard dog to keep the local youths from causing trouble on your farm. He must have noticed a stranger on in the area.

Then you notice the things around you look even larger than before. The rock you had been leaning against, which had been around the same size as you, now towered over you like a mountain. Not ready for this shock and still exhausted, you pass out. When you come to the sun is shinning. You notice the rock is now only twice your height.

Whatever that light earlier was, it seems to cause you to change size whenever you are asleep or unconscious. You may return to your normal size if you keep going to sleep. The problem is that at the size you were briefly at would have made you small enough for most insects to crush.

As you are thinking about what to do, you notice...
1332122.title: 1/8 Of An Inch Tall.

13321221.content:
Now you notice what the trespassers were doing last night. It is also the reason you bought a Border Collie. There are a large number of tremors and you can hear the thudding of a large number of hooves hitting the ground.

The type of animals are...
13321221.title: Approaching Danger

133212211.content:
Your sheep had been set free. You only own a few of them, but at your size having the few that you do own on the loose can be a huge danger to you. Your Border Collie has been trained to get the sheep back in their pen when this happens. Having your dog and your sheep running around would be a nightmare for you.

The tremors are starting to grow more intense and the sound of the hooves louder as the small flock of giant sheep comes closer to you. It is not long before you notice the head of one of the sheep towering into the air.

You try to run from the flock but you soon find yourself surrounded by the massive legs and hooves of the sheep as they begin to graze in the area.

The next thing you know...
133212211.title: The Flock

1332122112.content:
You hear a dog barking. It must be your Border Collie, Star, attempting to get the sheep back in the pen. This is horrible timing for you. The sheep start to go into motion.

Not all of the sheep are headed toward you. But even one headed in headed in your direction is more than enough for you. As you are dodging you hooves it is becoming increasingly difficult to maintain your balance. The stampeding sheep are creating what seems like a continuous earthquake to you.

After what seems like an eternity avoiding the massive hooves of the sheep, you risk a glance up and see there is only one sheep left. It is close and you are exhausted. Its front hoof comes within inches of you, close enough to make you stumble to the ground. As a rear hoof is approaching you, you muster enough energy to just barely get out of the way. Unfortunately the hoof clips you on the way up. You feel pain shoot through your body and your vision begins to fade. You try to fight it, but soon you lose this battle.

When you wake you have...
1332122112.title: Bad Timing

choices: Freeze and allow Star reach you.
Bolt to the knothole in the shed siding.
13321221121.content:
Consciousness returns slowly, you open your eyes, feeling sore and thirsty. Sitting up, awake now, you find yourself coated in what appears to be a sticky coat of sand. It's dirt grains greatly enlarged. Looking around brings you a view of grass stems swaying about you like a bamboo field. Still shrunken, but seemingly larger. Evidently you're still in that grassy meadow next to the sheep pen.

A ring toothed wheel, the size of a motorcycle sticks out of a patch of bare earth. It's a gear ring from one of your old bicycles. Carelessly tossed there this spring. judging by that hunk of metal, you guess your height is probably a few inches. Still small, but thankfully not mite sized.

Turning around, you catch sight of a house sized mound of woolly white a dozen yards away. It's the backside of one of your sheep, reclining and contentedly chewing grass. Farther away are other mounds of sheep. They are all in the meadow now.

You stand up, eye level with the short cropped grass clumps and quietly ease your way towards the fence gate leading to the sheep pen. Zig-zagging between the bushy mounds of grass. The pen has more room to get your bearings.

Reaching the meadow gate, soaring above like a railway trestle, you ease around the swung open superstructure and stride into the pen. A landscape of dried depressions and car sized potholes; dried mud hoof prints of your sheep as well as equally large piles of sheep dip here and there.

To your left the fence merges into a castle wall of wood, the side of your your shed. A knothole in the siding by the ground, is wide enough to make a convenient door to walk into your shed and quietly plan in somewhat safer surroundings.

Breathing a sigh of relief, you mutter out loud, voice quavering in an odd pitch. Probably due to your tiny size, "Shrunk up and down like a yo-yo. And almost stomped by my own sheep. Geeze what else can go wrong..."

Taking a few tentative steps towards it, a sense of being watched tickles the back of your neck.

Turning around, brings the realization you're not alone in that sheep pen. Quietly observing you are a set of claws linked to four pillars of white legs, merging to black fur and a white striped visage of muzzle. A head with cocked ears, tilted and staring down at you in curiosity.

Star lowers her huge head, slightly crouched, staring intently in that hypnotic stare that border collies can do to sheep, or to the few inches of curiosity in front of her. A fore paw lifts, shifting her body forward a few inches, yards to you as Star slowly approaches you.
13321221121.title: Journey to the sheep pen

choices: You order her to take you home
133212211211.content:
Star comes to you and smells you. Now she is confused: you are his master, food or an insect? You smell like his master, but you are too small. The dog slowly opens his mouth. You instinctively cover yourself with your arms. And Star licks you. Her big tongue caresses you with strength and cover you with saliva. You smell and taste like his master (suppose) and you are fully covered in dog drool. Does She Needs more testing?

Star licks her lips and barks. She does not understand that has Darkness, but she has no doubt that you are its master. She begins to pant you happy and you order her: <<SIT!>>
Star, obedient, sits and stands motionless, looking at you.
<<Good girl!>> You say
133212211211.title: Good Girl

1332122112112.content:
You suddenly hear a loud noise coming from Star's tummy. She's still looking at you, but this time she is doing it on a different way. She licks her lips very slowly, as if she was about to enjoy a tasty snack. She lowers her head and licks you. A huge pink, wet and soft wall surrounds you, covering you in saliva. You don't know why, but the truth is that you would like it ... if she was not about to eat you.

Star picks you up in her mouth. Now you're lying on a giant dog's tongue. Her teeth closes behind you and a trickle of drool falls from the palate just in your head. You take off the saliva from your eyes and look what's in front of you. The tongue removes, revealing a cavernous, dark pulsing tunnel. Star pushes you with her tongue against the palate and starts to rub it all over your body.

It looks that she likes your taste. After two long minutes of tongue massage, Star's stomach growls again. And she swallows. You fall down the canine's esophagus and, ten seconds later, you land in the stomach.

--------OUTSIDE---------------
A bulge goes down Star's neck and disappears between her chest's hair. She licks her lips once again as she feels the little bug entering her abdomen. Now, with her hunger calmed down, she burps, expulsing mostly of the air in her stomach outside, and goes to the house. The door it's opened, so the dog comes in without any problem. She goes upstairs, enters in YOUR bedroom and jumps on YOUR bed. She knows that you are the one in her belly, but her instincts (and hunger) were more powerful than your condition as a master.

She gives three turns, as if she is making a comfortable seat (like all the dogs), and she lies on her belly in the soft mattress. Her stomach makes a few growls, then Star yawns and falls asleep. At the end, you will ALWAYS be with (in) Star.

The big fish eats the small fish.
1332122112112.title: Journey to the centre of Star

13321221121121.content:
As you sat in your faithful husky's belly, loud gurgles emanated all around you, acids had begun pumping into her stomach, and you knew that your time was up, heavily sighing, you lie down and accept your fate as the acids soon engulf you and slowly digest you, but much to your surprise, the acids were pleasuring, not painful, a final mercy from Star.

In a matter of minutes, your body was broken down into the bare nutrients Star's body required, she used every bit of you to stay healthy, Star would never forget her master, or how tasty he was, as she relieved herself of what remains there were in a pile of scat..
13321221121121.title: Become one with the canine

choices: Nothing--you're safe and alone inside the shed
133212211212.content:
You decide to run for it, and hurry towards the hole in the shed. For some reason, it seems like your dog isn't chasing you--maybe because she recognized your smell and was too confused to act, but you can't be sure. All you know is that you've made it safely into the shed!

You take a few steps away from the hole, and jumpback in surprise when you see a huge pink blob enter through and flop around a bit. You realize Star is using her tongue to investigate the hole, hoping to find you, it seems. You stand there and watch the tongue, judging its size and realizing that your dog could easily fit you in her maw if she caught you. Frightened by that, you turn around and try to take im your surroundings. It's very dark inside the shed, though, so the only thing you can see is...
133212211212.title: Into the shed

1332122112122.content:
You stare back as the small brown mouse, barely bigger than you, watches you intently. You don't move, worried about what it might do to you. Sure, it's only a mouse, and it's about your size, but still, it has claws and sharp teeth. And you don't. The mouse's nose twitches as it rears up onto its back legs, now rising to about twice your height. You suddenly feel worried, and decide it might just be best to leave this mouse alone.

You back up slowly, glancing back to see that Star has stopped licking the hole... You're able to leave if you want to, but it would still be dangerous outside. Even so, the mouse is clearly trying to intimidate you by standing up tall... It might turn hostile if you don't leave soon.

You have two options: stay and hope the mouse is friendly, or leave and hope you're not instantly killed by the animals outside....
1332122112122.title: A mouse staring at you!

13321221121221.content:
You and the mouse were having a staring contest.
Seeing who would make the first move.
The mouse then inched its way towards you,curiously.
You backed up as the mouse got closer,before you knew it,you had backed up into the wall,now cornered by the rodent.
The mouse finally was directly in front of you,sniffing your clothes and your face.
You were speechless,afraid one wrong move would upset it.
The mouse then got a tight grip on your pants leg and pulled back!
You fell and hit your head on the ground as the rodent soon started dragging you in the opposite direction of Luna.
The mouse escaped through another knothole and started running.
You on the other hand were in quite the odd position.
Since the mouse started running,you were being dragged between its four legs and your face was under the now obvious male rat's penis.
You look behind and notice Luna was right on your tail!
The mouse picks up his speed and was obviously frightened.
Luna let out a loud bark,and the mouse was now horrified.
So horrified,it started peeing on itself while running.
And since you were under its shlong,you got a shower of mouse urine in your face.
The mouse then took a hard left and into the horse pen,course,you followed.
Luna jumped over the fence after you and was literally right on its tail.
The mouse did something despicable in efforts to get away from Luna.
The mouse had in fact let go of you causing you to tumble back,being caught in between Luna's legs but luckily not being stomped.
You look up to see that Luna chased the mouse outside of the horse pen,the sound of her foot steps fading away.
The neighs of the horses replaced the sound of Luna running.
You realized you were left in the horse pen after all that chaos.
But you were now closer to your house than before!
Maybe I could hitch a ride on one of my horses... you thought wiping the mouse urine out of your eyes.
Ok,which horse do you attempt to climb...
13321221121221.title: Stay

133212211212212.content:
You freeze in place while the two horses calm down and stop pacing, as trying to get close now would be a suicide mission. You do however climb to the top of a groove in the dirt of the pen so you can get a better look at your surroundings. Your house is still many miles away to you, and there is no way you would make it there without incident.

You feel the minor earthquakes of your two horse's hooves eventually die down and then stop entirely. You turn to see where they are and discover that your male, Cody, is actually not too far away. He had stopped near the pen fence to watch Luna chasing that mouse still. Cody is a Suffolk, one of he largest horse breeds and one of your most prized animals. Now, he was a light brown titan that you had your reservations about taking another step toward. But you did. Then another step, than another, until you were practically running toward him.

Finally, after a bit more time than you would have thought, you stand beside Cody in sufficiently intimidated awe. A single hoof could fit multiple mice beneath it, and you count yourself lucky he didn't go after the mouse too. Standing beside his hoof, his bulky shoulders block his head from your view. Cody, you hope, is still watching the chase scene unfold, and you think hard about how you are going to hitch a ride on him. His tail just barely scrapes the dirt, but his legs are right here. Both are extremely risky to begin with...
133212211212212.title: The big boy

choices: Hurry away before the giant dog notices you
13321221121222.content:
You decide to not risk it with this mouse. It doesn't seem friendly, and besides, Star is probably just outside. If you can get her attention again, she might be able to help you.

So, you keep backing up, constantly watching the mouse, and leave the shed through the same hole. As soon as you're out, you take a quick look around. It looks clear, but you can see Star walking around nearby, her nose to the ground as she sniffs at something only she can smell.

You wonder if it might be a good idea to get her attention... Or maybe just leave her alone and try to go by yourself...
13321221121222.title: Leaving the shed

133212211212221.content:
You decide to trust that your dog will recognize you, and so you begin to shout and yell at her. She hadn't noticed you already because she was busy sniffing at the ground, but the noises you make catch her attention. The dog looks up, trying to find out where the noises are coming from, and you keep shouting.

"Hey! Hey girl! Over here!" you yell.

Star finally notices you. Her big brown eyes focus on you, and she slowly walks towards you. You can feel the ground shake slightly with each step she makes with her huge paws, and you start wondering if she'll recognize you.

You stand still, and let the giantess reach you. The dog now stands over you, her front legs on either side and slightly in front of you, with her head right above you. Her tongue emerges from her mouth as she starts panting, drool almost hitting you. You step back to avoid the drool, looking up to see your dog moving her head down to get a closer look at you.

You continue to stay still as the huge dog sniffs at you and looks you over. But you can't stay motionless when her huge tongue slips out of her mouth and slowly runs over your front from feet to head. You stumble back, coughing and trying to wipe drool off your face, and look up to see Star staring at you.

The question is: does she recognize you, or are you just a bug to her?
133212211212221.title: Shout and get Star's attention

1332122112122211.content:
The dog sits down and barks loudly, making you cover your ears in pain. But as you look up at her. You notice that her eyes see, to soften, and she begins to pant. She watches you, as if she expects you to do something, and you realize that she recognizes you.

"Good girl!" you say, walking up and petting her leg. The giant dog growls quietly, apparently enjoying it. You step back after a little bit, and you look up at your huge dog again. At least she's not hostile to you, but you're still tiny, and you really should start looking for a way to grow again.

You say to your dog, "Hey, can I get on your back?" Star stares down at you, cocking her head to the side. Obviously. She can't understand you. You didn't expect her to, though, and decide to just try to get on her. You shout for her to lie down. And surprisingly, she follows your order. You walk over to her side planning to climb up it and onto her back, but you notice her eyes following you and her ears curling back. You stop and turn to look at her, worried about what that means.

And then suddenly, she grabs you.

You can't react before her jaws part to reveal her tongue, whic shoots out of her mouth and wraps around you. The slimy pink muscle pulls you right into her maw, and as soon as you're inside, her jaws slam shut!

You can't believe it. Is your dog planning to eat you?
1332122112122211.title: She recognizes you!

13321221121222112.content:
Lying on top of Star's tongue, and quickly becoming covered in her drool, you panic. You scream, but your mouth is instantly filled with her saliva, making you gag and cough. You close your eyes and mouth, hoping to stop drool from getting into them, and start squirming.

You feel yourself get tossed around inside the dog's mouth as she plays with you using her tongue. You keep squirming, but hit a tooth with your fist and hurt it badly. You stop struggling to hold your fist in pain, and Star continues to play with her tiny catch. She presses you against the roof of her mouth, holding you there with her tongue, and starts sucking on you. You start to squirm again, but her tongue holds you in place. She continues to suck on your body, quietly growling to show she enjoys it. You keep trying to get out, but soon realize you can't stop her. You stop struggling. Lying there between her tongue and the roof of her mouth as she sucks on your body, tasting you fully.

After what feels like many minutes, though, her tomgue lowers, and you slide off its side underneath it. You're surrounded by a pool of saliva, and start to worry that you'll drown, since breathing is so difficult in this drool-coated prison. Star seems to have stopped tasting you, though, and manipulates you with her tongue so you're now lying on top of it again. Thought your eyes are closed, you can tell since you don't feel yourself in a pool of saliva and feel no tongue pushing down on you. You lie there, wondering if your dog is going to swalow you whole.
13321221121222112.title: In your dog's maw

choices: Star gets distracted by something first!
133212211212221122.content:
Suddenly, you motice things brighten through your closed eyelids, and feel yourself sliding. Luckily, it's not backwards, and you land hard on the ground. You get up, completely covered in drool, with your clothes mostly dissolved from saliva and Star's playing. You can barely open your eyes to see through the drool coating you, and see Star lying in front of you looking somewhat sad. She whines and stares at you as you roll in the grass to try and get the saliva off you.

When you get up, you notice that your clothes have been dissolved into rags, that thankfully still manage t cover your privates. You glare at Star, and suddenly begin shouting at her.

You yell for a few minutes, angry at her for grabbing you and almost eating you. You never imagined you would have to scold your dog for trying to eat you alive, but then again, you never thought you would be less than an inch tall either. Star watches you and whines as you yell, and finally, you stop. You keep staring at her, and she just stares back. You realize she feels bad for giving into her urges to eat tiny things, and hopefully won't try it again. You decide to try to get on her back again, and this time, you succeed. Clearly, Star is sorry, and i seems like she won't try to hurt you again.

"Now," you say. "Don't do that ever again. I'll forgive you if you help me find out how I shrunk, and how to get back to normal. So... We should go to the barn, because that's where I was leaving when that light appeared and I shrunk. Maybe we can find something between that and the house."

Star doesn't understand what you're saying, but she can understand some of it, like the word barn. And after you grab fistfuls of her fur in your hands and start tugging them to steer her, she understands where you want to go. And so, riding on your dog's now-huge back, you go to find what shrunk you.
133212211212221122.title: Taming the giantess

13321221122.content:
You come awake. You are almost afraid to open your eyes. It is tempting to just lay here for a while. Then you decide you have to open your eyes eventually and it might as well be now. When you see the grass towering over you like skyscrapers you wish you had left them closed. This is the smallest size you have been so far.

Then you feel the ground begin to shake much more violently than when the sheep were running. A shadow descends over you. You see the titanic figure of Star looming over you. You think of running away, but quickly reason that it would be pure coincidence if it did any good. At your size Star's paws are the size of a few city blocks.

The shadow of Star's paw comes over you and...
13321221122.title: Titanic Star

133212211221.content:
You watch helplessly as Star's paw begins to come down on you. A single one of her toes is larger than multiple skyscrapers to you. That paw seems impossibly large to you. As it comes closer time seems to slow down. You can make out every little detail on that paw. But all to soon the paw comes down with such crushing force that death is almost instantaneously to you.

Star just continues on to her destination. She never even breaks her stride, after all she has crushed bugs many times your size and never noticed doing it. Even if she had looked at her paw, Star would never have noticed the insignificant red stain you had left on it. And life goes on, minus you.
133212211221.title: Unavoidable Doom

133212211222.content:
The paw is coming down on you. You know that you will surely be crushed by your beloved dog. But when Star's paw comes down with an earsplitting boom, you are amazed to see you are still intact. You just happen to be in between to incredibly large toes. Even the hairs on the paw look thicker than trees to you.

Then you think that you may have to repeat this with Star's rear paws. You quickly try to climb a nearby hair. You manage to get a good grip before her paw lifts up again and you are swung violently through the air. As this repeats you work your way further up Star's paw until you feel you are secure somewhere in the middle of her toes. Star is an energetic dog and stays in near constant motion for much of the day. By the time she finally begins to fell tired you are surprised you have not become more sick than you already are.

You did not notice it in your sickly state, but Star has actually come back inside your house to consume the meal she had been forced to put off earlier in the day. She runs into the kitchen slipping on the tiles. The abrupt motion of her slipping caused you to go soaring from her toes. When you came down you landed on...
133212211222.title: In Star's Toes

1332122112221.content:
You land hard on a piece of dog food. You are unharmed, but you see Star standing above you and do not think that will last for long. You try jumping up and down and yelling to get Star's attention. Being smaller than a flea, even a dog's keen sense of hearing cannot detect you.

Star's enormous tongue lands right on the piece of food you are on and you as well. The good thing is that you stick to the saliva on her tongue and avoid getting chewed with the dog food. You are to small for Star to even taste you on her tongue. When Star swallows, the muscles in her gullet barely even need to push you into her stomach, you practically tumble all the way down.

You land in her stomach with the dog food as more keeps descending her gullet as Star continues to feed. You scramble onto some of the chewed up food as digestive acids begin to flood into the stomach. The air begins to run out in and your impromptu raft is dissolving rapidly. Your raft completely dissolves before you can lose consciousness. When you hit the acid you are so small that you dissolve almost instantly, a small mercy. At the size you were it could not even be said that your death served to contribute to Star's meal.
1332122112221.title: Star's Food

1332122112222.content:
Your landing is painful as you come down on the tiled floor. You are in a great deal of pain, but as you check yourself over you seem uninjured. Then you look over at Star. Due to your proximity to her you cannot see her entire body in your field of vision. You cannot even look all the way up her legs without falling over.

Star finishes her meal and departs the kitchen. Fortunately, you are not in her path this time. You decide to try to walk toward the wall and out of the middle of the floor. After a couple of hours you reach the edge of the tile. What should be a small gap between the tiles is like a small canyon to you. You manage to climb down and back up the other side. The task was exhausting and you are going to have to repeat this many times.

You are approaching the wall and think you will make it. Suddenly you feel a series of earthquakes. You look to see what it is. Looking up you see...
1332122112222.title: Any Landing You Can Walk Away From...

13321221122221.content:
There, as big as life, is your German Shepherd Max. You wonder what he is doing in the kitchen. Then you see a head as large as a mountain bend down and sniff the floor. A large, powerful tongue emerges from his mouth and begins to lick the floor. He must be licking up crumbs.

You turn around to continue on your journey to the wall. Your jaw drops as you see a large piece of dog food in front of you. Well, large to you at least. To Max it would just be another small crumb. You hope Max will miss this particular crumb. Just as you think this a shadow covers the tile you are on. You look up and see Max’s muzzle descending toward you. A scream erupts from you as you see his tongue come from his mouth.

The tongue picks up both you and the crumb. Max does not swallow immediately. You try to find a way out of his mouth. At your size Max’s saliva is very sticky and in some areas of his tongue you find that you have to swim through pools of his saliva.

You discover why Max has not swallowed yet. With dizzying speed, Max’s tongue licks up a few more crumbs with you still adhered to his tongue. After a few more licks Max finally swallows.

The journey down Max’s gullet is quick and painful. You slid down the walls of Max’s huge belly and land in a pile of putrid dog food. His digestive acids have just started pouring in. You try to climb to the top of the pile of food. The amount of food in the dog’s stomach is deceptive to you. It may seem like a small island to you, but to Max it is not even a mouth full of food. Your island dissolves quickly and you even more so. The only thought Max has of you is where you are and why you have not feed him, not realizing you just have.
13321221122221.title: Last Meal

13321221122222.content:
Your horse is just outside. It seems to have noticed a spider on the floor through a window. The earthquakes are the horse banging on the door trying to get inside. This has happened before and you tried to discourage it. You know you have not been entirely successful since you come home to a beat up door every so often.

This excites Star and she goes up to the door and begins barking at the horse. Star may be a titan to you, but the horse makes her seem tiny. You hope the door can hold but do not depend on it. It would probably be best to leave the kitchen for now and avoid the clash of the titans.
13321221122222.title: Horse Troubles

choices: you are rubbed off on the ground.
133212211222221.content:
The two titans do not pay attention to you as you make your escape. You make it to the jungle that is your carpet and attempt to make it under a couch were you will be safe for a little while. After a few minutes the noise in the kitchen begins to fade away. You are not sure exactly how things turned out since the carpeting was distorting the noise.

You climb a part of the carpet to make sure you are headed in the right direction. When you reach the top the world around you starts to shake. That is when you see your German Shepherd, Max, sniffing the floor and getting closer to you. Max thinks he has caught the scent of his missing master.

When he gets closer you can feel the force of his sniffing. Since you are only the size of a speck of dust you find yourself being sucked up by his nose. When he stops breathing in you find yourself in free fall. You have no doubt that the fall will kill you.

Then Max breaths in again and you are on course for his nose again. You impact on his cold, moist nose. You easily stick to the nose. When you look down you hope you do not un-stick. Chances are you would die of a heart attack before you could come close to hitting the ground. Then...
133212211222221.title: The Search

1332122112222211.content:
Max loses your scent and stops sniffing. His nose is itching from the sniffing. His tongue comes out of his mouth and you stare at it as the pink object fills your entire field of vision. His tongue pulls you off his nose and into his mouth.

His breath reeks. You are in the middle of a pool of saliva. To you it is deep enough that you have to swim through it. You try to reach solid ground when Max swallows. You tumble into his throat. The speed at which you descend his throat is incredible to you.

You fall out an opening and into Max's stomach. Darkness surrounds you. You cannot see that Max is already digesting a previous meal. You just know the smell is horrible. When you hit the acids that were already in his stomach it is like landing in lava. You are dissolved in the blink of an eye. Max decides to sit down next to the front door and await your return.
1332122112222211.title: The Itch

1332122112222212.content:
Max lowers his head to the ground and rubs his nose on the carpet, wiping you off of his nose before running off. You seem to be stuck to the carpet. You try and try to pull yourself free but nothing works. Your about to give up when you hear something. You look around just as Star comes rushing out of the kitchen.

You scream as Star's paw comes down on top of you. You shut your eyes and cover your face. You feel what is like an earthquake as Star's paw comes down, but your still alive. You look around and see in between Star's toes. She missed you. Thats when you realize that this is your chance. Quickly you grab onto a hair in between Star's toes. As Star lifts her foot, you are pulled free. But not knowing that it was going to feel so hard, you lost your grip as you were lifted into the air. You fall back onto the carpet. Your not hurt and now your free. You look as Star goes to sleep on her bed.

You...
1332122112222212.title: Stuck

choices: You fly into the water bowl
You fly into the food bowl
13321221122222121.content:
You think that it seems that Star has done nothing but help you in your current situation. You run up to Star hoping that she will be able to help you more. You finally reach Star. Star is asleep on her side. You can see as her chest rises and falls as she breathes through her nose. Luckily her head is lying off of her bed and on the ground which gives you the chance to communicate with her.

You walk up to her closed mouth and stroke her lips. Stars chest stops rising. You don't know what is going on but you have a bad feeling. You take 2 steps back before Star opens her mouth and inhales.

You are pulled off of your feet into the mouth of the only dog that you thought could save you. You scramble to your feet on the side of her mouth. You run to the slowly closing exit of her mouth. You get just up to her teeth before teeth come down right in front of you, almost slicing you in half. You take two steps back and fall back on your ass, knowing that your officially screwed.

There is nothing left to do, once Star swallows, you'll go down. Having nothing left to do, you lie back on the side of Stars check and fall asleep.

You wake up and see that Star's teeth have grown more than double the size they were the other day. Before you get the chance to do anything. Something heavy falls on you, almost crushing you, but if it doesn't move soon, it will crush you. You struggle you lift it but it's too heavy and slimy. It is soon lifted off of you by itself, problem is that you are lifted too. You soon realize that it is Star's tongue as Star wakes up, yawning, sticking her tongue out, letting you see her water and food bowl. This doesn't last long as Star's smelling dog breathe, hits you so hard that at your size, you seem to be flying as fast as a bullet.
13321221122222121.title: Go to Star

133212211222221212.content: You shoot out of Star's maw and land smack dab onto a big pile of dog food, you had landed into her food bowl! You struggle to get out of the somewhat sticky food, looking up to see Star stretching, you faintly hear a growl, realizing it came from star's belly, you knew you were in trouble, you just prayed that star would get a drink first...
133212211222221212.title: Breakfast Bowl

1332122112222212122.content:
Star trotted to her water dish, you uttered a sigh of relief as you heard her start lapping up mouthfuls of cool water, stopping periodically to swallow, you saw her tail wag as she quenched her thirst, before remembering where you were. You wiggled about, trying still, to get out of the food dish, then you heard Star softly pant, she's finished her drink, and is now moving towards the bowl!

You look up and gasp a bit, seeing star licking her lips, about to enjoy breakfast, as her maw parts and slowly descends.. She chomps out a mouthful of food from a bit away from you and started eating, murring softly as she chewed her food, you shivered as she swallowed the mouthful, a small bulge traveling down her neck to her hungry stomach, then drools as she goes for another mouthful, and right where you're at!

You wiggle around faster as star's maw descends... You give one more twist and...
1332122112222212122.title: Always quench thirst first

choices: Max comes in, hungry as well
13321221122222121221.content: As the black hole that is Star's gaping maw approaches, her tongue extends and gives your piece of food a lick before chomping down. However, since you had just freed yourself, her tongue ended up flinging you out of the bowl, and in the center of the kitchen. Great, back where you started. At that moment...
13321221122222121221.title: You get out!

choices: The horse crashes through the door!
133212211222221212211.content: The ground shakes as you hear the horse whinny. It appears to be looking right at you! You wonder how that is, until you turn to the right and see a massive spider just a few hundred feet away! As the hinges on the door threaten to break, it appears the spider has noticed you, and is crawling towards you!
133212211222221212211.title: The horse outside spots you!

1332122112222212122111.content: A blast of noise sends you reeling as the monstrous equine charges through the door, its neigh a terrifying roar. Before you can react, a city-sized hoof slams down on the enormous spider, pulverizing the arachnid in an instant. You are spared; the mountain of keratin was a good mile away from you. However, this was not the end of the ride. The horse, afraid that more spiders may be about, starts bucking to and fro. This act is dangerous to a normal human: to you it's Armageddon. You scramble for cover, but find none. Instead, you just pray that the massive horse doesn't crush you like a flea. A shadow looms overhead, and you see a hoof crash down just a hundred feet away from you. The catastrophic stomp sends you skyward. You flail through the kitchen, a massive strand of hair appearing before you. It's...
1332122112222212122111.title: The horse crashes through the door!

13321221122222121221111.content: You cling to the thick cable. Below you is a slick, reflective orb. Inside, a rectangular iris swells and dilates as it looks about. Beneath you, the thunderous roar of the horse neighing booms forth. Suddenly, the eye seems to swivel up and fix on you. Knowing this horse's past reaction to a spider near its eye, you really hope it can't see you.
13321221122222121221111.title: The horse's eyelash!

133212211222221212211112.content:
The pupil shrinks, and you get a bad feeling as the horse practically shrieks, finally shattering your eardrums. Left with a piercing, ringing drone in your head you almost forget to hold on as the horse bucks wildly about your kitchen. At one point it even slams its head against the wall, which knocks you loose. You plummet to the ground again, where city-sized hooves bounce about in a completely unpredictable manner. It doesn't take long for you to end up underneath one, with not even enough time to scream in terror.

After another minute of bucking about, the horse finally settles down and leaves, unaware it took its masters crushed remains with it.
133212211222221212211112.title: It can

13321221122222121221112.content:
It was fast as the hairs the size of a rope passed by you that quick you could only grasp them. You were swung around as the horse continued to flail around. Breaking things and damaging the house. You didn't care as long as you lived through it. After a good long while the horse stopped and stood still the tail raised for a bit as the horse was huffing and calming down...

Ever so slowly the tail lowered and lowered till its tail rested where it was normally... Now that you had your breath again you looked to the horse's...
13321221122222121221112.title: The horse's tail!

choices: On one of the two dogs
Out through a crack in the window
133212211222221212212.content:
You look up at Star, who once again fills your field of view, and decide that trying to get her attention is pointless. Even if she recognizes you, what could she possibly do to help? You're on your own, and have no choice but to survive.

You don't get too long to think about this, as you feel 4 thunderous paws approach. Eventually, Max's head appears in the doorway, as well as the rest of his body. He walks across the kitchen, and towards his bowl. Of course, you're in the way of the massive beast, and can only watch as the city-sized paws get closer with each mighty step. Eventually, his front right paw hovers over you. Thankfully, it comes to rest just in front of you instead of on top. Unfortunately, you are so small that the mere air displacement sends you skyward. The behemoth of a German Shepherd continues towards his bowl, creating another draft that sends you...
133212211222221212212.title: Max comes in, hungry as well

1332122112222212122121.content: The draft caused by Max's walking sucks you behind him. He stops at his food bowl, leaving you to float precariously over his body, finally landing on the tip of his ear. You hang onto a hair that was as thick around as you. Beneath you is a cacophony of crunching and squelching as the German Shepherd greedily wolfs down his food. You cling to the ear with all your strength, terrified of the din below you. Finished with his meal, Max whips around and runs through the house; you tried to stop this behavior, but he still runs when he thinks you're not home. However, this time it may have dire consequences, as you lose your grip and fall...
1332122112222212122121.title: On one of the two dogs

13321221122222121221212.content: You tumble down into the massive cave. After bouncing back and forth, you land on your back in a clump of ear wax. The sticky material keeps you glued stuck. You struggle hopelessly against the thick liquid, but to no avail. You call out to the massive dog, but nothing comes of it. Slowly but surely, you succumb to your hunger and thirst, trapped inside man's best friend.
13321221122222121221212.title: Into his ear

1332122112222212122122.content:
As you soar, you notice that one of the kitchen windows are ever so slightly open. Of course, a fraction of an inch is as big to you as a battleship, so that's not saying much. Coincidentally, a draft seems to be pulling you towards that window. With a tiny "whoosh", you are swept back outside. The wind picks you up even higher and carries you far off from your house.

To your best guess, it's been at least an hour since you were floating on the breeze. The chaotic currents have sent you flying about your farm, but the wind appears to be dying down. You see that you will be landing on top of something, and as you approach you realize it's a...
1332122112222212122122.title: Out through a crack in the window

choices: You manage to reach the edge
13321221122222121221221.content: You land on a white plain. It appears to extend for miles in all directions, but to you that might as well be mere inches. The rocky ground is made of some white rock, and the rolling hills occasionally give way to quagmires of some sticky liquid. The final clue to the puzzle is the overwhelming scent of salt: you're on a salt lick! This could be really bad, you've got to travel miles across this block of salt before an animal comes for some minerals.
13321221122222121221221.title: Salt lick

133212211222221212212212.content: You hear the tell-tale sounds of thunderous clopping as an animal approaches the salt lick. You turn to see that it's
133212211222221212212212.title: Too late, a tongue descends...

choices: You manage to stay alive, and even break free of your salty bonds
1332122112222212122122121.content: You turn and see the massive muzzle of that horse. That damn horse. Soon enough, the enormous equine's mouth is just above you, and a pink, slimy muscle as wide as a city reveals itself, and begins to slide across the salt lick. You run, but it's like running from a freight train. Sure enough, the titanic tongue slams into your back, and the sticky mixture of salt and saliva adheres you to the muscle. The horse repeats this a few more times, with each lick solidifying the glue that holds you in place. Begging for mercy, you find none as the tongue returns to its cavern, passing under a set of teeth that could crush an army. A foul odor completely destroys your nose as you sit inside the horse's mouth.
1332122112222212122122121.title: That damn horse!

13321221122222121221221211.content:
Your tiny form is on a miles-wide pink plain of massive taste bud hills and a few lakes of sticky saliva. More specifically, you are glued to a grain of salt in one of those saliva swamps. All around you are ivory monoliths that could crush an insect hundreds of times larger than you and never notice. You seem to be doomed, but you don't give up hope just yet. With all your might, you tug at the salty adhesive, breaking free your right arm. With your newfound leverage you yank your other arm out, then pry your head and torso off. You work on freeing your legs when the world spins downward, and a blinding light shines from the end of the maw. You get a quick glimpse of what's ahead, only to recognize the shimmering surface as a body of water. The horse's head descends towards the ocean, and starts to drink.

If you weren't smaller than any known animal on Earth, this flood would be one of biblical proportions. A turbulent storm of water sweeps past you, instantly dissolving the salt grain and catapulting you up the mouth to the throat. There, gravity takes over and you slide all the way down to the stomach, landing on a grass stalk wider than Central Park. As more water enters the stomach your massive raft is rocked about, but you manage to stay afloat. Finally, the storm ends.

Ok, you can get out of here. But first, you're really tired all of a sudden. You should take a quick nap, before you do anything rash. That's right, just a quick...nap............

You succumb to the noxious fumes, and will be completely dead in a few short minutes. The horse, unaware of the epic struggle that just occurred, stands back to its full height and returns to its pen, waiting for its master to come and clean it.
13321221122222121221221211.title: The horse swallows

choices: You begin your climb down the horse
You spoke too soon, time for your luck to run out!
13321221122222121221221212.content:
A lake of saliva forms over you, quickly dissolving the rock-solid salt. Now free, you swim to the edge and clamber on top of a taste bud hill. You look out upon the dark, moist expanse that is your horse's mouth. With no better option, you proceed to walk towards the maw.

The trip is uneventful. You can't tell what's going on outside, as the noises out there are muffled and mixed with the rushing sound of blood and air in the nostrils above you. Occasionally, the horse whinnies or nickers, deafening you for a few moments as the thunderous noise passes. Eventually, you reach the edge of the tongue, and slide down to the gums. A mountain of slimy skin and solid ivory lays before you: time to get climbing.

You're surprised at how well this is going so far. You'd think by now something would have happened that would have set back your progress, but so far it's been pretty "safe", all things considered. You reach the top of one of the toothy mountains, and can see the outside in a gap between the lips. You make a running leap, and land on the leathery ridge, with escape just in reach!
13321221122222121221221212.title: You manage to stay alive, and even break free o...

133212211222221212212212121.content: You reach the mountain of leather, and grab hold. After a minute of climbing, you reach the top, and can see outside at the brown floor and red walls. You...er, the horse must be inside your barn. You can feel the rhythmic rumbles of the horse's footsteps beneath you as he meanders towards his stall. Tired, he shakes his head up and down: a small gesture, but a cataclysm to you. You fly off his lip, and land on...
133212211222221212212212121.title: Escaping the horse's mouth

choices: Letting out all the other horses!
1332122112222212122122121212.content: You land on a straw of hay. Four hooves rumble past you, too far away to be any danger. You watch the gigantic horse walk through your stable, stopping occasionally. You wonder what he's doing for a while. With a sense of dread, you realized that the horse is...
1332122112222212122122121212.title: The floor beneath him

13321221122222121221222.content: A moving mass approaches quickly, you soon recognize it as...
13321221122222121221222.title: Animal

choices: The head swings down into its feeding trough
The pig rolls over into the mud
133212211222221212212221.content: Your view is filled by a mountain of pink, spattered with bits of brown. You land on one of the brown spots, a mountain of dried mud atop a pig. The ground shakes as the porcine behemoth wanders around its pen. You start to walk towards the head when...
133212211222221212212221.title: A pig in a sty!

1332122112222212122122211.content: The landscape rotates and you find yourself sliding uncontrollably. The horizon is replaced with an endless ocean of brown water and random scraps of food, each bigger than a skyscraper. You tumble off the pig's snout and land on a chunk of potato. The smell is horrific, and you nearly puke right then and there. Restraining yourself, you turn and watch the maw of the pig descend into the muck, sucking up the slop. The slobbering noises, amplified a million times, pierce your eardrums. Combined with the stench, you finally vomit. You're too busy spewing your guts to notice that your island is drifting towards the pig, bringing you dangerously close to the oblivious pig. Its jaws snap up the potato chunk, knocking you off and into the sludge. As the pig enjoys its meal, you eventually end up...
1332122112222212122122211.title: The head swings down into its feeding trough

choices: You went down with the slop
It decided to play with a tasty piece left on it tongue then swallows it whole
The pig starts to chew what's left in it mouth
13321221122222121221222111.content: Falling off the potato chunk, you plummet back towards the trough, plopping into the slop itself. In a few seconds, all of your progress fades into nothingness, you slide into the stomach again, utterly unable to move. You lie in the cow's saliva, covered by the pile of hay that sealed your demise. Closing your eyes, you listen to your cow's heartbeat, surrounded by that destructive warmth and humid air. Your breathing slows down drastically.

133222.content:
This story follows the unfortunate tale of Brad. Brad was having a great life, right up in till the moment when he didn’t.

That moment came on a normal day for Brad. He had gone around his regular routine, having breakfast, brushing his teeth, getting ready for work, and heading out. He worked at an old farm, owned by a nice old couple. The farm was a place for race horses in the off season, and since it was winter, with a good two feet of snow on the ground, the place was packed.

The first hint that this day was going to end poorly for him, was a text that he got from one of his co-workers. It was informing Brad that he was going to take care of the mares alone, as his co-workers car had broken down. You see there are two barns with their own staff, the work is shifted so that two employs are at a barn around the clock. There used to be only one barn at the farm, housing both male and female horses. But after a couple law suites, and an unexpected foal, they built a second barn.

Brad wasn’t all that worried about working at the barn alone, the mares that he took care of were friendly enough, especially to him. So he was still feeling alright when he punched in, and started to clean out the horses stables. Shoveling their manure and wet bedding into a wheelbarrow, then dumping it out behind the barn onto a large pile.

But soon the mood left him, because even though the horse’s stalls were cleaned not too long ago, there were still a ton of stalls. And by the time he dumped out the last wheelbarrow load he was hot, sweating, and extremely dirty. He wasn’t even done yet, as he still had to feed and water the horses.

When he had finally finished all of the hard manual labor work, he sat down on the floor of the hall resting his back against one of the stall doors, utterly exhausted. He lean his head back his eye lids drooping, when suddenly something wet and sticky ran over the top of his head. Brad jumped up spinning around to face his assailant.

But he let out a sigh of relief, it was only Carly, his favorite horse. He stepped forward and petted her long speckled white nose.

“Oh hey girl, sorry I forgot to say hi, I was just really busy. Actually I didn’t even realize I was sitting in front of your stall.”

The horse closed her eyes seeming to enjoy the attention Brad was giving her. Then she stepped back as to invite him into her stall. Brad looked around. Ah what the heck, I mine as well sleep in there as out here. He thought to himself, then he unlatched the door and walked in, shutting the door behind himself. Taking another step into the stall his foot landed with a *Squelch* in a pile of horse dung.

“Ugh” Brad grunted, looking up at Carly, she look at him with an almost, almost, apologetic look. Brad shook his shoe, trying to remove what had stuck itself onto him. Then he walked over to the corner farthest away from the pile, and sat down. Carly laid down next to him, setting her heavy head gently on his lap. And as such Brad fell asleep, to the rhythmic breath of the horse.

Brad awoke imminently knowing something was amiss. He stood shakily rubbing the sleep out of his eye, and looked around. He nearly fell back over, he was still in the stall, it just looked like he was laying on his back. He looked down just to reaffirm it, and sure enough he could see his feet under him, which could mean only one thing… He had shrunk!

He started to panic. “What do I do?”

He looked around wildly. “I need a phone, I need to call someone! But how would I press the buttons?”

Then he slapped himself on the forehead, and dug in his pocket pulling out his cellphone. He had a moment of excitement, in till he realize the phone had no service.

“Of course it doesn’t.”
He threw the phone in frustration, then looked at the stable door, shut and latched. Only then did he remember the horse, he looked up again, and saw her standing near the opposite corner.

“”Hey, Carly!” He jumped up and down waving his arms. “Over here!”

The horse lifted its head gazing around the stall, in till it spots Brad jumping. It takes a few steps forward, lowering its head to sniff him.

“Whoa there girl, I like you and all, but I don’t want to end up one of your nostrils.”

The horse tilts its head examining the minuscule figure on the floor, thinking.

“Hey could you help me out here? All I need is for you to unlatch the door there,” He pointed at the stall door. “I know you can do it, just let me out.”

The horse keeps its head tilted, still inspecting Brad, as if pondering something.

“Uh, hello?”

The horse finally moves again having made up its mind, deciding to....

Brad got spat out of the horse’s mouth, falling into something that was a shiny silver color. He slid down the slight slope of the mysterious object, in till he reached the bottom, where upon he landed in a pool of the horse’s spit.

He sat up wiping the goo off his face. When he had cleared his vision he looked up at the horse, whose head was still hovering above him.

“What did you that for?” He asked incredulously. “Now I’m stuck in this…” He looked around. “…Food bowl? How is this going to help me get out?”

The horse starred blankly down at him, then it bared its teeth, in what was almost a smile.

“Whoa!” Brad said raising his hands above his head. “I’m fine with being in the bowl.”

The horse’s head disappeared over the rim of the dish, leaving Brad staring at the empty space, where it had just vacated.

“Hey where did you go…?” He trailed off as he saw the horse reappear in his field of view.

But instead of the horse’s head looking over him, it was the horse’s ass!

Brad stared wide eyed at the horse’s rear, he could see everything clearly, the wrinkled anus, the vulva under it. The horse swished its tail, bringing a torrent of wind down on brad. He watched as the horse’s anus began to expand, letting out gush of air that fell down on him, the earthy smell overwhelming him, his eyes watered.

He stumbled trying to get away from the gas, when he heard a dull “Thump”, and looking up he saw a ball of brown sliding down the bowl’s edge; coming towards him. He tried to move away, but it was too late, and with a “Shplrt” the waste enveloped him.

He fought to brake free, but it only made the situation worse by getting the stuff in his mouth and nose. The bitter taste reminded him of dirt that was mixed with vinegar.

He pushed at the mass that surrounded him in till at last he broke free, and gasping for air he pulled himself out of the feces. But he had no time to rest as another glob of the manure fell from the horse’s bowels into the bowl. He narrowly avoided it, then he looked up to watch as the next section of shit was being pushed out.

The skin of the horse’s anus stretching around the log as it made its way out, then it fell onto the stainless steel bowl, shaking the entire thing. Brad looked for another to come but it didn’t, the asshole closed.

Brad sighed in relief, only to recoil as a steam of yellow liquid came flowing out of the horse’s vagina, splashing down on him. He instantly lost his footing and fell, and began to be swirled around the bowl, floundering in the golden water.

His head went under for a moment caught in the current, and he swallowed some piss, then trying to spit it out he only got more in. He only broke the surface after the river was dammed, and he was gagging at the taste of the liquid.

He looked for a way out of the lake of waste, but all the sides were too steep and smooth for him to get out on. So instead he clung onto a floating piece of the horse’s shit.

Glancing up Brad saw that the horse had turned around and was again looking at him.

“What do you want?” He shouted at it.

The horse showed its teeth again, defiantly smiling, it knew what it wanted next…

You jump out of your car, eager to head on over to the beach. Summer is in its prime, and the heat is on. You've taken the liberty to plan the perfect beach vacation. Already checked into the hotel and everything else, you've now found just what you're looking for: the perfect private beach getaway. You sigh in contentment, and bring your beach towel and umbrella to the white-sanded coastline, quickly setting up your things and lathering yourself up for that perfect tan. With your favorite novel, you lie down and finally finish the last part before placing it on your towel and dozing off...

As you slowly blink into awakening, you notice that everything seems to have sprouted up out of the ground. Your towel is huge, you novel got really big, and the rushing of the water is almost deafening. Wait, no, it wasn't everything else, it was you! You've been shrunken down to a single inch in height! Luckily, there doesn't appear to be a single thing around, but this could be bad in a way, as you have no idea when you'll revert back to normal!

The question, then, is what to do? Will you...
141.title: The One-Inch Wonder

choices: Stay and hope the turtle isn't hungry.
1411.content:
You decide that staying on land would be an outrageous idea (since seagulls came to land, and they're just ravenous), and head out for the water.

As you run towards the water, something is making its way out of that water. It appears to be a sea turtle coming onto land. More specifically, a Kemp's ridley. Being the smallest of the sea turtles, it rarely makes its way to shore for egg-laying purposes. It's a rare sight indeed, almost poetically beautiful. It would be much better if you weren't snack sized, though. You think about dashing away, but perhaps it'd be a good time to observe the laying of the eggs. Maybe it will just pass you up and go do its thing. The decision, more or less, is yours.
1411.title: Approach of the Turtle

14111.content:
Being somewhat of a closet nature enthusiast, and being alone (and small), you decide to stick around and watch the mother turtle lay her eggs.

Stepping slightly to the side as the mother turtle approaches, she stops and eyes you up. You're still calm, but this doesn't last very long as the turtle takes you into its mouth. You dangle outside, struggling helplessly as the turtle appears to be tasting you with a tiny little blob of a tongue. It takes a gulp, and more of your body goes in. You struggle there for a bit longer as the turtle tastes more of you, tongue quivering slightly over your back. Another gulp, and as your legs begin entering its gullet, your whole body is in its mouth now. For what seems to take an eternity, the blobby, sticky tongue moves over your entire body. Finally, it begins taking bigger gulps to send you on your way. You slowly descend into its throat and towards it stomach, which you can hear give a rather loud grumble. Another long while later, you are finally deposited into its gut. You land in a sticky but clear substance, which you determine to be the remains of small jellyfish it ate. You're not at all scared, but rather comfortable. You lie down in the reptile's belly and quickly take to sleep, one of which you would not awaken from.

The small sea turtle came to rest on the beach. It stopped and rested. This new morsel, along with the other prey it ate, was going to make great food for her young. She rested and digested this new prey to let it become a part of the yolk her young would feed from.
14111.title: Appreciating the Inside of Nature

14112.content:
Even though you have no fear of turtles, you decide that being so small makes you a target, and run away from the turtle. Its eyes follow you for a moment, then it continues forward.

As you make your way to the water, you stumble back, narrowly avoiding the wall of water that comes up to you, then recedes. You really don't want to go into that water being only one inch, everything will want a piece of you, and you're not much bigger than a piece. So, which way are you going now?
14112.title: A Fork on the Beach, sans actual fork.

141121.content:
Thinking with the right brain, you choose to go left and see what becomes of it.

As you make your way along the shoreline and narrowly avoid the tide's pull, you see a wading bird, more specifically an egret, land right in front of you. It appears as if your right brain was wrong.

The bird lands, takes a single stride forward, eyes you backing up, then quickly strikes, grabbing you and taking quick gulps to work your tiny frame into its throat. It takes but seconds to go from ground to gullet. The slide down is quite a long way due to the bird's long neck. The muscle works quickly and efficiently to bring you to the egret's crop. After a while, you finally arrive, and determine that this can't be good. You completely panic, which only makes things worse. Finally, you just collapse and give up, and with one final sigh, you let sleep overtake your body just as the crop begins to do the 'chewing' for the bird. Ouch. You're an avian appetizer.
141121.title: Wading Birds: Elegant and Hungry

141122.content:
You choose to go to the right, and begin walking along the shoreline.

As you make your way along the shore, you begin to admire how the tide seems to mesmerize all who look upon it. You fall under its supposed spell, and suddenly, you're grabbed and dragged under, but not by any living creature. The tide crept up to you and is now dragging you out to sea. Uh-oh, looks like the 'right' path might've actually been a tad bit wrong.

In any case, you manage to get back up to the surface in time to take in some air. Eventually, things calm down, and at the moment there is no way you'd have any chance of making it back to shore. It might be nice to dive down and inspect the wildlife in the water, but who knows how long you'll last? What to do now, you wonder.
141122.title: Grabbed by the Tide

1411221.content:
Despite what could go on down below, you decide to dive down into the water. Taking a deep breath, you kick your feet up, and start powering down into the deep.

You observe all kinds of fish, careful not to make yourself too obvious. Most of the fish don't seem to be paying you any mind as they go about their business. A few stop and look at you, but then swim onward. Life seems much more beautiful when you're too small to scare it away. You go to the surface to take a breath of air, then go back down, observing a few herbivorous fishes go about picking and sucking along for greens. Colorful, but not dangerous at all. You wish you had a camera at that moment. Quite suddenly, the fish swim away, catching you in a small current of runaway fish. Taking a quick gulp of air from the surface, you dive again and observe a young killer whale, just shy of 8 feet, crusing around the area. Asserting his position at the top of the food chain, he makes his way over to you to check you out. Believeing that you're much too small to be of interest to this whale of a whale, you don't panic, and pat its cute little rostrum.

Hm...I guess you didn't think about it, but this guy is king, and no pauper will take his throne. His tongue curls out like a pink carpet, and catches you, taking and rolling you into his teeth-laden maw. You're in panic, and the orca seems to love it, tasting you and feeling your struggles. He does everything he can to assert his dominance, placing you under his tongue and swimming about for a bit, coming up for air before going back down and resuming his taste test of you. Soaked in orca drool, you've given up the fight. Now, he gulps you down into his thick and powerful gullet, which pushes down tightly to take you into his forestomach, a place that simply reeks of rotted fish. You pass out with enough speed that you don't even notice the forestomach's actions, those of which include chewing you up as the orca cannot do that himself.

The young killer whale, having satiated its appetite for some fresh prey, swims off, wondering somewhere in his fair-sized mind where he could get more of these prey items.
1411221.title: Young Orca: Cute and Carnivorous

1411222.content:
