She watches the owl fly away out of a hole in the corner of the building. She decides it would be a wicked idea to find the owl that ate you to collect the pellet you would become. Sure it was horrible considering your painful death, but at lest it would make a good collection item.
1511112221212221111212112.title: Theres no escape from the owl

15111122212122211112121121.content:
You remember you middle school biology lab when you dissected an owl pellet. The. You think of how luck those mice were to be dead before they had to go though digestion. The acids inside the stomach quickly cover you and you are moved along into the gizzard. This is were it will end, with you being grinder up for the acids already coating you to digest easier. It was a lot more painful then it was. Luckily, you died one minute into the grinding. The next day the owl would return to his perch at the barn to look for more prey. Just as he cast out the cloths and bones that used to be you, he flies off to hunt more food to share your fate.
A biologist, with permission from the farmer to gather owl pellets for her ornithology class, finds your remains. She is astonished to see a pellet with tiny human bones. And instead of fur wrapped around the bones, your cloths make a suitable wrapping matterial. She abounded her search to go report her discoveries to the university.
15111122212122211112121121.title: Continue following you inside the digestive sys...

15111122212122211112122.content:
You step to the edge of the table, watching the owl cautiously, and decide to check out some of these giant animals. They are all herbivores (except for that owl) and so you feel safe. Granted, they could step on you or otherwise hurt you a lot if they didn't like you, but you just hope that they'll recognize you as a human and know to not be hostile to you.

You drop from the table into a pile of hay, and begin walking along the barn floor. You walk towards the closest animals, the bull and cow, and wonder if you should check them out or continue.
15111122212122211112122.title: Choice of barn animals....

151111222121222111121222.content: You decide to pass on the bovines. You've already seen a cow, and the bull would probably be mean. You now have a choice between the sheep or the small young horse. None of them notice you yet....
151111222121222111121222.title: Sheep or horse?

choices: One decides to examine you... "Closer" (as in, eating you)
1511112221212221111212221.content:
You decide to try the sheep. They look quiet and calm, and they're so fluffy. Hopefully they won't hurt you. You walk towards them, counting four with two sleeping and two walking around. As you advance, one of the walking sheep sees you and bleats quietly. The other walking sheep notices you too, and they both walk up to you.

You start feeling like is was a bad idea. The sheep are gigantic, smaller than the cow of course, but still enormous to you. And there's two of them. You stand still, wondering if this was a bad idea, and the sheep reach you, one going behind and one in front. They take turns sniffing at you, trying to figure out what you are. They seem frightened by your scent, and very confused. You figure it's partially because you still have the smell of so many animals on you, some of them carnivores, and the sheep don't know what to think. You look up at them, waiting to see what they'll do, but strangely not too afraid now. You realize how they actually might fear you a bit.....
1511112221212221111212221.title: Sheep!

choices: No use! The sheep swallows you whole to avoid your struggling
15111122212122211112122212.content:
Unfortunately, one of the two sheep is pretty brave, it seems. The second one bleats quietly and walks away, but the other stays. It (technically a she, from what you can tell) stays there, staring down at you.

"What do you want?" you yell up at her.

You get your answer quickly, as the sheep lowers her head and gives the entire front of your body a slow, slimy lick. You cough and spit, trying to wipe the drool off you, and become able to see just in time to watch the sheep's open maw descend over you.

You scream, holding up your arms in an attempt to push back the sheep, but the jaws close around you anyway. You feel your feet sticking out, clamped between the sheep's front teeth, and your arms are almost going down her throat. You start to struggle as much as possible, horrified by the idea that this herbivore might actually try to eat you!
15111122212122211112122212.title: One decides to examine you... "Closer"

151111222121222111121222121.content:
Just as you begin to struggle the sheep tilts its head back and with a loud GULP swallows you whole and alive. You are slowly massaged down the esophagus by the sheep's powerful muscles. Saliva and mucus cover you from head to toe.You scream in terror and cry out for help even though you know it's useless. You can hear the gurgles of stomach getting louder as you are inched closer and closer to your doom. Soon your journey comes to an end when you hit the wall of flesh known as the stomach sphincter. It opens up to accept you as food and you land in the stomach with a plop.

You sit up and gaze around your new home in both shock and horror. You can't believe a sheep just ate you. This is how your life ends. You are nothing but a tasty treat for a sheep. Though once the stomach acids start to poor in you jump up to your feet and start pounding on the stomach walls in a futile attempt to get the sheep to let you out. Soon you are floating in the stomach acids, and crying out in pain as you are slowly digested alive. The pain doesn't last long though as you are soon turned into a nutritious soup.
151111222121222111121222121.title: Sheep Food

choices: Try to get back to the cage, where it's safe, and wait for the girl
Check out some more animals! Maybe they won't hurt you....
151111222121222111121222122.content:
Luckily, you seem to hit something sensitive, because the sheep starts to gag, and you're spat out onto the barn floor. Covered entirely in sheep drool, you roll in the hay to dry yourself off as the sheep bleats and walks away, upset that her attempt at a snack turned out to be painful.

You get up, checking if anything else is going to try and eat you. Luckily, the coast seems clear. All that's left is to wait for the girl to return, or maybe try your luck with other animals, and hope they don't eat you...
151111222121222111121222122.title: The sheep spits you out

choices: Yes! And by that I mean "oh no!"
No! And by that I mean, "whew, that's good!"
1511112221212221111212221221.content:
You decide to return to the cage, but the question is how to get up to it.

As soon as you ask yourself that, you hear a flutter of wings, and turn to see the barn owl landing behind you. The giant bird cocks its head at you, and you stare up at it. Your first thought is, "Oh come on, please don't try to eat me too". But your second thought is, "Maybe it can help". After all, it has wings, and the table is high up.

You decide to risk it. "Hey, owl!" you shout up at it. "Think you can help me get back up to the cage?"

The owl stares at you, as if wondering if it should help you. Something in its eyes tells you that it seems to understand you somehow, and is pondering if it should help you.

Suddenly, the owl lifts one of its talons off the ground, and it shoots out, the sharp-claw-tipped digits siezing your tiny body roughly. You shout in pain as you're squeezed, and look into the owl's eyes in fear as it lifts you up towards its face, balancing on one leg with its wings spread for balance.

"It just grabbed me!" you think. "Is it gonna eat me?"
1511112221212221111212221221.title: Try to get back to the cage

15111122212122211112122212211.content:
The owl lowers it's head to meet you with his beak. Once the owl gets a hold of you with it's beak, his talons let go, leaving your legs dangling out of the owl's beak. The owl lifts his head up and down to swallow you, all while you fruitlessly try to escape. With one final swallow, you are no more but a snack for the barn owl, who flies back up to his perch to digest you.

Inside the owl's stomach you experience a horrible, hellish, pain as the stomach acids cover you. You never even made it to the gizzard because the pain was too much to bear.
15111122212122211112122212211.title: Yes! And by that I mean "oh no!"

choices: Stay out with the owl and try to make friends with it!
Go into the cage, the girl should be back soon anyway
15111122212122211112122212212.content:
Fortunately for you, the owl isn't hostile. It spreads its wings wide, and in a few flaps, is standing on the table. It releases you from its grip, and you fall onto the table painfully. Getting up, you watch it take a few steps back and hoot at you.

You thank it, and look back at the cage. You start to wonder... Should I go back in? Being in a cage is a bit degrading and boring, but this is one time where that really doesn't matter if it stops you from getting killed. Gowever. Since the owl seems to understand you, and appears friendly... Maybe you could try spending so,e timesith it? Maybe even riding it and flying around... Hat might be fun, but dangerous... Your call.
15111122212122211112122212212.title: Helpful owl

choices: "I'll lead you to where that animal is! It's not too far away!"
"I'll have my dog and owl join you, and you can go to where the animal is!"
151111222121222111121222122122.content:
You decide to not risk it outside the cage. Thanking the owl again, you step into the cage and, with difficulty, close the door. Theowl watches you for a bit, then flies back up to the rafters.

In a few minutes, you see the girl returning. She smiles at you and asks how you've been, but looks worried once she notices how you're coated thinly in drool. She opens the cage and holds her hand out to you, palm parallel to you, and you willingly walk into her palm and let her fingers wrap around you, as she lifts you up to her faceto get a closer lok.

"are you okay?" she asks. "Did you leave the cage? Why are you covered in drool?"

"Yeah, I left the cage," you say, "and a sheep tried to eat me. But I got out, and the owl helped be back into the cage."

“Why would you leave?" the girl asks. "It's safe in the cage!"

"I know... But I feel like a pet in it. I want to... Keep my dignity, you know? I may be only a few inches tall, but I'm still a human being. And I'm clearly not entirely powerless, since I've lives this long and saved myself from a sheep trying to eat me."

You can't help but wonder how little power you actually have, though, as you're currently held tightly in the fist of a young girl. Said girl's blue eyes stare at you as you make your speech, and she nods at the end.

"I understand. Still, you're definitely not that powerful at this size. I mean, I could proably do anything I wanted to you... Right... Now..."

The girl suddenly blushes, and you start to feel worried.

"Um... What are you thinking?" you ask.

The girl shakes her head quickly, as if to rid her mind of any dirty thoughts. "No! I'm going to help you! i promised myself, and you, that I'd help you, and I'm going to!"

"So... How exactly," you ask.

"Well, remember how I mentioned there might be an animal who knows how to reverse the shrinking?" she asks. You nod, and she continues...
151111222121222111121222122122.title: Go into the cage

1511112221212221111212221221221.content:
"You will?" you ask.

"Yep! It isn't that far off, so I'll be able to go there easily. I'll ride my horse, but I won't be able to hold you. You've got a few options, then: you could be on the horse with me, and hopefully you won't fall off, or one of my other animals could carry you."

What do you choose? The horse or theother animals?
1511112221212221111212221221221.title: "I'll lead you to where that animal is!"

15111122212122211112122212212212.content:
"I'd prefer a different way of travel than hanging onto your horse for dear life," you say, and the girl giggles.

"Okay then... I have a dog and an owl that are close to me, and I trust them to be careful with you. Whcih one would you like to be carried by?"
15111122212122211112122212212212.title: Other animals, owl or dog

choices: She bucks you off and you land in her maw!
The glint is just the light reflecting on her eye; you're safe
151111222121222111121222122122122.content:
You know that the owl spared you before, but you remember that its grip was very painful. You say you'd prefer to go with the dog, and the girl smiles.

"Okay then, I'll call her," she says as she turns and whistles. You see a large. Furry sheepdog run into the barn from outside, stopping in front of her master and panting. She notices you auickly, and started barking and jumping onto the girl to get at you. Still in the girl's fist, you're safe from the dog as the girl shouts "NO!" and pushes the dog away, but you start to worry for yoursafety.

"It's alright, she'sjust really curious," the girl says. "So, I'll set you down on her back, and I'll go get my horse."

The girl tells the dog to be careful with you, then sets you on her back and leaves. The dog glances back at you,and you grab two fistfuls of fur to hang on, telling the dog to follow her master's orders and not hurt you.

But as the dog looks at you, you notice an odd glint in her eye...
151111222121222111121222122122122.title: The dog

choices: You lose your grip, and become dog food!
The farmgirl comes back, and helps you escape the dog
1511112221212221111212221221221221.content:
Without warning, the dog jumps, knocking you off her back. You shout as you fly through the air, spinning around and seeing the dog's open maw right below you! She's trying to eat you!

You flail your arms, but can't do anything as you land on her soft, squishy tongue. Her humid breath washes over you, and her jaws close, trapping you inside her mouth. At your size, there's not much room for you to move around, but the dog begins to make the most of it. She starts by lifting her tongue and pressing you tightly against the roof of her mouth, then sucking on you to get your flavor. Flailing your arms some more, you try to scream, but only get a mouth full of dog drool, making you sick. Your struggling only seems to make the dog enjoy tasting you more, as she begins to make growling or moaning noises of pleasure. Terrified at the idea that this dog likes your taste, you just keep squirming.

You're not sure how long it is until the dog stops sucking on you, but by that time, you're exhausted and have given up struggling. The dog lowers her tongue, and you partially slide off into the pool of saliva underneath. You lie there for a few moments, wondering what the dog will do next, and to your terror, you notice her jaws start opening and closing. She's starting to chew!

Panicking at the sight of the chomping teeth, you do the first thing that comes to mind: hug the tongue as strong as you can, wrapping your arms and legs around it and holding on so that she can't bite you without hurting her own tongue. you're completely drenched in saliva by now, and your clothes are falling apart, but you realize that the dog isn't able to bite you while you're in this position. The heat of the tongue flows into you, all over the front of your body, and it actually starts to feel nice. The gnashing teeth of the dog's maw all around you remind you that this isn't a good position, though. Even so, there's little you can do except hang on and hope that the farmgirl returns soon to help you, otherwise this dog will certainly eat you...
1511112221212221111212221221221221.title: She bucks you off and you land in her maw!

choices: She hits her head on the ceiling--the cave is getting smaller at this point
The cave opens up into a huge chamber with the crystal in the middle
1511112221212221111212221221221222.content:
The girl returns, sitting on the back of an absolutely enormous(to you) horse. She smiles down at you on the back of the sheepdog and tells you to hand on tight. She then tells the dog to follow her, and rides out of the barn. The sheepdog follows, barking a bit, and you barely manage to keep your grip as the dog follows the girl out onto the downs.

You don't know how long you go for, since you're focusing on hanging on, but it feels like a long time. Luckily,it ends before you fall off, and the dog slows down as the girl and her horse stop before a cave in a hillside. The girl gets off the horse and walks over to you, gently plucking you off the dog's back and bringing you up to her freckled face.

"Well? How was it?" she asks.

"Rough, but I made it," you say. "So, this is where the animal is?"

The girl nods. "In this cave is an animal guarding a crystal that can reverse the effects of the one that shrunk you. Or so the legend goes. Let's go inside!"

The girl, holding you close to her torso, goes into the cave, telling the horse to stay and the dog to follow. The cave is lit by holes in the ceiling , but as you progress it gets darker. The girl takes a small flashlight from a pouch on her belt and turns it on, letting you see that the cave is long, but mostly boring to look at, being all rocks and whatnot.

"How much farther? Any idea?" you ask.

The girl shakes her head. But then...
1511112221212221111212221221221222.title: Dog rider

choices: The cave is lit by a huge crystal in the middle
There is somethin big moving in the darkness
15111122212122211112122212212212221.content:
The girl shakes her head, but then almost hits her head on the ceiling, which is much lower in this part of the cave. The girl sets you down and looks all around, noting that the cave from this point on seems far too small for her to fit through.

"And I'm a small girl for my age," she mutters. "I might be able to make it, but definitely not while holding you, little guy..."

"So I need to continues by myself?" you ask, and the girl nods.

"Yeah... So... Good luck , I guess," she says.

You sigh andthank her for her help so far, continuing through the small part of the cave and eventuslly making it to a part that opens up again, seeing that...
15111122212122211112122212212212221.title: Alone in the cave

151111222121222111121222122122122211.content: There it is... A big blue crystal, sitting right there. You can feel an odd power coming off it, and you know that this will make you bigger once you touch it. You hurry towards it, but start to hear something big approaching. Clearly, it's the animal the firl mentioned, but as you look around, you can't see it--at least, not until it jumps out of the darkness at you!
151111222121222111121222122122122211.title: The crystal

choices: It decides to eat you right now!
It decides to spare you & keep you--carrying you away from the crystal, though!
1511112221212221111212221221221222112.content:
"How is a raccoon here anyway?" is your only thought before the animals lands on you,pinning you to the ground with its paws. You squirm under its weight, noticing that it's intentionally keeping most of its weight off you so you aren't crushed to death. The raccoonlowersits head to you and sniffs at you, and you shout for it to get off of you. The raccoon, to your surprise, obliges--but immediately lowers its paw back to you and tightly snatches you in it!

Its left forepaw's digits firmly wrapped around your body, the raccon lifts you to its face again and gives your own face a small lick, seeming to enjoy your flavor. Helpless in its grasp, you tryto squirm as much as possible as the giant animal decides what to do to you...
1511112221212221111212221221221222112.title: It's a--raccoon?

choices: It decides to eat you now--no more playing with its food
It decides to spit you out, deciding you might be nice to keep to eat later
15111122212122211112122212212212221121.content:
The raccoon growls, and suddenly stuffs you into its maw! The tongue begins working all over you as you struggle to escape to no avail. The raccoon growls in pleasure as it tastes you all over, but you're absolutely terrified. There's little room to move in the raccoon's mouth, but it still manages to rollyou around and flip you over with its tongue a bit before pressing you against the roof of its maw. You're in pain as you're squeezed there, and you start to feel the raccoon sucking on you. It continues to growl as it gets all your flavor, and you start to wonder just why it's tasting you so thoroughly. You never thought humans would be all that tasty, but maybe you're just u iaue like that.

Regardless,the raccoon is sure taking its time before eating you. It continues to suck on your body, drenching your clothes in saliva and almost makingthem disintegrate right off you. You can't do anything as you're pressed against the raccoon's mouth's roof by its tongue, and you just hope that it'll either finish you off or release you soon.

You get your answer in a few moments, as the raccoon stops pressing you agInst the roof of its mouth, apparently having sucked all the flavor off you...
15111122212122211112122212212212221121.title: It decides to eat you right now!

choices: You get a burst of energy and start to fight!
You give up, deciding to let yourself become the raccoon's toy
151111222121222111121222122122122211212.content: Completely drenched in drool,you slide right out of the raccoon's maw when it parts its jaws and tilts its head. You slowly stand up, weak from the abuse it just gave you,and watch as it growls in pleasure and carefully picks you up again. Limp in its grip, you just look into its smll eyes as it seems to smile at you and start pto carry you off deeper into the cave, away from the crystal....
151111222121222111121222122122122211212.title: Raccoon's toy

choices: You wake up next to the crystal
1511112221212221111212221221221222112122.content:
You remain limp in the raccoon's soft yet tight grip. How bad could it be being its toy, you wonder. It didn't eat you. So maybe it won't try to kill you. It might be keeping you alive to taste in the future, since it apparently enjoyed you so much. You glance up into the raccoon's eyes, looking for any sign of gentleness in them, but the raccoon seems to be focusing on where it's going, not noticing its new toy looking up at it.

Suddenly. You hear loud barking, and something running towards you. Then, you see the sheepdog running at the raccoon from behind, an instant later it crashes into you and it. The raccoon drops you to the ground, and you get up only to see the sheepdog's open mouth coming at you. For a few moments, you're sealed inside her moist, hot maw, but then she releases you, and you see that she's between you and the raccoon now. You realize she's about to protect you, and you run for the crystal. Glancing back, you seethe dog amd the raccoon fighting, and you just hope the dog will survive.

Luckily. Within a minute, you're back at the crystal, and reach out to touch it...

A bright white light fills your vision, and you black out.
1511112221212221111212221221221222112122.title: Rescued!

1511112221212221111212221221221222112122.content:
When you wake up, you're lying on your back in direct sunlight. You shield your eyes, and hear barking and happy shouting nearby. Weakly, you sit up, and notice that everything seems smaller somehow. Youlook to the source of the barking and shouting, and see the sheepdog and the girl... But both are smaller than you are now!

You stare at them as they run up to you, the girl giving you a quick hug and the dog licking your face a bunch. You keep staring at them, shocked to see how small are the girl who held your entire body in her hands just a little bit ago, and the dog who was once big enough to swallow you whole.

"You did it!" the girl says. "I'm so happy you're okay!"

"How did I get out of there?" you ask. "And how did the dog get through to where I was?"

"She was small enough to fit through the small part of the cave. And once you touched the crystal, it took a bit for you to grow to your normal size again--I assume you touched the crystal, of course."

"What do you mean, 'it took a while for me to reach normal size again'?"

"Well, a bit after my dog went into the small part of the cave, she came back holding you in her mouth. I picked you up and carried you back here, but along the way, you started to feel bigger and heavier. By the time we got back here, you'd doubled in size, and I left you here to finish growing. And now you're normal size again!"

You mod, glad to have an explanation and more glad to be normal size again. You thank the girl for all her help, amd pet the dog a bit, before setting off on your way home. As you finally make it back home, you make a single promise with yourself: never, ever touch a weird looking crystal again!
1511112221212221111212221221221222112122.title: Normal at last!

choices: Choose between horse, cow, and bull
Investigate the thing in the shadows
1511112221212221111212221222.content:
You decide to try a different animal. You've already survived encounters with multiple giants by now, and you're starting to wonder if any of them can actually kill you, since you've been in situations that you definitely should not have survived. Eagle, squirrel, fox, human, sheep... You're honestly surprised you're still alive. But if you've survived all that, you feel confident about staying out of the cage.

Question is, where to next? The sheep don't seem to like you, so that leaves the bovines, horses... And something small you just noticed scurrying in the shadows.
1511112221212221111212221222.title: Check out some more animals!

15111122212122211112122212221.title: Choose between horse, cow, and bull

choices: Let the foal hold you in her maw
Don't let the foal do it
151111222121222111121222122211.content:
There is a small horse lying on the ground asleep--well, it would be small if you were normal size. You think it's a young horse, and carefully approach it. You've had bad luck with each animal encounter, as they've all manhandled you as soon as you were close enough, but you're still alive, so you feel confident about this nonetheless.

Before you can get very close to the foal, though, you hear footsteps and turn around to see the girl approaching, apparently finished with her research. She doesn't notice you on the ground, though, and looks for you in the cage she left you in. You notice her start to appear worried, and she calls your name. You cup your hands around your mouth and shout to get her attention, and luckily, she hears you. She breathes a sigh of relief and walks over to you, lying flat on the ground with her enormous face inches from your tiny body. You notice that she's frowning though, and start to worry.

"Why'd you leave the cage?" she asked, her voice clearly upset and somewhat stern.

You shrug. "Sorry... I just didn't want to be stuck in there for too long. Besides, this is a new experience, after all... Might as well go explore and see what it's like to live at a few inches tall, or however small I am now."

"Well... just don't do that again," she says. "I was scared you'd been eaten or something."

"I'm glad you care about my safety," you say. "Thank you. It feels good to know something out here isn't trying to kill me." That earned a small blush from the giant girl, who clearly was happy you liked her. She grinned at you, and you noticed her left hand moving towards you. You allowed it to reach you and form a fist around your body, as the girl stood up straight and picked you up off the ground, brushing off the front of her clothes with her free hand.

"So... did you find out about how to get me back to normal?" you ask.

The girl is about to answer when she suddenly smiles and laughs. You notice she's looking past you, and crane your neck around to see the foal standing there, having woken up. It leans in and sniffs you gently, making you wince slightly as the air flows over you.

"Aw, looks like she likes you," the girl says.

"As a friend, not as food, I hope," you say.

"Oh, don't worry, she doesn't eat meat. She's a horse!"

Suddenly, the foal's tongue slips from between her lips and runs over your face quickly, covering it in drool. You splutter and wipe it off as the girl giggles.

"You sure she doesn't want to eat me?" you ask.

"Oh, I'm sure. In fact..." the girl suddenly gets a somewhat mischievous grin on her face, and you start to worry.

"Hey, you said you wanted to experience a lot t your current size... how about you see what the inside of a mouth is like?"

"Uh... I've already learned that, thank you..."

You hear the horse whinny sadly, and look to see her staring at you intently. You think you see a bit of drool drip from inside her mouth, and you shudder despite being surrounded by the warmth of the girl's fist. You really don't feel comfortable willingly going into something's maw, even if it's herbivorous. Still, it might be an interesting thing to experience again, just once more before you return to normal...
151111222121222111121222122211.title: To nom or not to nom

choices: She starts trying to eat you immediately!
She treats you to some mouthplay first...
1511112221212221111212221222111.content:
The choice is yours, and you finally decide to allow the foal to hold you in her mouth. It's against your better judgment, but you choose to trust the girl and hope that the foal is really not interested in eating you and simply wants to taste you. So, sweating slightly with fear, you tell the girl holding you your choice. She nods, and brings up her other hand below you. Releasing you from the fist holding you, she carefully balances you on her palm and moves you over to the foal's snout.

"This is just like feeding her a salt cube or something," the girl says.

"Please don't say 'feed'," you say to the girl as you watch the foal lean closer to you. She gives you another few sniffs, and licks you once again, now getting the whole front of your body soaked in saliva. You don't bother to wipe it off, though--you're about to get a lot more of it all over you.

The young horse stares at you for a moment, and you stare back into her big black eyes, begging her silently to be gentle. Then, suddenly, her lips part, exposing the pink interior of her maw, the sharp white teeth lining its edge, and the black hole of her throat. You begin to shiver and sweat in fear, but the foal continues to open her mouth wider, then move it towards you. She brings her maw close, but then stops. You wonder why, then you hear the giant girl holding you speak up.

"Huh, that's weird," she says. "It's like she's waiting for you to jump in."

You stare into the glistening, drool-coated maw of the young horse, and begin to wonder if that would in fact be such a bad idea. You've survived similar things a few times already, and perhaps you could get some enjoyment out of this somehow.

With that thought in mind, you step forward. The foal's jaws aren't parted enough for you to enter standing up, so you crouch and get on your hands and knees. Your knees are on the girl's palm, while your hands touch the horse's squishy, very hot tongue. It pulses under your hands, and you feel the humid breath of the filly all around you. To your surprise, it doesn't smell bad at all, and you start to think that this might not be so bad after all. You quickly crawl into the foal's waiting maw fully, your feet finally crossing over the dangerous teeth. As soon as you're completely inside, the foal closes her jaws, and now you're totally under her control.

You stay still for a bit. The foal seems to be thinking about what to do to you...
1511112221212221111212221222111.title: Willingly in a horse mouth

choices: She's not finished with you yet...
She's finally done with you, and let's you go at last
15111122212122211112122212221112.content:
Suddenly, the tongue beneath you rises up, squishing you against the roof of the foal's mouth and making your arms and legs splay out to the sides. You grunt with the impact, but know to keep your eyes and mouth shut to prevent any drool getting inside, something that you'll need to beware of for the next few minutes at least. The filly begins to suck on your body, and you can feel the motions trying to draw you towards her throat, but she luckily is taking care to ensure you remain out of that. The sucking continues, and it almost feels nice to you, until you remember you're literally inches away from death. You refuse to let this situation appeal to you too much.

The foal doesn't, though, and whinnies in pleasure as she gets your taste. You start to panic as you realize she just might like how you taste enough to eat you, but a thought strikes you. You've been sweating a lot lately, and the girl mentioned that giving you to the filly reminded her of giving her salt cubes... Maybe the foal just likes the salt on you? You hope that's all, and not that she's got a taste for humans.

Whatever the reason, she seems to love having you in her maw. She begins pushing you around with her tongue, swishing you all over and pushing you against the roof of her mouth from time to time to suck on you a few more times before moving you around a bit more. A few times, you hit her tee and get hurt slighhtly, but it doesn't hurt too badly. Besides, you're focused more on panicking about your current situation than worrying about any small injuries you get in the process.

The foal continues to play with your tiny, helpless body, now thoroughly coated in saliva, with the clothes mostly falling apart from all the drool. You don't struggle at all, hoping that will keep the filly from getting angry at you and hurting you more. You instead just let her have her way with you, and marvel at how prehensile her tongue seems to be as it manipulates you as skillfully as a human with hands could.

You don't know how long it's lasted, but eventually the filly seems to slow down. She lifts you to the roof of her mouth with her tongue once again, and gently sucks on you for a bit. By now, your clothes are tattered, and the hot, sticky, pulsating tongue against your bare skin is making you feel things you really wish you weren't right now. Even so, you start to think the foal might be finishing up with you, and sure enough, she slowly brings her tongue back down to its neutral position, with you still lying on top. You presumes she's gotten all the salt off of you, and is done tasting you. You lay there, waiting for what she'll do next, hoping she's done with you do this whole ordeal can end...
15111122212122211112122212221112.title: She treats you to some mouthplay first...

15111122212122211112122212222.content: You slowly walk towards the thing in the shadows. It looks to be bigger than you, but still smaller than most of the other animals you've met already. It's walking around along the wall of the barn, clearly trying to remain unseen, but it suddenly stops as you approach, and a glint from its direction tells you its eyes are focused on you. It slowly steps out of the shadows, and you see that it's a...
15111122212122211112122212222.title: Investigate the thing in the shadows

choices: Unfortunately, you smell like you'd be tasty
Luckily, it decides to spare you
151111222121222111121222122221.content:
It looks like the creature is a relatively large mouse with light brown fur. It stops approaching you once it leaves the shadows, and starts sniffing in your direction. You start walking towards it, trusting that a mouse probably won't be able to do much to you, but you notice the mouse look at something behind you and squeak in fear, before hurrying into the shadows again. You glance back and see a huge barn owl diving at you!

With a shout, you run after the mouse, dodging the owl's grasping talons, and notice a mousehole in the wall. You dive into it, rolling a bit and landing on your back, safe... For now. You look up and see, with the little bit of light coming into the mousehole, that the mouse is staring at you intently. As you try to sit up, the mouse pounces, its front paws pinning your arms to the ground and its face almost touching yours. The mouse's weight starts to hurt you, and you squirm under it as it sniffs you.

You stop struggling soon, though, once you realize it's doing no good. The mouse stops sniffing you, and you stare into each others' eyes for a moment. You hope that this mouse doesn't think you smell delicious... You don't like the idea of its huge teeth tearing you apart....
151111222121222111121222122221.title: Mouse

choices: Leave the mousehole and hurry to the cage
1511112221212221111212221222212.content:
The mouse getsoff of you, and you sit up, rubbing your sore arms. The mouse squeaks a bit, almost like it's either talking to you or itself, then turns and walks a bit farther into the mousehole.

You sigh in relief that the mouse doesn't want to hurt you, and think to yourself that you now have two options. The young cowgirl is likely to return soon, so you might want to get back to the cage so she doesn't have to look all over for you. But that owl seemed like it wanted to catch you, and you really don't like the idea of that. Alternatively, you could stay here, and hope that the mouse stays friendly... What do you do?
1511112221212221111212221222212.title: Luckily, it decides to spare you

15111122212122211112122212222122.content:
Since it spared you already, you decide to stay with the mouse, and hope it doesn't get annoyed or anything. You walk after it, barely able to see in the darkness of what you guess is its home. The mousehole in the side of the barn wall had led you to a space you assumed was between two layers of the wall, but as you watch the mouse, it quickly scurries down a hole in the ground, and you realize it's a tunnel. Apparently, the mouse has lived here a while, and has made a tunnel... Whether it leads outside or just into a more secure burrow, you can't tell.

But you decide to examine it, anyway. You follow the mouse's path, making it to the tunnel. You think you see light from inside, but you're not sure if you should follow it or not....
15111122212122211112122212222122.title: Stay with the mouse

choices: The mouse doesn't return, and you leave
151111222121222111121222122221221.content:
What's the worst that could happen? Well, you could get stuck down there, and never get out. Then again, the mouse is there, and it might be able to help you if you get into any trouble. Deciding to go ahead down the hole, you carefully walk down the steep side of it, almost bumping into the mouse, who you didn't notice was standing just inside the tunnel.

It stares at you, and you apologize. Even though it can't understand you, it squeaks, as if to acknowledge it heard you. The mouse squeaks a bit more, bumping you with its snout, and hurries down the tunnel. You get the feeling it wants you to stop here, so you do so. As you wait, you decide to leave the mousehole if it doesn't come back soon, because that cowgirl might be coming back soon, and you want to be easily findable by her when she returns.

You wait for a while, and...
151111222121222111121222122221221.title: Go down the tunnel

choices: The tunnel leads to a larger space, with other mice--a family of them
1511112221212221111212221222212211.content: After a minute or so, you see the mouse coming back. It squeaks a bit, and squeezes up against the edge of the tunnel, as if it's letting you pass. You walk past it, starting to get a bit scared as the tunnel darkens. However, you can hear the mouse right behind you, and feel its breath on your back, so it's a bit calming to know you're at least not alone. You do wonder where the mouse wants you to go, though...
1511112221212221111212221222212211.title: The mouse returns

choices: The mouse digs up something very, very interesting
15111122212122211112122212222122111.content:
You notice the tunnel getting lighter, and realize it's about to lead outside. You hurry ahead, happy to be out of the dark tunnel, and climb up the side of the tunnel as it opens up to the fields outside the barn. The mouse follows, and after glancing around, turns to you and squeaks a bit.

"Okay," you say, "I know you can't understand me, but you seem to somehow be able to communicate a bit. So... Can you explain why you led me out here?"

The mouse glances around a bit more, and after notici onespecific spot in the field, squeaks and runs over to it, digging quickly. You move aside to avoid getting dirt on you, and wait as it digs. This is all starting to get a bit too strange for your tastes, but you want to know what the mouse has in store for you....
15111122212122211112122212222122111.title: The tunnel leads outside

151111222121222111121222122221221111.content:
You watch as the mouse digs, and suddenly, a bright blue light erupts from the hole it's digging. The mouse jumps back, squeaking in surprise. You walk over to it and look into the hole, and see a blue crystal glowing in it. It seems to glow beighter as you get closer, and you realize this might be one of the crystals that cowgirl mentioned could reverse the effects of the one that shrunk you!

You glance at the mouse, who seems scared. You assume it dug up this crystal because it was starting to see you as a friend, possibly since you and it were both attacked by the owl, so it thought you were in the same boatso to speak. It probably wanted to show you the pretty crystal it found, but hadn't expected it to be glowing, though, since it seems like it's only glowing because you're nearby. The mouse is still scared, and you decide you might as well touch the crystal and see if it grows you to normal size. You crouch down and reach into the shallow hole the mouse dug, touching the crystal....
151111222121222111121222122221221111.title: The mouse digs up something very, very interesting

1511112221212221111212221222212211111.content:
When you open your eyes again, not knowing you'd closed them, you notice everything looks smaller. You lookaround, and realize you're normal size again! You cheer, happy to finally have that ordeal over with, and you hurry around the barn, finding the front entrance and entering it. You see the young cowgirl looking all over the barn and calling for you, but when she turns, she jumps in surprise. You explain that you were able to get back to normal without her help, and she seems excited. She gives you a quick hug, and says she's happy you're back to normal. You thank the girl for trying to help, even though she never got a chance to actually help you find a crystal. After saying your goodbyes, you and she split up, and you make your way back home.

Along the way, though, you hear quiet squeaking behind you. You turn around, and see a little brown mouse hurrying after you. You crouch, offering out a palm to it. The mouse sniffs it, and carefully climbs on. You carry the mouse with you back home, surprised at how it was once big enough to potentially carry you by itself. It seems to remember you, and it seems to want to stay with you, perhaps as a pet. You decide that might be a good idea--mice are cute, after all, and this one in particular did potentially save your life. Also, keeping it could help remind you of this whole adventure, and remind you to never touch a weird looking crystal again!
1511112221212221111212221222212211111.title: That could've been worse

1511112221212221111212222.content: The foal, though huge, looks cute, so you decide to head towards it. The sheep notice you, but don't mpseem to pay much attention. You walk up to the young horse's face and examine it. The horse is lying on its side, and due to its position, you can see that it is actually...
1511112221212221111212222.title: Horse!

choices: She spits you out, and you see you're by the sea
She decides she really likes your taste
15111122212122211112122222.content:
After a quick glance, you see that the horse is female. Looking back to her face, you suddenly realize that her dark eyes are open and watching you. You stumble back in surprise, but the horse rolls over onto her belly, her legs folded under her, and her neck and head rise up far above you. The horse is young, but you're only an inch tall, bios she seems enormous. The horse looks at you, and makes a few admittedly cute whinnying noises, then lowers her head and pushes you with her snout. You fall over with the force of it, and begin to realize that the foal is playful. Still, you can't help but worry about what might happen if she gets too careless with you....

The foal keeps pushing you around with her snout and whinnying, until you hear the sound of that farmer girl coming back. You turn to see her, and then suddenly, the world goes dark. You feel a pressure around your waist, and everything gets extremely hot and damp. You realize that the foal has just grabbed you in her mouth. You feel your feet leave the ground as you kick frantically. The farmer girl realizes what's happening and shouts for the goal to spit you out. The young horse ignores her, though, and instead tilts her head back and opens her jaws slightly, letting you slide completely into her maw, after which she snaps her mouth shut. You brace yourself against the walls of her mouth with your hands and feet, feeling her stocky tongue beneath you. You wince in disgust, and know that if you slip, you'll get accidentally swallowed. You feel the foal start running, and have difficulty keeping from sliding down her throat, and you can vaguely hear the girl's shouting fading away.

The foal keeps running for a bit, but then....
15111122212122211112122222.title: In the foal's mouth

choices: A huge wave washes over you both!
151111222121222111121222221.content: You get spat out, drenched in the foal's drool. You splutter and stand up, dizzy from being tossed around so much. The foal just watches you, and when you recover enough to glance up at her, she lies down again and keeps nuzzling you. You have a feeling she brought you here to the beach to be alone with you, because she thinks you're like a sort of toy. You don't like the idea of being some young horse's plaything, though, and you remember that young girl from the farm, who's probably looking for you. You decide to try and get the horse to return you, but something else has a different idea....
151111222121222111121222221.title: By the sea with the foal

1511112221212221111212222211.content:
Suddenly, a wave crashes over you both, and you get dragged out to sea. The foal is heavy enough and big enough to stay on shore, though, and gives an upset and worried neigh as you float away. You struggle to get ashore, your clothes dragging you down, and go under eventually....

But it isn't the end yet. You wake up on the shore, with another giant animal standing over you, and watching you curiously....
1511112221212221111212222211.title: A huge wave washes over you both!

15111122212122211112122222111.content:
The animal is an otter, with soaking wet black fur. It examines you closely, and you fear it might try and eat you. You glance around and determine that you're pretty lost right now. But a glint catches your eye, and you see that the otter is holding a bright blue crystal in one of its paws. It looks similar to the crystal from before, and you figure that it could grow you if you touch it.

You walk towards the otter, trying to get closer to the crystal, and you definitely feel yourself start to grow ever so slightly. The otter, though, doesn't notice, and to it, you're just a prey item that's willingly entered its reach. The otter drops the stone and reaches out a paw towards you. It catches you off guard, and you can't resist as the paw snatches you off the ground and up to the otters face. You shout and squirm, but your whole body from shoulders down is surrounded with otter paw, and you're powerless in its grip. The otter examines you closely, its dark eyes running over you. It seems interested in you, and sticks out its tongue to quickly lick you. you angrily shout for it to not do that, but the otter doesn't care. If anything, it just notices how interesting you taste, unlike anything it's eaten before....
15111122212122211112122222111.title: It's an otter!

choices: "Okay! But not sure why you'd want to touch some rock...."
"Y'know, I think I'd prefer to keep you for myself!"
151111222121222111121222221111.content:
The otter looks closely at you, and decides it might as well eat you. It can tel, you're meat, and figures any food is good food. It opens its maw and stuffs you inside, and it's teeth begin to chew. You grab the tongue, wrapping your arms and legs around it to avoid getting chomped, and the otter seems to get annoyed. It presses it's tongue against the roof of its mouth, squishing you. You lose your grip due to the pain, and begin to slip down its throat. You think it might be the end...

Suddenly, you feel yourself get tossed around the otter's mouth, and hear it retching while somebody shouts. You're spat out with force, and sent flying into the sea. A wave washes you ashore, and you lie there in pain.

You look up to see the otter run away, and see a giant pair of boot-wearing feet approach. A familiar tightness surrounds you, and you're lifted into the air. You vision is blurry, but when it sharpens, you can see the familiar face of the young farm girl.

"Oh, I'm so glad I found you!" she exclaims, sounding emotional. She hold you close to her. "I'll never let you out of my sight again!"

The way she says that frightens you a bit, and you tell her to put you down. She refuses, saying the waves could get you, and you agree to be held a bit longer. You ask her what just happened.

"Well, after my foal took you away, I got on my horse to look for you two. I found my foal but couldn't find you, and I got worried she ate you. I started looking for you, though, hoping she hadn't eaten you, and I saw an otter down shore, so I went to check it out," she explains. "I thought, maybe it had gotten you, and I guess it had!"

"Yeah, I guess I got washed back ashore by another wave, and that otter found me," you say. "Okay, there's one more thing: that otter had a blue crystal. Can you set me down? I need to touch it."

The girl looks at you with a weird look....
151111222121222111121222221111.title: Otter vs girl

1511112221212221111212222211111.content:
The girl sets you down, and you run to the crystal. You touch it, and the world goes white.

When your sight returns, everything looks smaller. You look around, and see the girl sitting on e ground, looking like she just was knocked over. She jumps to her feet and claps her hands.

"Yay!" she exclaims. "You're normal again!"

You look at yourself, and at her, seeing how short she is now. She's only as tall as the bottom of your chest, if that, and you can't help but laugh.

"You know, I thought you were taller," you tell her jokingly.

Now that you're normal sized, you say goodbye to her and thank her for helping you, and leave for home. When you get back, you breathe a sigh of relief.

"I hope I never shrink again," you mutter.
1511112221212221111212222211111.title: Back to normal

choices: Keeps playing with you in her mouth
151111222121222111121222222.content:
The filly suddenly stops running. You remain in the same position bracing yourself against the inside of her mouth, worried if she's finally going to try to eat you now. To your surprise, though, she begins moving her tongue, and you realize with disgust that she's beginning to taste you.

Her tongue pushes you all around her maw, and you lose your grip, getting tossed around by the slimy muscle. You hit the teeth a few times and get hurt, but not too badly. Even so, you definitely don't like this situation, and begin struggling and squirming with all your might. In response, it seems, the filly uses her tongue to press you against the roof of her mouth and hold you there. Unable to move at all, you can't squirm, and stop moving.

The female foal then...
151111222121222111121222222.title: She decides she really likes your taste

choices: Lowers her head and releases you
1511112221212221111212222222.content:
The horse keeps you pinned to the roof of her mouth, and begins to suck on you. You're completely unable to move, and can't resist as she begins to suck on your whole body, squeezing you tighter and tighter against the roof of her maw as she whinnies in pleasure at your taste. Meanwhile, you're busy being terrified, and trying as much as you can to move even a little bit.

To your surprise, she filly stops sucking on you, and begins using her tongue to move you around. By now, though, you're too weakened to resist, and you let her do what she wants. You feel yourself get moved around, and suddenly, you see light. You're been pushed out of the horse's mouth, but only partially--from your chest down, you're still inside her maw. Her soft lips are holding you in place, and you're stuck looking down at the ground far below. The filly...
1511112221212221111212222222.title: More filly mouthplay

choices: The filly bends down towards you
You hear the young cowgirl's voice calling
15111122212122211112122222222.content:
You feel the filly begin sucking on you again, using you like some kind of lollipop from your chest down. Now that your arms are free. You can fight back and hit her, but you're too weak to do anything. You allow her to suck on your body, the gentle motion almost threatening to pull you back inside her humid maw, but never actually doing so. As she sucks on you, you start to grow used to it, and actually begin enjoying it. She's clearly not trying to hurt you, and it feels good being sucked on be her...

You shake your head suddenly, and feel a surge of strength. No, that's not the way to think! You're halfway in a giant horse's mouth, you should be panicking! You're completely under her control, and she's in the perfect position to eat you alive and make you burn to death in her stomach! You can't let her own you like this!

You begin struggling, beating on her lips with your fists and squirming as much as possible. The filly seems surprised by your sudden energy, and opens her mouth slighhtly in surprise. Unfortunately, this also causes you to slip out. And fall towards the ground.

You hit the group chard, but to your surprise, you aren't too hurt. You lie on your back, lookingup at the young horse towering over you...
15111122212122211112122222222.title: Sucked on by a horse foal

151111222121222111122.content: She's going to use you as a...
151111222121222111122.title: What is she going to use you as?

choices: The wolf is interested by your smell
1511112221212221112.content:
You notice a wolf looking at the cow, slinking from the tall grass. You can tell that the cow doesn't notice it, and just keeps grazing. Wondering if it will attack, your question is instantly answered as the wolf lunges at the cow, digging it's sharp teeth into the cow's neck. The cow is taken by surprise, and though she begins rowing her neck from side to side to dislodge the wolf, it's to no avail. The cow collapses, dead from crushed neck and punctured jugular. The wolf steps back, eyeing its meal.

Meanwhile, you stand up slowly. When the cow collapsed, she broke your fall somewhat, and you slid off her back. You wonder if you should run or not, but then notice the wolf is staring over the cow carcass straight at you. In fear. You start to run, but the wolf is instantly upon you. It's paw slams down on you, pushing you into the ground. Thankfully, the ground is grassy, and dirt below, so it's relatively soft. Even so, it's a bit painful, and frightening as the wolf lifts its paw and brings down its giant snout to sniff at you. You stand still, wondering if it's the end....
1511112221212221112.title: Wolf and cow

choices: Another animal finds you in the short grass
You return to the tall grass to make a plan
15111122212122211121.content:
The wolf can smell vixen drool on you, along with many other animals slightly less strongly. It decides that it's a bad smell, and with a low growl, steps away from you to sta eating to cow carcass.

You run away in fear, not caring that it's probably a bad idea to just try and run all alone....
15111122212122211121.title: The wolf hates your smell

151111222121222111211.content:
You're about to reach the tall grass when a shadow passes over you. Exasperated, and just hoping its something that won't try and kill you. You look up to see what cast it and notice a hawk circling downward. Quite clearly, it sees you, and thinks you looks like a tasty rodent.

it dives, and you just barely get out of its way. The hawk spins around, landing in front of you and striding quickly towards you. It's wings flare out and it makes a loud cawing sound at you. You stumble back, and a glance behind you reveals you're close to the tall grass. Should you make a break for it?
151111222121222111211.title: Giant hawk swooping down!

choices: Return to the wolf,... Maybe it'll be nice
1511112221212221112111.content:
Swiftly, you leap back into the tall grass, using the cover to avoid the hawk as it Lu he's at you, beak gaping. The hawk takes to the air, hovering above the grass to find its prey. You stay still, hoping it won't see you, when you hear rustling next to you. You turn, and see a small mouse, a bit larger than you, walking through the grass, sniffing the ground and ignoring you totally. You let it pass, and realize its heading for the short grass, oblivious of the hawk above.

You try and tap its back to warn it, but it's already out of the tall grass. You hear the hawk shriek, and you peek out of the tall grass in time to see it flying away, the mouse squirming in its claws. You sit back, breathing heavily. You're hit with how dangerous and violent nature really can be, and you don't want any part of it. You've got to turn back to normal size, and soon!

But what should you do next?
1511112221212221112111.title: Go!  Run!

choices: She happens to bring you back to where you first shrunk
She gets attacked by something along the way
15111122212122211121111.content:
You leave the tall grass and head towards the wolf. It looks like its finished eating, and its snout is slightly red with blood. You're disgusted, but think that maybe this wolf can help you. It doesn't seem like it wants to eat you, so maybe you could get on its back and let it carry you faster than you could walk without it trying to kill you. You approach the wolf from the side, gazing up at its form. It is sitting on its haunches, and you take in its tan fur, bright blue eyes, and sharp claws. The wolf stands up, and in a fit of indecency and curiosity, you glance between it's hind legs and determine that the wolf is female. The wolf suddenly seems to notice you, and turns to look at you. Under her gaze, you just stay still, but then decide to make your move.

You walk up to the wolf, and she actually steps back in surprise. You try talking to her, and ask if you can get on her back. Obviously, she doesn't understand, but it intrigued by this tiny creature. She sniffs at you again, once again disliking your smell, but seems to sense no threat from you. She actually lies down, and you can see she's interested in you and curious.

You take that opportunity, slowly walking up to her face, which is bigger than you, and gently pat her snout. The wolf seems surprised, but also doesn't act hostile. You walk along her side, patting her as you go until you reach her shoulders. You stop patting her, and she glances back at you. You again ask if she'll let you get on her, and she doesn't react again.

Deciding to risk it, you jump up and grab her fur. The wolf seems annoyed by this, but you clamber up onto her back and position yourself on the back of her neck, gripping her fur to keep yourself steady. The wolf can't see you at that spot, but she can feel you. She seems to dislike it, but doesn't try to knock you off. The wolf stands up and begins walking, and you breathe a sigh of relief. Somehow, you managed to partially tame this wolf.

You only hope she takes you where you need to go.
15111122212122211121111.title: Wolf rider

choices: A pack of more wolves, looking hungrily at your mount
151111222121222111211111.content:
You sit on the wolf's back as she walks, riding her like some sort of enormous horse. You can see much farther from her back than you could on foot, and you realize that the land looks familiar. Then, it hits you. Through sheer coincidence, you realize that the wolf has brought you to where you first shrunk. You decide to take a look around and see if you can tell what shrunk you before. From e height you're at, you can see a dim red glow in a patch of yellow flowers. You tug at the wolf's fur, and she growls slightly while instinctively steering the way you command her. You're a bit surprised that move actually worked... You thought she would throw you off when you yanked at her fur. But she seems gentle enough, and in a few moments, she is standing over the glow.

You lean over and see a weird sort of crystal there, emitting the glow. The wolf looks curiously at it, sniffing at it before snorting and walking away. You take one last look before the wolf walks far enou that you can't see it anymore. Apparently, that thing is what shrunk you, you think to yourself as you lie back on the wolf's withers. Maybe there are others like it, that could grow you?

You sit up, looking around the head of the wolf. She seems to have forgotten you're there, actually, and is just walking along the downs, the sea in sight. As she stops to look for prey or predators, you notice something approaching...
151111222121222111211111.title: The red crystal

choices: It still thinks you tasted good
It decides to leave you there
1511112221212221112111111.content: You notice the gull a second before it snatches you. You shout, but the noise is cut off as the gull's open mouth snaps you up. You hear the wolf roar below you as the gull carries you. You can't believe your bad luck as you struggle in its mouth. You can feel it trying to swallow you whole, but you struggle too much for it to do so easily. You feel the gull start to relent, and eventually, it opens it's beak and drops you out of it. You stand up quickly, trying to get in a position to resist it if it tries to grab you again, but see its just eyeing you curiously, cocking it's head from side to side. You let your guard down, wondering what it's thinking...
1511112221212221112111111.title: A gull swooping at you!

choices: The wolf brings you to another one, her sibling
The wolf brings you to a large blue crystal
15111122212122211121111111.content:
The gull squawks, and opens its beak again before shooting towards you. You dodge it, and it's beak clamps on only air. The gull stumbles, flapping it's wings to stay upright, and turns to face you again. It lunges again, and you dive under it, rolling between it's spindly legs in a display of agility you didn't know you had. Even so, you know that there's really no hope for survival here, other than the full giving up.

As soon as you think that, though, you see a familiar-looking tan wolf running towards you, her snout still spotted with blood. You're distracted long enough for the gull to stomp on you, pinning you to the ground with its webbed foot. You struggle to get out, but it's useless as the gull reaches down to bite your head off.

Suddenly, the gull disappears in a blur of tan. You get to your feet and see the wolf tearing the bird apart in a terrifying fashion. You look away, surprised at the violence, and look back after a bit to see the bird reduced to meat and feathers, and the wolf sitting down eating the former. You stay away from her, and when she finishes eating, she walks over to you. You get seized with fear, and run away, realizing just how dangerous she is, but get nowhere before a paw slams down in front of you. You run right into it, falling down and looking up, seeing the wolf standing over you, her maw still dripping blood. It's a terrifying sight, but the wolf suddenly backs away, lying down and swishing her tail, watching you with a look that seems like she's expecting something. You just gaze back at her, as she lies there panting softly, blood dripping from her mouth, and you sit down. You realize how lucky you were to find this particular wolf. Even though she's torn aart two animals already, and eaten their bodies, she seems to like protecting you. Maybe she likes your presence, and she likes your company, or something?

You sigh and get up, mounting the wolf's back again. She lets you, and stands up before running off in a random direction. You feel like she's going somewhere important, and has a real destination in her mind....
15111122212122211121111111.title: Wolf and gull

choices: Accept it, and hope the mouse spares you after killing the wolf
151111222121222111211111112.content:
The wolf runs for a while, and you watch the downs fly by. You see a few gulls following you, but they all fly away soon. You hang on tightly to the wolf's fur, wondering where she's going.

You get your answer when she enters a small cave and lies down again. You dismount, and notice a blue glow from around the corner. You turn the corner and see a large blue crystal, half the size of the wolf and similar to the one from before. The wolf actually looks confused, as if she didn't expect this, and walks over your tiny form to examine it. You run after her, but notice something moving in the darkness.

You shout, but are too late to help her from this new animal, which lunges at her. The two engage in a loud fight, and you're barely able to tell that the new beast is actually a mouse even bigger than the wolf. Somehow, the mouse seems to be winning the fight, and manages to knock the wolf down and go for her throat, just as she had for the cow earlier. In a fit of anger, you lunge at the mouse, beating its side. The mouse pauses, its front paws pinning the wolf, and glances over to you. You're struck by how cute it looks, even though it's bigger than the wolf and much meaner. You're so stunned, you can't react when the mouse swings its tail at you, coiling you up tightly and plucking you from the ground. You struggle and squirm to no avail, and the mouse simply holds you away from itself as it keeps biting at the wolf. The wolf's clawed paws slash the mouse a few times, but in the end, the giant mouse manages to chomp on her throat. The wolf squirms, and you see she's about to die.

You shout loudly, pounding on the mouse's tail. You wish you could do something, but there's nothing you can do....
151111222121222111211111112.title: Mice the size of wolves

1511112221212221112111111122.content:
You refuse to let the wolf die after she helped you, and so you keep beating on the mouse's tail. You decide to try biting it yourself, and with some reluctance, you dig your teeth into the mouse's tail. The giant mouse squeaks loudly in pain, releasing its grip on the wolf. The wolf stumbles to her paws, bleeding heavily from her neck, and roars at the mouse. The mouse glances back at you with narrowed eyes....

And begins to squeeze.

You feel the pressure around your body increase, becoming so strong it feels like you'll pop. You let out a long shout of pain as the mouse tries to squeeze you to death, and your vision darkens. The last thing you see is the wolf lunging at the giant mouse, her bloody mouth gaping...



You wake up on the ground. You look around and see the giant mouse lying dead, it's neck torn open. You look away, and see that you're actually between two tall furry legs. You look up, and see that the wolf is watching you, and keeping you between her front legs as she lies down. She's still bleeding, and looks like she's in pain. You get up, hurt all over from the mouse, and stumble towards the blue crystal. The wolf watches you, and you start to feel a power flow through you. You touch the crystal, and everything goes white.
1511112221212221112111111122.title: Last moments

15111122212122211121111111221.content:
When you can see again, you're normal size, your head almost touching the cave roof. You realize that the mouse must have turned huge by touching the crystal. You're happy to be normal size again, but that happiness fades when you look at the wolf. She's lying on the ground, dead.

You crouch down, and lift her body in your arms. You're amazed how small she seems now, even though you were riding on her back just a few minuets ago. You carry her body from the cave and into the sunlight of the downs, sadness washing over you. You look around, and decide to just head home. When you get there, still carrying the wolf's body and covered in her blood due to it, you decide you might as well give her a burial for all the help she gave you.

An hour later, you've made a little grave on the downs and marked it with a plain rock. You look at it for a bit, then leave quietly. You're sad she died, but you're happy this whole ordeal is over. You're still impressed at the wolf's level of empathy and kindness, and wonder why that was. Because you were small, and she was female, and just felt an instinct to care for you? Maybe she just wanted some company, and because you didn't seem like a good meal, she just decided to keep you around. No matter what made her act the way she did, at least her sacrifice wasn't for nothing.
15111122212122211121111111221.title: Bittersweet ending

choices: The hawk sees you are not a rodent and let's go
The hawk eats you any way
1511112221212221112112.content:
You stand still with your eyes closed and arms outstretched, waiting to be swept off your feet. The hawk wraps it's talons around your arms and lifts you off the ground effortlessly. You open your eyes for a brief second just to see how high up you are. Afraid to look down for to long you close your eyes again. You were unable to predict how high up you were but you did see were you were going, a tree. The hawk ands on the lowest branch of the tree and lets go of one of your arms to hold on to the branch, leaving you dangling from one arm with the other free.

The hawk holds you up to get a good look at you,
1511112221212221112112.title: It's useless to even try!

choices: You move on to the stomach to be digested
15111122212122211121122.content:
The hawk decides a meal is a meal, and if you can fit in his beak your good enough. Even if you are a human. The hawk grabs you with his beak and forces you down his gullet. You try to struggle but he is trashing you down his down so you feel dizzy. You eventually disappear down the birds esophagus.

After a short while you land in the birds crop to be moisturized before you go on to be digested in the stomach. Or the hawk could be saving you for later.
15111122212122211121122.title: The hawk eats you any way

choices: The wolf lowers its head, and opens its mouth to eat you!
15111122212122211122.content:
The wolf continues sniffing you, then snorts and lifts its head slightly, cocking it to one side. You stare up into its enormous blue eyes, fearing for what it plans to do to you. Judging by the head tilt, and the fact that you're not currently inside its maw, it seems to not be entirely interested in eating you, or at least is confused by your scent. Most likely, it's confused as to why such a tiny thing smells so much like a human, something that's usually bigger than a wolf.

You stay completely still, hoping that the wolf won't decide that you're small enough to eat...
15111122212122211122.title: The wolf is interested by your smell

choices: A young farmer girl with a shotgun aimed at the wolf
Another wolf, approaching and growling menacingly
151111222121222111222.content:
The wolf begins to lower it's head, jaws starting to part to reveal the fleshy interior of its maw, with the black hole of the throat at the end. You stare, paralyzed in fear, and worried that this is the end for you.

Luckily, a loud noise causes the wolf (and you) to forget what you're doing and glance towards it. To your surprise, you see...
151111222121222111222.title: A distraction saves you?

choices: Hide--it's not worth the risk to show yourself
Walk up to her--she might be your only chance at getting back to normal!
1511112221212221112221.content:
You stare at the new arrival to the scene: a young girl, seemingly around ten years old, with short sandy hair done in a ponytail, a freckled face with bright blue eyes, and wearing a white shirt with blue coveralls over both it and her legs. She's holding a small shotgun that seems to have a sawn off barrel to shorten it, but it still looks way too big for someone her age.

"Get out of here!" she shouts, slowly walking towards the wolf. You realize that she must live nearby with her family, and they must hate wolves coming on their property and killing their livestock, like the cow that this wolf just killed.

The wolf growls, and backs slowly away from the girl. You're surprised at how she's able to make the beast back down despite being a child, but you're glad that she's scaring off the animal that was about to eat you. Finally, the wolf turns and runs off, and the girl lowers the gun with a smile on her face.

"That'll show 'em," she says happily. She turns towards the cow and a frown comes over her, though, and she kneels down next to its body, staring at it in sadness. You watch her, and consider what to do next. You could approach her, but she might mistake you for a small vermin of some kind and shoot you. Alternatively, though, she might be nice, and realize your predicament and work to help you get out of it. What do you do?
1511112221212221112221.title: The farmer girl with a shotgun

1511112221212221112222.content:
Now you're twice as worried for your life, as a second wolf approaches you and the wolf towering over you. As it approaches, you wonder just what its connection to the other one is. Are they mates, pack members, family members, or just two literal lone wolves seeking food in the same place? If its the last option, you hope that they'll fight each other and forget about you, because that seems like the only way you're surviving this.

As the newcomer wolf approaches, you take a few moments to examine the two of them. From what you can tell, both are female, but the first wolf is tan-coated while the recently arrived wolf is grey. The grey one stops a short distance away from the tan wolf, and ey stare at each other. Now is the moment of truth: are they friends or enemies?
1511112221212221112222.title: Another wolf

choices: Go back to the wolves and see who wins, then reveal yourself to it
Keep running, to get away from the wolves
15111122212122211122222.content:
The grey wolf growls a bit, and the tan one crouches low to the ground, baring it's fangs. You realize that they don't know each other, or if they do, they're rivals, and are about to fight unless one backs down. You're only a few inches from the tan wolf right now, and you really don't like that. If they start to fight, you'll probably be trampled at this distance. So, you choose to run as fast as you can the instant the wolves start to fight, after they're distracted and thus won't be able to notice you flee.

Your chance comes sooner than you expect, as the grey wolf barks and lunges at the tan one. The tan one lunges too, and the two wolves begin wrestling and rolling in the grass, biting and clawing at each other more violently than you expected. You quickly start to run as fast as you can, happy for a chance to evade the enormous wolf and the other enormous wolf. You glance over your shoulder, seeing them continue their fight, and consider your next move as you continue running.

You could stay nearby and wait until one wolf wins. The tan one clearly thinks you're food, but the grey one might consider you a friend. As you run, you have a thought that the tan one might have not actually been wanting to eat you, but instead merely lick you in a friendly way. Unlikely as it seems, you admit it would be cool to have a giant wolf friend, and that almost makes you want to return to the fight and wait to see who wins, in case the tan one does. You decide that if you finally choose to stay, you'll reveal yourself to the winning wolf and let it do what it wants with you. It's not like you can resist it, after all.

That very thought makes you worried, though, and almost entirely convinces you that it might be best to keep running from the fight. If you do, you'll still be lost out in this grassy field, but you'll at least have some distance between yourself and the wolves.

Well, what do you choose?
15111122212122211122222.title: They're enemies, and fight!

1511112221212222.content:
You try and trace your steps back the way you came. You trace the foot prints left by the vixen that brought you this way. It takes a while, but your back at the tree the Squirrel and Eagle are in. Sticking to the tall grass, and the bases of the trees, to avoid being seen.

You have to switch to the shorter grass as there are to many rocks in the tall grass that you have to climb over. You hope your going in the right direction. You freeze in your movement when you hear a rustling in the tall grass behind you. Slowly you turn just in time to see a huge shadow emerge for the grass. Before you can even move, the shadow lunges, and your grabbed up as it runs off. Over and over the fisted paw holding you hits the ground as the animal ran. You can't even tell what kind of animal has you. Soon the animal slows to a walk, giving you the chance to open your eyes, and see it going on to a hollowed log.


It walked over to a bed of moss and sat on it hind legs. Bringing it front paws upwards to look at its prize. Once the paws stop moving you look at what the animal that has you is. Once your eyes adjust to the lighting you see that the animal that has you is....
1511112221212222.title: Something else decides to take you

151112.content:
It's true that birds-of-prey are super-efficient predators, and clearly, this one is after you for a meal. Nonetheless, even eagles can forget to carry the two. With an earth-shaking impact, the eagle crashes to the ground. The gust of wind from the impact blows you back a bit and knocks you down. You stand up at the same time it does, and have a look over its great body.

A sharp, curving beak faces you along with piercing eyes. Its feathers seemed well-groomed from a quick glance, and the talons are just as sharp as they look on the Discovery Channel.

The eagle prepares to make its move. Your thought at this key moment?
151112.title: The eagle has (crash) landed.

1511121.content:
Your eyes go back to the large, yellow beak. Its sharp end is used to tear flesh off of items too big to be swallowed whole. You consider the possibility of that happening to you, but note that you're probably small enough to slide down to the digestive tract without being torn to pieces.

While you're mulling over these possibilities, the eagle looks to make its move, and does. It grabs you, the sharp beak piercing through your clothing but sparing your skin. Thank goodness you wore your jacket, you think. It takes a few quick gulps, pulling you entirely into the beak. A thick, blobby tongue considers your flesh slightly, soaking your front. You are swallowed shortly after, and the muscles work quickly to take you down into its belly. You slip inside, sliding down to the stomach's base. Almost instantly, sharp acids start to pierce your clothing and skin. Your jacket can't save you this time, but it will give you a little bit of time to admire the sensation of digestion.
