The jackal is a female, that much is obvious. You can't tell its exact age, though, but it's clearly not a pup. Whether it is fully mature or not, you can't say.

The jackal stops drinking, and backs up a few steps before lying down. Her two front legs stretch forward to either side of you, and her furry chest lies directly ahead, with her head looming above. Except for directly behind you, you are surrounded by the jackal's giant body.

The canid looks down at you, and you stare up into her eyes, trying to read any kind of emotion from them. But it's fruitless, and you just stand there awkwardly, hoping that the giant jackal does not decide to eat you.

The jackal lowers her head after staring at you for a bit, and you brace yourself for whatever she is about to do. To your surprise, her tongue slips from between her lips and gently runs over your front side, giving you a lick. She doesn't do that again, though, instead retracting her tongue and looking at you again, as if trying to see how you react.

That's intriguing. Why is she not just eating you? You are small enough to be prey to her. Maybe she is amused to see you are not afraid of her, as she wants to see how you react to her? It's possible. As of right now, though, your only reaction is standing there and waiting for her to do anything, so you can determine if you're in trouble or not. She could either turn aggressive or act more gentle in this situation, and you don't know which she will be until she has already made her move..
1542122221222.title: Female

choices: She makes you get on her
15421222212222.content:
She nudges you and gives a friendly growl. You don't know what to do, but you pet her so that she likes you more.
She gives a friendly snort and nudges you more. Before she looked around and looked back to you... Perhaps thinking of how to keep you safe, or maybe deciding if you were worth eating or keeping...

You sigh as her friendly acting is unsettling...
15421222212222.title: The jackal acts friendly

154212222122221.content: After a bit of the uncomfortable watching her for her to eat you she gets up and curls around you. She seems to be showing off her genitalia more. You wondered why, she started nosing you... at first it was gentle. It remained gentle as she pushed you closer and closer to her... but you didn't notice that she was pushing you towards her sex, that is until you fell onto her rear leg... you looked back to her tail and saw that it was curled around keeping you from running... that left you with two choices...
154212222122221.title: She shows you your room

1542122221222212.content:
You could have climbed over her leg, but her two most vunerable holes were shown to you. Not another Jackle, but to you. So it was perhaps the best show of trust that you could get... or perhaps she wanted you to pleasure her... at any rate you were going into her.

Whither or not she wanted it...
As you pushed on her sacred area she whined, you felt her warm moist insides right there. She pushed on you with her tail. Almost like she was begging for you to get on in... You pushed harder pushing your arms up into her. She whined again. You got deeper feeling her soft walls and warmth. It felt wonderful and made you feel safe as she was taking you into her, so that if anything happened to her... that would be the only reason that you would be in trouble...

As your shoulders and chest entered you could tell that she was...
1542122221222212.title: Her vagina

15421222212222121.content:
It felt really soft and slimy... almost like it was a protective coating... You slipped into her as you felt her nose push on you feet. That made you slip faster into her making her heart rate increase as you felt her vaginal muscles flex and pull.

You found yourself pulled deeper and deeper and pass a ring of muscle that must have been her crevix as you were curled up in a pouch... you sigh and rub her walls. As you do so you find that your caretaker adores that and squeezes you making you feel good and giving you life, you wonder how it will be now...
15421222212222121.title: Sexually immature

154212222122221211.content:
As the day went on, you could feel her move. Shifting from a simple slinking walk, to a full out sprint... she didn't mind you inside of her, perhaps it was her plan all along to keep a passenger. And well as far as seating went, it was soft... and well you found yourself dozing off more than a dozen times...

You would wake when something jostled her. That happened about six times. Well life was life and well she would have to deal with things outside... well outside of her, while she carried you around. Whither that was to be her pup, or simple passenger... or if she wanted, a toy...

You sigh and rub her walls gently and smoothly... each time you did she would squeeze on you and in that instance it felt so good as it would seem she would squeeze life into you each time her walls contracted on you with their slimy, warm, soft feeling...

The day must have passed on as you felt her lay down... after some yipping and nuzzling you felt her settle down... she must have either returned home, or found a place to settle down. And she... must have been saying good night as her heart beat slowed along with her breathing... You smile and settle in her. You could live with this.
154212222122221211.title: She is your caretaker

1542122221222212112.content:
She must have thought you would be in danger if you were outside of her, because your first experience of the day was the shift of gravity to make you stir and a shake that woke you up... To the dark warmth inside of her womb.

You pet her walls making them contract on you. You smile as it felt good... but you wondered how she planned to care for you...

You knew that wombs took care of young before they were born, but after that... they were just areas that were inside of animals... and humans, that was there for reproduction. So did she want pups and you replaced the feeling... or was she genuinely protecting and taking care of you?

As time passed you figured it was to take care of you as she seemed to only be running around, and at times you could hear her eat...
1542122221222212112.title: Morning inside

1542122222.content:
You watch as a Aardwolf emerges from behind the tree, it must of just woken up, as it's starting to getting dark and Aardwolves are nocturnal. You kept quiet as the Aardwolf headed towards a distant termite mound, to eat the termites no doubt. However, thanks to it's large ears it could hear your body. Curious, it comes over to investigate you. Aardwolves are known for there shyness, despite it's size advantage in approaches slowly and cautiously. You don't move, it may excite it. Soon the Aardwolf reaches you and sniffs you.

For some bizarre reason, you don't feel frightened at all. The Aardwolf gives you a good sniff over before it's long, sticky tongue emerges it wraps around you and goes to take you into the Aardwolves mouth...
1542122222.title: Aardwolf

15421222221.content: The Aardwolf's tongue is very strong, you struggle to get free but it's futile. Your just inches from the maw when the Aardwolf pauses. It's hot breath washes over you, making you gag. Then to your amazement it lowers you to the ground and releases you. The Aardwolf however is not letting you go free. It is fascinated with you. It grabs you with it's tongue again and flicks you onto it's muzzle. You have to hold on for dear life as the Aardwolf once again heads towards a termite mound to feast upon the termites.
15421222221.title: Not food...

15422.content: ...big is kind of a mis-statement, isn't it?... Anyway, pick your size.
15422.title: How Big Will YOU Be?...

154222.content: There, much better. Okay, now pick your size.
154222.title: How Small Will YOU Be?

1542222.content:
When you won the sweepstakes, they never said anything about this. This vacation was already off to a rocky start. First, they almost lost your luggage when you boarded the cruise ship, and that night they accidentally served you a still-frozen entree. However, none of that can compare with what just happened to you.

The next day, you decided to go scuba diving when the boat stopped for a while. Just after you dived in, though, you suddenly began to feel dizzy and soon fainted. A few hours later, you awoke and found that everything seemed kinda different. Everything, from the kelp to the waves, seem bigger...MUCH bigger. It only takes you a second to know you've been shrunk down to 1 centimeter. As a final straw, the ship left without you.

Now, you're stranded out at sea, but fortunately your scuba tank and wetsuit shrank with you, meaning you have about 4 hours of time to breathe underwater. But then again, there might be things down there that see you and think "FOOD!!!" For now, there are no animals around, so you can take your time thinking about what you want to do.
1542222.title: Some Dream Vacation This Is...

15422221.content:
"It would probably safer on the surface," you figure, so stay up here you do. Drifting aimlessly around, you begin to wonder what you should do next. As you are thinking, however, you begin to sense some activity occuring beneath you. Poking your head into the water, you noticed a massive school of fish swimming just beneath you. They're apparently harmless since they're eating the little bits of algae floating around, and upon closer inspection, they're not much bigger than you are.

As you watch their plucky little activities, you get a brainstorm. Why not hang around with the fish? They form schools to intimidate larger predators and keep from being eaten. However, some strange feeling tells you that you shouldn't stay with the fish. What will you do?
15422221.title: Schooled

154222211.content:
Still, all these fish might attract too much attention, so you quickly put distance between you and the fish and let the current take you where ever it will.

By now, you're wondering what on earth you should do to get some help. As far as you know, this is a route less traveled by ships, and even if a ship did come around, who would notice you? You begin to feel hopeless, but before the feeling could really develop, something catches your eye.

A seagull had just entered the airspace above you, circling around to see if it can spot anything to eat. Soon, more seagulls as well as some pelicans join the original one. For now, none of them seem to notice your presence, but you're beginning to get a little nervous. You begin to think about taking a dive until they dissapear, but out of the corner of your eye, you spot a small bottle only a few feet away. It looks like good shelter, so what will you do?
154222211.title: Bird Song

choices: The Birds give up and Fly Away
A pelican picks up the bottle and flies off with you
1542222112.content:
The seagulls and pelicans squawk loudly and start to fly down as you scream. You see the bottle and immediately you begin to run as the birds fly down. Several seagulls mistaking you for food come down and nearly snap you up before you run to the bottle one pelican is about to snatch you but you quickly climb into the small bottle and crawl to the end.

The seagulls and pelicans surround the bottle and you watch in horror as the giant birds circle you and try to peck at the bottle to get at you. Fortunately the bottle is made of strong glass that the seagulls and pelicans can't break. You let out a sigh and sit down as the frenzy continues. Maybe if you wait it out, the birds will leave you in the bottle and find food elsewhere.

What happens now?
1542222112.title: In the Bottle

choices: The pelican drops the bottle in the ocean
15422221122.content:
As you're sitting in the bottle, more and more of the seagulls fly off to leave you alone and you let out a sigh. You are about to crawl out when you heard another squawk and you scream and run back to the end of the bottle as the biggest pelican on the beach flies down. If you hadn't ran back in the bottle you'd be swallowed.

The pelican looks at you with anger before it lets out a squawk and then you yell as it grabs hold of the bottle in its big beak and starts to fly off. The pelican shakes the bottle with you inside and turns it around a few times in its enormous beak as you keep running around. You're almost out of the bottle when you hold out your arms and legs to secure yourself in the bottleneck.

You look back at the awaiting throat of the pelican and shiver. But the pelican keeps squawking as it flies with you in the bottle in its mouth over the ocean.

What happens next?
15422221122.title: Pelican Trouble

choices: Try and ride it back to shore!  What do you have to lose?
154222211222.content:
You start wondering where the pelican is taking you, but you can see an island far ahead on the horizon. You sit in the bottle, taking a few glances every so often down the pelican's throat and hoping it won't try and eat you. They are carnivores, after all.

You notice the pelican is flying down to land on the island, and you feel a bit relived, only to realize this is even worse, because now you're probably farther away from shore. You get even more worried and the pelican lands, and drops the bottle to look at you inside it. You just stare back, hoping it will lose interest, but then it grabs the bottle and begins squeezing it in its beak. It realizes that's going nowhere, though, and displaying a frightening amount of intelligence, it walks over to a rock and smashes the bottle into it, breaking it easily and freeing you unwillingly. You scramble to your feet, and the pelican stumbles back, glass having cut its face. As it recovers, you think about your courses of action...
154222211222.title: The pelican breaks the bottle

choices: You are regurgitated...To the pelican's chick
You continue down into the stomach to be digested
1542222112222.content:
You decide to fight the pelican with only your fist, and overconfidence. In a matter of seconds you go from land to pouch. It was actually pertty nice it the pouch, the thin skin keeping you from the outside made the interior lighting look intresting. The color red with a few vainy outlines made the tight space feel cozy. You don't know how to get rid of the fish smell though.

Your interior designing is cut short when the pelican lifts its beak up and you slide into the black hole of the pelican's esophagus. You land in what you believe to be the crop of the massive bird. The only question now is, what will happen next?
1542222112222.title: Fight the pelican!

154222212.content:
The fish seem friendly and all that stuff you learned in science seems to be logical, so you stay with the fish. Sure enough they readily accept you as part of their group and head off. Grabbing the fin of one of the fish, you hang on for the ride.

A few hours later, however, the school begins acting strangely. It begins to bunch up and swim around in circles, as if something scared it. Being in the midst of their little group, you can't see what's happening outside. You work your way out of bottom of the school just in time to see the cause of their panic.

An instant later, you and all the other fish are snagged in the baleen of a humpback whale. The bristly plated hold you tightly as the whale surfaces, draining the water out of its mouth. Soon, the massive maw closes, trapping you inside the beast. The massive tounge sweeps throug the baleen, sliding you onto the tongue along with a pile of fish. You're jostled around as the tounge sweeps over the baleen again, getting the remnants of the school. Then, in one long gulp, you and your former companions slide down the slimy throat of the whale.

Soon, you find yorself in a cavernous sac that could only be the stomach. Your body begins to tingle as the digestive acids get to work. Soon, you loose conciousness, eventually beconing another little part of the whale's lunch. For the whale, a lovely meal; for you...
154222212.title: Safe from ALMOST every predator...

15422222.content:
You've got the scuba tank, so why not put it to good use? With that in mind, you put the mouthpiece back into your mouth and head downwards.

The place you have dived into seems quite deep, even if you were normal sized. You continue heading down as fast as your little legs can make you go. Soon, you manage to find the ocean floor.

Upon finding the ocean floor, you notice that there isn't really much of anything here. Looking around, there seems to be a coral reef or something further north of your position. However, you can also see something to the west. Which way will you go?
15422222.title: A Deeper Blue

choices: The moving item is really something harmless.
The moving item is really something hungry.
154222221.content: Heading north, the large object in the distance grows more and more visible, but you are still unable to see what it is. When you're about a fourth of a mile away from the object, it suddenly begins to move. You think it might be your imagination, but suddenly it moves again. Panic spreads through your mind as you wonder what it could be.
154222221.title: The Mysterious Rock

1542222212.content: As the object moves closer to you horror you see that it is infact a
1542222212.title: something hungry the way it comes

choices: Keep cool and face your assailant.
154222222.content:
You decide to head west, swimming cautiously through the slightly murky water until you find what appears to be a large trench in the ocean floor. Peering over the edge, it becomes quite apparent that the trench is quite deep. The darkness makes you hesitant on whether or not you really want to head down.

Suddenly, a shadow passes above you. You glance up but see nothing. Paranoia begins to set in as you feel something coming up behind you. In a spit second decision, you:
154222222.title: How Low Will You Go?

1542222222.content: You turn around and find out your attacker is...
1542222222.title: Turn

15422222221.content: You freeze when you see the creature in front of you. However, it looks more like an alien than a shark. It had the body (and size) of a fully grown great white. It had four tentacle-like appendages that looked like an anger fish's lure. The light that shone from them nearly blinded you, and you shifted your gaze to its mouth. Three rows of jagged "fishhook" fangs protruded outwards and a wide serpent-like tongue slipped out towards you. It had two white, horizontal slit eyes. Along its body, spikes covered the sides. Not big ones, but almost like fuzz on okra. Its tail swished through the water and its dorsal (top) and two bottom fins were covered in scars. As it moves closer, you make a futile attempt to swim away. However, it quickly uses its tongue to bring you into its mouth. Now it's on the move.
15422222221.title: A hungry shark!

15422222222.content: You look up and sea a massive leopard seal floating above you and looking down at you. A few thoughts come into your mind, including, “holy cow that thing is massive!” and “why is it here? They live farther north.” You back away slowly from the seal and look it over. You are unable to tell it’s gender and have a hard time guessing at its size due to the fact that you are much smaller than you were. Your best guess is that it is about 20 ft long, which is way bigger than a leopard seal should be. Your train of thought is broken when you see the seal move as it cocks it’s head to the side, kind of reminding you of a puppy, a massive puppy. It lowers a house sized head down to you and nuzzles you a bit, seemingly friendly. It then opens its mouth as if it wants you to enter. You stare into its pink maw and down into throat for a bit. Then you glance from side to side, thinking about trying to flee before looked back into it’s mouth. At this point you can try to flee or hope that it doesn’t want to eat you when you enter it’s open maw.
15422222222.title: An inquisitive seal

info.brief_description: you shrink and must live in a world of big animals! dogs, cats, mice, hamsters, bunnies..
info.description:
ok, this might be the first interactive story about macro non-anthro animals ^^' I had this idea for a long time, so here it is :)

here's the rules:
-any type of animal is allowed, except for bugs, they are ugly :P just not furries...I like them, but this story is just for non-anthro giant animals
-any theme is allowed: vore, crushing, paws and, if you have enough fantasy, even adult stuff ^_^; just be descriptive, I'll try to do the same, ok ?
-the protagunist can shrink or grow more
-I'll cancel just lame stuff :P
-HAVE FUN ! lets build up a good story ^_^
